name: Myak Moktan
text: I stayed a year but was so bad staying at here. Got to stay in old carpet, leak toilet and washing machine even requested they couldn’t fixed it. About water bills I couldn’t get convinced . First 3 months water bills came about $45 around then after that every month same bills came.We used give complain a week . Tired of giving complain every week. One of worse thing happened was gun fired from neighborhood and bullet got into my room. After that we complain to apt office did not take any action. I would not recommend to stay here.

resp.text: Hyung, thank you for your time. We are disappointed that you were anything less than satisfied with the year you spent at our community. We apologize if you feel you were charged unfairly. Due to the nature of these concerns, we feel it would be best if we spoke with you directly. Please feel free to stop by our office, give us a call at 334-273-0877, or an email at cdpeppertree@matrixresidential.com. Thank you. - Deanna Moreland, Community Director

name: Ron Jones
text: Great Atmosphere Staff very professional apartment clean upscale appliance and location great for shopping in PepperTree and Sturbridge Area...

resp.text: Thank you so much, Ron! We're thrilled to read you feel so positively toward our community and staff at Peppertree. Please let us know if you need anything! - Deanna Moreland, Community Director

name: Laura Hughes
text:
Home Sweet Home.  My family and I moved from a large neighborhood with an expensive mortgage to Peppertree Apartments over five years ago.  Our intent was to "downsize" in order to afford to put our two kids through college, debt free.  What a great idea!
Our expenses at Peppertree Apartments are less than half of what we were paying, and we don't have to mow the grass, clean the pool, or keep up with any of the outside chores we used to have when we were homeowners!  Apartment life DOES have its advantages!
The complex has changed ownership 3 times since we first lived here, and currently it is run by a staff that really cares about their clients.  Our packages are received in the rental office and stored until we can pick them up.  Maintenance issues are usually handled within 24 hours.  Major repairs are taken care of --- or else the unit or appliance is replaced.
Pets are welcome, but management requires them to be on a leash when outside.  Neighbors get to know each other.  The staff throws occasional parties to encourage social interaction with new and old neighbors alike!
All in all, I recommend Peppertree Apartments for the 1) friendly staff, 2) prompt attention to maintenance and safety; and 3) the AWESOME convenience to everything in the Peppertree/Sturbridge area.  EastChase is just minutes away.  You can walk to the Walmart Neighborhood Market or several restaurants nearby.  Most of the stores are "pet friendly," so you have no excuse not to walk your pooch!
Kids are always having fun playing, neighbors watch out for their safety, the tennis court is newly renovated, and the living is easy.  While you may not choose to stay five or six years like we have, I really think that any time you spend living at Peppertree Apartments will be happy and satisfying.

resp.text: Laura, we appreciate you sharing you and your families experience with us. We're happy to read you all have had such a great experience and are happy with your choice to join our community. We're happy about it too! Please let us know if you need anything. - Deanna Moreland, Community Director

name: Janet Duke
text: I lived at Peppertree for three years; the first two and a half years were great.  Unfortunately, things changed.  Maintenance orders do not get repaired-when I was finally able to reach someone in the office to ask about my 3+ week old maintenance order the response was "oh, we don't check those messages."  I received two warnings for throwing cigarette butts on the ground; when I said "I don't smoke I think those butts are my downstairs neighbors (who did smoke) the response was "don't you live upstairs?"  When I said yes I was told "then they are your butts."  When I turned in my notice, I was sent a letter listing the things I needed to do prior to move out and to get my security deposit returned.  Three weeks after sending me the letter confirming they had received my notice the office manager told the new company I was trying to lease from that I had not given a notice; Peppertree was not aware I planned on moving.  The day I signed my lease with Peppertree I paid a $300.00 pet fee, provided a picture of my pet, and provided my pets vet records.  When my new landlord called for a reference he was told Peppertree did not know I had a pet.  It has now been four months since I moved from Peppertree; I have called eight times to ask about my security deposit.  Eight times I have been told "the manager is at lunch I will have her call you back."  I finally sent an email to the management company.  After sending the email, the Peppertree manager did call me; she told me they did owe me my security deposit and a check would be cut on July 17 or 24th.  Well, it is now August 3rd and no check.  I called today and the manager told me "the cycle of checks for July 24th were not cut.  I'll call you by the end of the day to let you know when you can expect your check."  Unfortunately a place that started out so great turned into a nightmare.  I would not recommend Peppertree Apartments to anyone

name: Marcie Ivey
text: The staff is always helpful. Walk next door to restaurants.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 stars, Marcie! We appreciate you. - Deanna Moreland, Community Director

name: Phyllis Carnes
text: As soon as i stepped through the front door it felt warm and inviting,,,the staff was professional and welcoming,,,,,i LOVE this community

name: Chuck Augustine
text: Nice apartments, nice location and lots of shopping.

name: Kalyn Pinkerton
text: Love living here and the staff is great!

name: monica collins
text: I been here a year and i havent had any problems

resp.text: Thanks for the review, Monica! We're so thrilled to read that you've enjoyed your first year at our community without having any problems. We appreciate you and hope that you won't ever hesitate to reach out if there is anything we can do for you. Thanks again! - Deanna Moreland, Community Director

name: Brittany Jewell
text: After reading some of the comments on this page I see we aren't the only people having problems with Peppertree, My husband and I moved here in March of this year and have had problems since day one. The number one concern we have had is outside of our building the ground stays flooded, even when it has not rained which may be part of the water damage we have had. When we moved into the apartment there was water damage all around the windows in the living room, my husband contacted the office and they sent someone out to "take care" of the issue, when we came back to the apartment they had just painted over the water damage. We had water damage under the kitchen sink which we reported to the front office, they sent someone out a few weeks later to replace the wood. We later found out that the reason the wood under the since had water damage was due to the dishwasher was flooding the kitchen, when we called about that issue it took weeks to have someone come look at it and then a few more weeks for the dishwasher to be replaced. For several months our outside lights did not work, we have had roaches since we moved in, after reporting that several times the pest control people came out and I was told that what they spray when they come out would do nothing for the roaches we had and they were not even aware we had roaches or they could have used other solutions to get rid of them. The guest bathroom toilet has broken several times and they finally after 6 weeks they came out and just super glued the piece back together. We have had nothing but problems with this apartment since we moved in and we will not be renewing our lease, nor will we recommend these apartments to anyone who asks. These apartments are horrible and have issues that management does not care about.

resp.text:
Brittany,

Thank you very much for your feedback. I am so sorry to hear that you have experienced these apparent issues. Would you consider swinging by the office so that we can discuss them in person? I would love to address each and all of your concerns. We always seek ways to improve the quality of our community and your feedback will certainly help us reach that goal for our residents. We appreciate your time here, and look forward to speaking with you soon.

Sincerely,

The Team at Peppertree

name: Eli McCrory
text: I've never heard of someone who lived here that didn't have some type of problem with the management messing something up.

name: susie adams
text: Connie and Eileen are tops!

name: Luly Santana
text:
(Translated by Google) It works very well and comfortable and quiet places.

(Original)
Trabaja muy bien y lugares cómodos y tranquilos.

name: Caroline Peklenk
text: I lived at Woodmere for 4 years. I loved my time there. Management was incredible. Cindy took great care of any need I had, as well as the rest of management. Everyone is very friendly. Could not recommend this place enough! It was a great transition place from my college years into adulthood.

name: beforeMondays.
text: I have lived in my fair share of apartments and as I’ve recently closed on a house I must say Woodmere Creek has been my favorite place to live thus far. I never had any problems with my time here and noticed management cared about their property and tenants. The property was always groomed and kept looking nice. It was a quiet place to live right in the middle of a nice Vestavia neighborhood where you aren’t bothered by major Through traffic. Cindy was always a pleasure and easy to work with as well as maintenance. It’s nice to live somewhere where management provides a good experience and takes care of their property. Good Job Woodmere and to anyone looking I’d recommend WoodmereCreek all day. Thank you !

name: Mary Allen
text:
Maintenance guys and property manager are fantastic! Had my ac go out last month and they were super prompt and unproblematic. I’ve lived here over a year and have never had any issues. I’ve lived in the studio here, and for a studio it was surprisingly roomy and comfortable. This year I moved into a two bedroom here and I'm also super satisfied with the space and I love having a fireplace. They also have recently been scheduling food trucks to come out a couple times a week which has been very convenient.
Lastly, the location is great - you’re right next to Columbiana, 31, and 65, but since the property is so wooded you feel secluded while still being close to everything.

name: Zachary N Johnson
text: I had a very pour experience dealing with this management. I toured a model, liked it, and was told there was a unit available which I immediately applied for. On the application, there was no place to list which unit I was applying for nor was there a place to pay the application fee, both of which were suspicious to me. After I submitted the application, I waited 4 business days with no contact from them about the unit or the application fee. On the 4th day, I reached out, only to find out that the unit that I had been told was available had been leased in the time I was waiting. I never paid the application fee, but it was still incredibly frustrating to lose almost an entire week of time looking for an apartment in a high-demand time like the summer. TL;DR. Shady application process and they have no regard for time sensitivity or customer service.

name: EverythingwithE
text: The staff is incompetent and rude. Some of the lights weren't working during my initial walkthrough, so I asked management to replace the lightbulbs prior to me moving in. I wanted to be sure that it was just a lightbulb issue and not an electrical issue. The manager was very rude to me and stated "well it's an old building, so not everything can be perfect". I guess that means that old buildings can't have working lights.

name: John-Micheal Williams
text: I have lived here since August 2016. It is really quiet.  Maintenance requests have been fulfilled promptly and quickly.  It's been a great experience!

name: Charlie Brooks
text: Property has a serious drainage problem & major mold issue. Management seems overwhelmed. Any maintenance above most basic level, takes months and months. Hence how the mold was able to get so bad. As others have stated, gate is down more than it works. Excuse is always waiting on contractors for parts. On the other hand, they're quick on very basic maintenance such as a clogged toilet. Roaches are also an issue in many buildings and you will have to purchase your own pest control supplies throughout your residency because their pest control does not help with roaches.

name: Madi L
text: I have lived here for almost three years, and it has definitely been a mixed bag. The management handles services requests quickly and they maintain the grounds well. On the other hand, they promised that we would get a unit with hardwood floors, but we ended up with carpet. The kitchen and bathroom countertops and appliances are beyond cheap and flimsy. They say “cable included” which means they charge you $70 a month on top of your rent regardless of if you want it or not. They fixed the water bill recently as a way to make it “more consistent” but it is more than we ever payed in the past. The power bill is not metered for each apartment, but the entire building you are in, and then it is averaged out somehow. So you really have no way of controlling how much your power bill will be each month. It also seems very high considering how small the apartments are. The security gate is ALWAYS broken. It will get broken, they will do nothing for weeks, it will finally get fixed, get broken again a day or two later due to how flimsy the gate arms are, and then it will stay that way for another few weeks. So if you are considering living here for the “security”... don’t. My roommate and I have tried to just deal with everything since moving is a hassle, but we have finally had enough and will be leaving when our lease runs out.

name: Wendolyn Martin
text: I no longer live there but I lived there for 4 years and would recommend it to anyone! The management and maintenance crew are excellent and really seem to care about their residents.

name: Matosh Lee
text: Lived there for a year and a half. For long term stay I dont reccomend due to price hiking. This was the main reason we left due to base rent 200+ over the year and a half and we had 3 6 month leases. As well utilities can be high if you pick the rental they reccomend. Overall safe, close to most places, and apartment was of decent quality.

name: LaRhonda Moore
text: I have lived in this apartment complex going on 3 years now. The office personnel is very incompetent when it comes to customer satisfaction. The package delivery system is nonexistent and unreliable. They have a closet where packages are delivered and unsecured. It is based on an honor system where residents can freely come to pick up packages. I have had plenty of occasions where my packages have come up missing because obviously, other residents are taking packages that do not belong to them. I have complained multiple times but the office says they are "not reliable."

name: Cherise F.
text: No cable wires!!!!  I recently moved into an apartment here and realized that none of my bedrooms have cable outlets.  I informed the office since they advertise as the apartments being cable ready, and they told me that they only provide cable in the living room and you are responsible for paying for wiring for the other rooms.  Mind you, the model I toured had cable outlets in all the rooms and she made no mention that I will have to have lines installed in my apartment. I was also told that because these are old apartments, that they typically only come with one outlet.  I have lived in plenty of "old" apartments and this has not been my experience.  I have never had to install cable wiring in any apartment I have lived in.  During their pitch, they are very proud to say that they pay for your cable, but fail to mention that you will have to pay for installing the wiring which can run over $100.  I just feel that this is a very important point to mention due to the cost of installation.  I feel not making your potential tenant aware is deceptive in nature.  Just wanted to warn other potential renters of this issue.

name: Austin Russell
text: Best manager on the planet.

name: J-Bowman Media (J-Bowman Media)
text: I have been here almost 2 years and Woodmere Creek is excellent in nearly every category, especially with price and location. I do not plan on moving anytime soon.

name: Marshall Yates
text: Old buildings. Expect things to go wrong. Pipes in around 30 units busted last month and flooded everyones apartment.

name: Gett Aaron
text: Mold.

name: Jenna Walker
text: If you don't want to be hounded about everything you do, then don't move here!!! We will no longer be purchasing a DR Horton home and when our lease is up in June....we are out of here!!! I thought we had freedom of expression in America, but obviously not!!! We will look to buy a home from someone else!! Also, the Fair Housing Act says nothing about how we can't put a political sign in our yard either. If that were the case, then no one would be allowed to put them in their yards and I see them everywhere!! So putting a Trump sign in our yard is discriminating against someone else??!?? Give me a break!!!

resp.text:

Sincerely,
The Village at Hickory Management Team

name: Mrs. Brookie
text: Use to be amazing now it’s not. I wouldn’t recommend living here. I’ve also been here for years. Previous management was amazing! They treated us like family. Rent increases with nothing done to the units as far as making them nicer or updating them. Just not a nice place anymore.

name: Shawna L.
text: New renovations are being done all over. However, getting quality maintenance and on-time maintenance is a hassle. Pics online show lovely apartment...maybe for new people moving in, but not for that has been here for years. They need a tennis or basketball court. Beware of pet fee per month. Rent went up by $100 last renewal..used to be $50 increase.

name: Janet Castanon
text: Big disappointment on the management. Don’t answer calls or emails. Very rude to customers. Could not ask a question since she was busy. And said she was going to be there u til a certain hour but left early. I waited for a whole hour and half for her to get in her car and leave without seeing anyone of the customers today. Front door of the office was locked all day. And nobody could reach for help or ask questions. Horrible place to live. And I been here since October of last year. And I am definitely not coming back to renew with them. Whenever I ask for something to be addressed with my issues of my place no one reach back about an update or help fix the situation. Unsatisfactory of overall of this place.

name: Erin Gipson
text:
It’s been over three weeks since we moved in. The apartment was not ready for us to move in, even though they had 70 days prior notice. We spoke with the office the morning of our move in date, and they did not convey any delays. When we got there, from out of state, we weren’t allowed to enter the apartment until 8pm. The hot water heater was broke, there was blue tape around outlets that aren’t useable, there’s mold in the window seals, and our front door wouldnt even latch.  We didn’t get a pool key for over a week. Still over three weeks later, and we still don’t have hot water, no working dishwasher, still blue tape around outlets, still haven’t been given a mailbox key,  and all the items that were supposed to be fixed prior to us moving in (paint, vanity’s, plumbing issues), still have not been fixed. The property manager won’t return my voicemails or texts. This place is far from “luxury” as their website states, and not even appropriately liveable for the price.

*.* update cockroach infested snd they won’t do anything about it after they’ve been notified several times! Don’t let outside looks fool you!

Check out the reviews of their sister property: Madison Grove apartments. Same management company.

name: Attalie Johnson
text:
DO NOT MOVE HERE!

I have been a resident at the Grand Reserve for about four years. Within the last year and a half, Property management has changed at least twice. The previous property managers were a delight. They were very kind and professional, addressed residential concerns in a very timely manner, and retained a great staff of maintenance professionals. The new property management and office staff are the polar opposite of what I have just described. I have had a broken heating unit for the whole of winter, despite having called repeatedly to have it addressed. This has created a hike in my utility bill. I have asked management to address and repair this. They have yet to repair my heating unit. They have also cancelled services like pest control without notice. During the winter months, I had an issue with ants. Again I called management only for them to stall in addressing the issue. Nothing is done in a timely manner. The pandemic has created a lot of hardships for everyone, but that didn't deter new management from pursuing the largest rent increase in the course of my time here. Lastly, these apartments are dated and haven't been modernized commiserate with the rent inflation. Where as once this place was  a nice community with management that felt like family, you should expect anything but.

name: Derrick Thomas
text: They give us fake keys for the gym and they never work.

name: Megan H
text:
**HIGHLY RECOMMENDED**

My time at the Grand Reserve was amazing!  The management and staff are so helpful and kind.  There was never a time I went in there when I wasn't greeted with a smile :)  They ensure packages are sorted and secure inside the leasing office.  And they treated everyone like family!  The apartments are well kept and extremely spacious.  The 2BR/2BA unit I lived in was extremely well laid out with bedrooms on opposite sides of the living area that made for quiet Saturday and Sunday mornings, and the walk-in closets are to die for!!  The pool area has plenty of seating, tables, covered areas, and outlets.  And I always admired the landscaping when returning home.  The fitness center is equipped with plenty of free weights and machines for multiple people.  The locker rooms and sauna were always clean.

I looked back with sadness as I pulled away for the last time.  But I know that if I ever go back to apartment living, the Grand Reserve at Madison will be what I measure all other apartments to.

name: Jodie Morgan
text: Grand Reserve is such a great apartment community. My daughter is vision impaired and it eased my mind that most everyone backs into the parking space especially the taller trucks and suvs for the children’s safety. They have plenty to keep the entire family happy, active and together (or tanning for some alone time!)  The apartments are beautiful and spacious. Another awesome quality is there’s plenty of storage which is unheard of for apartment living. Main entry/Coat closet, living room/dinning closet, huge pantry/laundry area, and patio closet is huge as well! Wish I could have took this apartment to Tennessee when I moved!

name: Zachary Hart
text: Amy and Ghassan really make this place feel like home. They are flexible on request made and are kind on any request they make (such as asking me to clean up boxes that were piled to the ceiling on the porch from moving or if I want to work on my car where to park it to do so). I feel the success of the Reserve may not be completely dependent on them, but heavily influenced by their leadership.

name: Kim
text: I just moved here about a month ago after living at another area luxury apartment complex for 3 years.  I am very pleased with the location, space, staff and I feel like this is a home...not just an apartment.  The layout is awesome and the rent is reasonable and affordable. Highly recommend.

name: Heather Roberts
text: We stayed here short term (1 month) while we were moving to the area. The property managers have been at this property for a long time and are AMAZING! They were super sweet to my kids and made our first month in the area so easy and comfortable. Any issue we had, they fixed it immediately and without complaint! Thank you to Ghassan and Lisa!! The apartment we rented was very spacious and quiet. Rent here, you won't regret it. There is also an excellent pool area that we didn't use since we rented in the winter but it is beautifully done.

name: Aubrey
text: Very spacious living area. Management and staff are very nice. Very quiet area to live in as well. As to the vanity area someone complained about in a previous review, my assumption is that came from a man. I personally love the vanity area. It's perfect for a woman. I also love the closet space. And I wouldn't say it is pricy if you compare to other apartments. This place has many amenities and is a very large living space compared to newer apartments in the area with less amenities and a lot smaller living space. And these are actually less money.

name: Travis Grant
text: This was my family's fourth apartment stay (the previous three were during our college years). The family atmosphere, well maintained grounds and apartment homes, and responsiveness of the owners and staff far exceeded our expectations. The thoughtful little things (e.g., owners remembering our names within days of moving in, having the maintenance man deliver our packages directly to apartment from the clubhouse where they are received, and purchasing two bags of ice from a nearby convenience store while our replacement icemaker was on order, just to name a few) truly set these owners apart from any other landlords I've ever had. Needless to say, we highly recommend this apartment home community and its staff to anyone looking for one in the Madison area!

name: Tanner Wilkerson
text: I enjoyed living here the most out of all apartments in my time.  The grounds are kept very nice and apartments are very spacious.  I had no issued from neighbors or unlikeable residents and that is very rare.  They must be very particular about the personalities they let in.  (I experienced no loud music, no loud people, no drama)  The staff are amazing.  First if there is any issue with the apartment when you let Gasan or Lisa know it is fixed quickly and correctly.  The maintenance staff are professional and friendly.  Gasan and Lisa make this property.  They will become like family to you and each encounter is enjoyable.  You cannot go wrong here.

name: Nakia Lewis
text: Very excited about moving here last year. Loved my apartment, but as soon as the fall comes so does rodents BEWARE! Especially for bldg. 700. Encountered mice in the pantry and laundry area. They will send out their maintenance to try to come and catch it, who has No experience with catching vermin. Finally called Kirlands who they contracted. The mouse ran back out of the hole  when he came to catch him. They waited to patch the whole and the todent still found a way to get in 2 more times. I moved out!

name: Kathy Sims
text: Very roomy for an apt. Exstreamly nice managers and maintance personel

text: It doesn't get any better than the Grand Reserve at Madison. AAAA+ rated staff.  None better in USA!

text: I have been renting a property through Cummings Real Estate for only a month now and thus far I am extremely disappointed in the lack of professionalism and communication. Trusting a real estate company to fulfill obligations as a landlord is a very difficult thing to do. The lack of urgency and slow response time is alarming after committing to a 12 month lease. Hopefully there are some improvements and changes made very soon. As of now, if I could rent from another agency I would.

text: Well there were some repairs done after I moved in but nothing like what I told would be done, even though my rent went up. Still cannot get things done from maintenance. On top of that my upstairs neighbor is so loud I'm considering calling the police. It's so loud most times it shakes the ceiling and light fixtures.  As apartment living goes, this is the worst. It's as if you are lulled in under false pretenses and then the hammer drops.  I am very disappointed. When I first moved in I told everyone I knew how nice it was.  As a retired police officer of 20 years I can tell that this feels like highway robbery.

name: Tricia Thompson
text: Thank you Ms Valerie for your willingness to always assist and answer my questions. Any problems we may have had were always addressed to satisfaction in a timely manner!

resp.text: We are so grateful for your positive feedback. Please let us know if we can ever be of assistance!

name: Kiera Nicole
text: Trash apartment complex all the way from the management to the up keep of the apartment complex. Maintenance man called the police on us after he had put his hands on me. Police came and he refused to talk to them. ( Of course i’m pressing charges ). Management would rather make up fees than to come out and fix up your apt. The assistant manager said “ report me all you want, ain’t nothing gonna happen to me.”, there’s nothing professional about this women. Would NEVER recommend this complex to anyone. Foshee, please correct your management.

resp.text: Kiera, We are so sorry for your experience at our property. We will be looking further into these accusations, as we take this very seriously. Please feel free to call our corporate office to share more details on this experience. (334) 273-0313

name: Lenora Davidson
text: Ms. Val, really goes above and beyond, to make sure everything is in working order, some issues are taken care of within that same day!  Thank you Ms. Val!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive review. We are glad to have you in our community!

name: Tasha Smith
text: This complex manager has the nastiest attitude I have ever witnessed as far as managers goes. She is disrespectful and she shares the tenants personal information with others. Repairs are never done on time and then you are also forced to put up with her nasty attitude. Foshee really needs do a follow up the residents concerning her attitude and professionalism.

name: Sandra Bush
text: The staff is most helpful and nice

resp.text: We are so glad our staff has been able to help you. If you need anything else from us, just give us a call!

name: MzTakeMeAsIAm
text: This is the worst apartment complex ever. The manger is extremely rude and just plain nasty. Repairs are not done in a timely manner and the worst part of it is that the manager has no concern for the residents that ultimately pays her salary.

name: Alfreda Wade
text: Great  Maintenance staff!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive review. We love hearing kind words about our staff!

name: Michael Witherspoon
text:
Had a bad experience. I gave them notice about 60 days out that I came up on orders and would be moving out and would cancel my lease. I turned in my orders and gave them notice again when I finally moved out...only to keep getting emails while overseas about how I hadn't paid my rent. It was a hassle.

Prior to that, I was being charged for pest control in my rent but no one was coming by to spray like the lease agreement had in it.

Lastly, I had a pretty bad leak in my refrigerator and I put the request in but nothing...for approximately 7 months smh. I did the electronic request, went to the office top follow up (only to be told to continue submitting the request), and I would put them in monthly. The issue was finally solved when I found out the front office had their boss coming out and I CANCELED ALL MY PLANS to make sure I could complain to someone. They finally brought me a new refrigerator.

I'm glad I had an opportunity to cancel my lease because that was a horrible experience man...not to mention I was paying $600/month and it increased to $645/month. The average person doesn't see a $45/month raise smh.

resp.text: Michael, We are so sorry you had a bad experience with us. I'm not sure if you are aware, but we recently had a change in management. We are doing our best to stay on top of resident requests and are doing our best to fix any issues. If you have any questions or concerns the best way to get in touch with us is to visit our leasing office. Thanks

name: Angel Wings
text: Stacy the manager is very unprofessional. This line of business does not fit her well.

name: Jade Lewis
text: Don't move out here. Randy the maintenance man is horrible. I lived there for two years (moved finally thank God) and Randy is nothing but rude and a liar. A closet door in the hallway was broke upon us moving in and the office was informed, however they still charged me for something that was never fixed in the first place. Mary who works in the office is no better and VERY phony. She abuses her power and try to take advantage of ppl. One day I was driving fast through the neighborhood because I was late for an appointment. Mary called in regards to me speeding, which she was in her right to do because I should have not been driving that fast, however she threatened me and stated that if it happens again then I would not be allowed to park my car in the neighborhood. Well naturally after hearing that I became concerned. I asked Mary if she could show where it states that she can do that in the lease, she then became upset and got an attitude for no reason, which later  became much more than what it should have been. I now know why she reacted the way that she did because no where in the lease does it state that she can do that or that can happen, which is a prime example of abusing your power.

resp.text: M. Lewis, Thank you for your feedback. Our goal is to present a positive, dignified and businesslike image at all times through our appearance, behavior, and interactions with others. If we failed to meet your customer service expectations, we sincerely apologize. Thank you for making your home with us!

name: Sean Willard
text: The ONLY redeeming factor is the very easy access to Blount Cultural park and the AL Shakespeare Festival.

name: Mikayla K.
text: It’s the middle of hot July and the pool still isn’t open.

name: Jerell Jackson
text: By far THE worst apartment complex east of the Mississippi!! Maintenance is the main concern, they bs you about everything you tell them you need fixed. Randy is a horrible maintenance man. The front office people lie and are extremely rude. They have a terrible spider problem here, and blame it on the trees. Do nothing to prevent it. DO NOT move here!

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. Our goal is to present a positive, dignified and businesslike image at all times through our appearance, behavior, and interactions with others. If we failed to meet your customer service expectations, we sincerely apologize. Thank you for coming to us with maintenance requests first. We like to resolve any maintenance issue through our standard maintenance request process. We value our residents and take pride in providing a great place to live.

name: MrGundam0083
text: Neighbors play loud music every day despite the calling to the office,We pay good money to be able to come home after work an relax..But no we can't music is so loud you can hear it over listing with headphone in the back of the apartment..Very up set its 2017 and this is a reason we moved to begin with.Disrespectful neighbors that don't care about other living around them..

name: Katrice Hartwell
text: Worst Apartment Complex Ever!!!!!!

name: Allison Stephens
text: I am about to move in here. The apartments seem very nice. Management has been nothing but nice to me. Was able to get a 3 bedroom in about 3 months after applying when everyone else said I could be on a waiting list for a year or more. Rent is cheaper here than anywhere else I found. Thankful to have been able to rent from here so fast!

name: Jake Helton
text: The maintenance is top notch! 😁

name: Rose Guillaume
text: I really love leaving there Amanda brown the manager she was so amazing

name: Emily Stevens
text: I currently live here. I personally think that the manager is AWESOME! She is funny, kind and caring. She works with you when you need it. There are rules here and they are enforced which makes sure all tenants are safe and the property is kept like it's supposed to, rules are a good thing and I'm glad they are in place! The few times we have had maintenance issues, they are addressed and fixed within the week or so. Which is pretty impeccable considering there is so many apartments/buildings here for them to keep up with. Pest control is here every month, we do not have any bug problems. I'm very happy with the management, maintenance, and everything else that comes with living here.

name: Cori Bradley
text: Paid application fee, get told I'm approved. I've been called with the same questions over and over again just to be told to they will call me the same day and never do. They did this over and over until one day they just stopped calling. The fee is clearly nonrefundable, and I'm out $50 because I  had to pay per adult accordig to them. And after a month and a half of trying and calling, no one responds or attempts to call back. I've never had this much trouble trying to rent.

name: David Anderson
text: There’s new management and maintenance now.

name: Eric McMunn
text: Management is extremely rude to tennants and guests, appliances are not kept in working order, and there are serious trip hazards in the "handicap accessible" sidewalks. Hvac is not kept in operating order and filters are not changed regularly.

name: Art Of Valor
text: The manager is very hateful. She is a pain to have to deal with. Very miserable experience here because of this woman. Could be a very nice place if different management took over.

name: Enrique Cruz
text: Quiet and friendly

name: Virginia Barck
text: Good

name: Adonai Rezene
text: it is awsome

name: Kelly Wood
text: Myself and a few tenants voted to leave this review because we are so appalled. Last week I’ve learned that they fired the BEST leasing agent I’ve ever came in contact with at this property. All because this person wanted more clearance too HELP US. However was shunned and denied because she worked for a temp service! This agent even continued to help me with basic information AFTER she was let go! Personally, she was the only reason things were done around this place and even though she was new. It was done correctly! A few of us HAD to say our peace about this. I’ve lived here since 2017 and Danita was by far the BEST! This property is going downhill and we all decided NOT to renew our lease as well as let everyone know what’s going on by word of mouth. Please treat your tenants AND employees better! I pray this sweet soul has many blessings upon her endeavors. Because wherever she is greatness will follow!!! Thank you for everything!!!! That office will NEVER be the same! Get it together Arcan!!!!

name: HerSOULspeaks. NSW
text: Terrible stay here . Been here throughout 2-3 management changes and no one can seem to get it right. We still have outdated appliances, management would rather argue that fix problems and somehow my account keeps getting messed up. Being, I pay my money in full  and somehow still end up with additional charges. And when I question this, instead of carefully considering things they’d rather tell you how you’re wrong. Further more, parking is terrible and they send the tow truck around on contract but fail to provide adequate parking for its actual residents. Seriously considering breaking my contract given it’s not worth it for the even outdated apartments. my floors and ceilings are squeaking daily

name: Alejandro Cano
text: Staying at the Haven is pretty average. The apartment complex workers are nice and the Hoover area is an okay area to live in. The tour was very pleasant and nice but once you sign the lease you are not treated in the same manner anymore. The apartment I was given was not clean at all, I had to clean everything before moving my stuff in. I have been out of A/C for my apartment unit for 3 weeks now and they WILL not  compensate you for anything per the lease agreement. They follow the lease agreement to the T. It is not the apartment staff fault, it is the regional manager that will reference the lease agreement constantly. I do not recommend living here because of the regional company that owns this apartment complex, they are not understanding and you will find way better apartment complexes in the area at a better price/quality.

resp.text: Alejandro, we appreciate your compliments for our team. As we discussed, the parts necessary to repair your air conditioner were delayed due to issues with the pandemic. They have been ordered and will be installed as soon as possible. In the meantime, we have supplied a portable unit. In fairness to all of our residents, we enforce the terms of the lease agreement with regard to rent concessions or credits. If we may assist you further or bring more clarity to this situation, please feel free to connect with us at thehaven@trinity-pm.com. Thank you.

name: Jordan Tippins
text: I am new to the area, and I was looking for something safe and quiet! I found the Haven, and I quickly jumped to sign a lease. Everyone in the office has been so friendly and helpful. Fredrick, the apartment manager, has been an absolute angel with helping with the move-in process. Her and Grace both have answered all 50 of my question in a quick and timely manner. I’m so happy I have found my new home at the Haven!

resp.text: Jordan, thank you so much for your 5-star review. We are grateful you selected our community to call home. Fredrick and Grace will be encouraged by your acknowledgment of their superior service.

name: Kelly Kennedy
text:
The Haven is under new management so I had to erase my previous nasty, but blatantly honest review. The new office staff is accommodating, courteous, and professional. I’ve even heard rumors that they could be painting the heinous tan, grey & baby food yellow building color palette the previous color blind “designer” selected. The interiors are actually nice; don’t let the paint spook you off like it almost did me. Hopefully it will be a thing of the past soon anyways.

I am a single woman, about 2 years away from getting a home. 2 months ago I was certain I’d have to switch apartments before that time came, but now I am confident that the Haven will be a a great place to live once more.

name: Rachel Triplett
text: I was looking for something safe and quiet for my girls and I and I stumbled upon this gem! Everyone I have come across has been friendly and neighborly. Fredrick, the apartment manager, was absolutely amazing with helping with the moving in process. She was very patient, answered my emails in a timely manner, and always let me know she was there if I needed her. I’m happy we made Haven our new home!

resp.text: Rachel, your lovely review made our day! It's delightful to know that you and your family feel so much comfort in our peaceful, friendly community. Thank you for shining a spotlight on Fredrick's outstanding help during your move-in process. It's a pleasure to have you here!

name: Clementine Stanton
text: I have lived here since September of 2019. I absolutely love living in this area. I have felt safe since day one. My apartment is newly renovated and truly feels like home. I have never had any issues with maintenance. Once I place a work order, one of the workers have been out to my unit within 2 days. Dawn in the leasing office is always quick to answer any questions and helped me tremendously during my lease signing process. If you want to live somewhere that is safe, pretty reasonably prices, and updated this is the place for you!

resp.text: We appreciate your review, Clementine. It has been great to have you here over the past year. We will share your positive sentiment with Dawn. Please let us know if there is anything else we may help with as time continues.

name: Laquenton Jackson
text: Ms.Frederick was really nice when she assisted me with getting my application done ! She also has really great customer service . And she doesn’t mind you calling back if you have any questions!! Most definitely would recommend!!!

resp.text: Thank you for your hearty recommendation, Laquenton! Ms. Frederick truly stands out as a caring and knowledgeable professional, and we are proud to have her on our team.

name: Priscilla Weaver
text: My husband and I moved in about a month ago now. Despite a couple of moments of noisy neighbors in the next building over, our experience thus far has been pretty cool. This is a beautiful place with a nice scenery and well manicured lawns. I love the immediate response of maintenance in case there's a problem.  The customer service is hands down Amazing! Frederick Mccary is one who truly cares for her customers. She was a huge help to my husband and I since day 1. I loved her honesty as well as her sweet spirit to guide us through everything. We ended up having to move from Tuscaloosa to be closer to our jobs. Though it was a tedious process  she made everything run smoothly. We are so appreciative of her and now welcomed in our new place, our "Haven."

resp.text: Priscilla, it's great to hear from you. It warms our hearts to know that you think so highly of our community. Reading all your kind words about our team has brightened our day, as we strive to provide our residents with the best possible customer service and quality of life. Thank you for your review. We're glad you're here!

name: Randall Pinkard
text: I am thankful that I choose to stay at the Haven apartment homes in Hoover. The environment is beautiful, the staff is very friendly and they try to help you find any solution to any problem you have. I have to thank Dawn who first helped me finding an apartment here, Grace who helped with signing my lease and Fredricka who helped me with every concerns I had. Thank you guys and I appreciate all that you have done for me. Keep up the good work!!! 🙂🙂🙂

resp.text: Thank you for the glowing review, Randall! We are honored to hear that Dawn, Grace, Fredricka, and the rest of our team made sure you had a top-notch experience.

name: Deezoul Gaming
text: The way that The Haven staff are on top of things when you need them is amazing......I had an issue with a lil water leaking into my apt, made a call to the office and spoke with Ms. Frederick. She got my work order in......and even did a check up to see if the issue was resolved and if there was anything else. Frederick as well as the rest of the staff are friendly and respectable........especially during this wear a mask era.

resp.text: Deezoul, it is always encouraging to hear from satisfied residents such as yourself, and we are thrilled that Ms. Frederick and the rest of our team have left you impressed with their caring service. Thank you for your 5-star review, and please don't hesitate to reach out to us in the office is there is ever anything we may do for you in the future.

name: Lonnie Streeter
text: Toured the complex Dec. 27, 2019 with  Frederick (Freddie) McCray.  Grace greeted my partner and me upon arrival at the leasing office. The grounds appeared well kept and the apartment we toured well appointed. I am really looking forward to my move in date. After our tour Freddie suggested a local spot, Jake's Cafe to eat. I will update with any developments, but as of now I am feeling good about my choice to call Haven Apartments home.

resp.text: Lonnie, we're humbled by your outstanding feedback about our community and team. We are proud of the welcoming and pleasant environment that our team works very hard to create, and we're delighted that you had such a great first experience here. We look forward to having you as a part of our community soon!

name: Steven Szumplawski
text: Well I moved to the Haven Apartments from Michigan Fredrick made things so easy by doing everything online even sent me photos of the apartment in a timely fashion. I have been here for about two weeks and any service request have been addressed. I really enjoy the Valet trash pick up makes it very convenient. I can not wait for the Covid-19 pandemic to die down as there pool and exercise room look very nice.

resp.text: Steven, thank you for such a complimentary review! We completely agree that Fredrick is a huge help to new residents and makes their experience much easier. Our entire team was all smiles to hear they made such a positive impact on your experience. We appreciate your encouraging words. Be sure to enjoy that refreshing pool when it opens, and welcome home!

name: Donita Watson
text: A great place to live. Frederick the apartment manager is awesome! Very professional and helps with all needs in a timely manner.

resp.text: Donita, thank you for your review. It is terrific that you hold our community in high regard. We will let Frederick know that he has been remarkable.

name: QuaChina Carmichael
text:
Moving in today, and may I just say Ms. Frederick has really made the moving process so smooth and enjoyable for us. Coming from college apartment living in Tuscaloosa to a new city. It has been amazing
So far and i have high hopes and expectations during our stay.

resp.text: Welcome to our community, QuaChina! We hope our customer service continues to live up to your expectations. Enjoy exploring your new home and visit us in the office if there is anything you need as you settle in.

name: Micheal Mays
text: Frederick is a great help to finding your next apartment home at the Haven. She thoroughly followed up with me doing my apartment search. Very helpful, family oriented and professional!

resp.text: Micheal, thank you for sharing your positive review and wonderful experience with Frederick! It was our pleasure to assist you, and we're glad to have met your expectations. We are sorry for the delay in responding to your review, as this review platform did not feature any reviews for the past few weeks due to the COVID-19 situation. If there is ever anything else that we may do to be of assistance, please don't hesitate to let us know.

name: Shana Harrell
text: The first thing that caught my attention upon arrival @ The Haven was how clean the property was & how beautifully manicured the lawn was! Mrs. Frederick possessed a warm & welcoming personality, she was polite, knowledgeable about the property & VERY CUSTOMER SERVICE FRIENDLY! She made me feel, as if, I was already a part of The Haven family!!

resp.text: Shana, we take pride in the amount of work we put into the upkeep of our community. Your feedback validates our efforts. Mrs. Frederick will be pleased to read all of the kind words you've written about her. Thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience with us.

name: Alexis Sanders
text: Mrs. Frederick McCray is the BEST! She informed me about the property itself, as well as gave me and my mom a very wonderful tour! I had nothing but good things to say about the property as well as the apartment unit in which we were shown. The landscape is very well managed and kept up (clean), the inside of the apartment was very nice and spacious. It made me feel like I was in my own home. It definitely exceeded my expectations. Thanks again!

resp.text: Alexis, it is wonderful to know that Frederick so thoroughly impressed you with her warm welcome to our community! We are especially delighted that you feel the upkeep and cleanliness here are top-notch. Thank you for the glowing review.

name: Alexis Posey
text: I had a wonderful experience at the Haven apartment homes . Frederick McCray has THE BEST customer service skills I have ever experienced. Her attitude, personality and professionalism has drawn me into applying and considering The Haven as my home. The staff is wonderful and I look forward into moving in ! Thanks :)

resp.text: Alexis, thank you for taking the time to leave such a kind and thoughtful review. We are glad to hear that Frederick was able to set your mind at ease, and we look forward to having you as part of our community.

name: Maurcia Smith
text: Frederick at The Haven Apartments was very helpful and informative. Additionally, her spirit was very warm and inviting. She was very professional and full of joy. Thank you for being so kind.

resp.text: It means a lot to us that you've taken the time to compliment Frederick's customer service skills. We're really proud of the exceptional professionals we hire to maintain our community and we're so glad that our efforts have paid off.

name: Kendall Danyel
text: I lived at The Haven since January 2019, and let me just say I LOVE it here. The management staff is absolutely helpful, they get to the bottom of any problems you may have. And the maintenance service is super fast. We had a small water issue, after one request the problem was fixed. No other problems have occurred since then. If you are looking for somewhere to stay, a peace and quiet environment, including well kept up and clean, The Haven is the place to be.

resp.text: Your upbeat review and recommendation brought a smile to our faces, Kendall. Thank you for sharing your positive experience with us. We are happy that the team has been helpful. Thank you for taking the time to write.

name: Christina Costello
text: Communication with Frederick McGray is wonderful, she is very patient with me as I ask so many questions through emails and phone calls. I hope to call Haven Apartments my next home as I just submit my application.  Thank you

resp.text: Christina, thank you for your review. It is heartening to hear that your experience with our community has been great so far. We look forward to welcoming you to the community soon.

name: Gwalo
text: Mrs. McCray is the absolute BEST ! she greeted my boyfriend and I with nothing but positive energy as soon as we walked in the leasing office. She took us on a tour of the complex and throughly explained  everything to us since this would be our first time renting. The Haven is a great complex and I look forward to calling it home.

resp.text: We are thrilled to welcome you and your boyfriend to our community, Gwalo! We're certainly delighted to hear that Mrs. McCray made sure your visit was a top-notch experience. Thank you for the encouraging feedback.

name: Patrick Craig
text: My agent was spectacular! Frederick is probably the best agent I’ve had over the years of apartment hunting. Would recommend her to help anyone!

resp.text: Patrick, we are glad that you had a positive experience with Frederick. If there is anything you need as time continues, please let us know. Thank you.

name: Mequel Henderson
text: Very personable staff. Frederick is very sweet and helpful! Love her sprit. Come by and visit these lovely apartments and ask for her! Tell her I sent you by!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your excellent remarks about our team, Mequel. We are delighted that our team has been such a key part of your enjoyment in our community. We are thrilled to have you as a part of our community!

name: Taylor Walford
text: When I called Frederick answered the phone with enthusiasm & was excited to help me find my new home. When I arrived she welcomed me with open arms. While on the tour she answered all my questions & showed me everything I wanted plus more. I would definitely recommend this apartment complex to be your next home.

resp.text: Thank you for your upbeat review, Taylor. We are grateful for your recommendation. We will be sure to let Frederick know that they helped make you feel welcome!

name: Miss Dominique
text: I’ve been here going on 6 months and I’ve had nothing but a positive experience. I’ve had a few concerns in my time here and the office staff has been wonderful. My concerns were taken care of immediately each time. My neighbors are great. Thanks Haven!!

resp.text: Dominique, thank you for your detailed review. We are thrilled to hear the team has been prompt and helpful since you have been here. Your feedback validates our efforts to provide our residents with top-tier service. Take care.

name: Big ben D
text: Plenty of beg bugs when I stayed there before the renovation. Balconies were very dangerous as well due to the old wood that they are still using. They basically just paint over it when someone moves out. They also had plenty of  problems with their sewage, so many times the water was cut off without warning.  But the thing that did it for me were the bedbugs that hide in the corners or their carpets. Hopefully things are better.

resp.text: William, it sounds as though your experience here was not ideal. We would like to discuss your concerns in greater detail so that we may improve your time here. Your comfort is our top priority. When you have a moment, please email us at thehaven@trinity-pm.com. Thank you, and we look forward to connecting.

name: Calvin Taylor
text: Mrs.Frederick McCray has best customer services. If, you are looking for apartment home give Frederick a call.

resp.text: Thank you for the recommendation, Calvin! We agree that Frederick is an asset to our team and our community, and we will be sure to share your kind words with her.

name: Whitley Harris
text: It's been almost a year for me since I have been living there and I can honestly say I really enjoy it. Anytime I have any questions or concerns, Dawn is always there to assist me with whatever. She's always professional, she's knowledgeable of her job and very relatable. The maintenance man is amazing at his job & very expeditious about my requests, & I've NEVER waited for service. I wish the older gentleman had more assistance for such a large complex. His work alone is phenomenal I'm just saying you all should look into that.

resp.text: Whitley, we appreciate receiving your 5-star praises for excellent service provided by Dawn as well as our maintenance professional. We also made a note to evaluate our team resources in case they need expanding. Meanwhile, keep feeling right at home in your comfortable space.

name: Lee Hedrick
text:
I scheduled a tour of the complex online. I showed up 15 minutes prior to my appointment only to find the leasing office locked. The lights were on and the sign said open, but nobody was in the building. I waited until my appointment time and called the office number listed on the door and did not receive an answer.

The call was eventually routed to an off-site call center who said she would submit a ticket and get the office personnel to call me with at least an updated status of why they were not in the office. I waited onsite for another 45 minutes and no one ever returned to the office or answered my ticket. THREE days later I get a phone call from the apartment complex stating they would love to schedule another tour. They did not have an answer for why the office was closed, stated maybe it was a tour or they were walking the property. If that was the case you think they would have a record and could definitely say why they were out.

I can understand only one person working and being out on a tour that ran late, or maybe even property management issues. However, there is no reason to have the office closed for over an hour when someone had a scheduled appointment, much less wait three days to respond to them. If this is any indication of how they handle business, I would stay far away from this apartment complex.

resp.text: Mr. Hedrick, we do apologize for the experience you had at your time of visit and can assure you it is not a direct reflection of our services at The Haven. Unfortunately, there was a scheduling conflict and a previous tour ran over into your allotted tour time. We would have certainly returned your call that day, but did not receive the ticket due to a possible technical issue. We would love to reschedule your tour appointment to show you the property and inform you of our amenities and floor plans at The Haven. Again, we apologize for any inconvenience you were caused and hopefully we can alter your perception of our community with another visit. We hope to speak with you soon!  Thank you,  The Haven Apartment Homes

name: Lisa Sanders
text: No complaints. I love the area, neighborhood, and access to shops. The office team is knowledgeable and friendly. They are very swift and exceptional. They under promise & over deliver! Kudos Michael, Dawn, Grace, Bilal & Ray you all make my home life pleasant & relaxing. Thanks!

resp.text: Thank you for sharing these comments. We are happy to be of assistance.

name: Katie Park
text: Great people, great services, great maintenance. I love this apartment complex!

resp.text: Thank you for the great rating and review, Katie! It is always a pleasure to hear straight from our residents that we have been providing exceptional living experiences.

name: Morgan Hudson
text: The move in process has been extremely easy. Frederick is wonderful and has a great personality. So happy we chose The Haven!!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share such valuable information with us, Morgan. Your feedback about Fredrick and our team assures us that we are headed in the direction of providing excellent service and in creating a place our residents love calling "home."

name: Kisha Mitchell
text: We have been living here for 11 years. We have really enjoyed it. Its very safe and convenient to shops in the area.

resp.text: We appreciate your loyalty to the community, Kisha. We have been happy to have you and your husband here for eleven years. Thank you for the kind words about our community. We love having your vote of confidence in the team. Cheers!

name: frecia vega
text: The place is ok but they try to make more and more money that you don't have to take it out I lived for a year I never paid late and leave my apartment clean when I move, my surprise was that they sent me to collections and charged me $100 extra because they painted the place and had already made enough money with me to get me out more so far I haven't The people in the office are bitter, and also if you leave in a 3 level the ac is no working good I always have issues with that !

resp.text: Thank you for reaching out. We are always upfront with our residents about move-out pricing and policies, so we are sorry to see that you are disappointed. The charges you mentioned were for standard touch-up paint, steam, and clean. According to the lease, residents have 14 days to make arrangements for payment or dispute charges before they are sent to collections. We are happy to assist you with this matter at thehaven@trinity-pm.com. We look forward to speaking with you.

name: Jesse Turner
text: Frederick McCray was such a sweetheart...she took the time to help me with the application and also was very straight forward with all the information she presented to me no beating around the bush or hidden things I didn’t know about. I appreciate the excellence

resp.text: Hello Jesse, thank you for taking an interest in our community! We're delighted that Frederick McCray was able to assist you with the application process. We would love to have you in our community!

name: Evelyn Jefferson
text: My experience touring the Haven was great. Frederick  was helpful on the decision making process for myself.

resp.text: Evelyn, thank you for your review. We are happy that your experience touring the community was great. If you have any questions as time continues, please let me know.

name: Cleon Mitchell
text: My wife and I have been living here for the past eleven years.  The professionalism of the staff is unmatched.  The Haven is one of Hoovers best kept secrets!!!!!!!

resp.text: We appreciate your loyalty to the community, Cleon. We have been happy to have you and your wife here for eleven years. Thank you for the kind words about our community. We love having your vote of confidence in the team. Cheers!

name: Lonnie Campbell
text: Throughout the entire move in process The Haven staff has been professional and personable. Anja Sellers has made this an enjoyable experience for my wife and I. Moves can be stressful especially when you have a child on the way. We couldn't be happier with the service. Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We are happy to provide an exceptional community experience.

name: Tawanna Crum
text: It was the smoothest move-in ever thanks to Ms. Frederick for an awesome job she made the process a breeze ..... Thanks

resp.text: Tawanna, we are thrilled to know that your move-in was smooth and easy due to Frederick's help. We appreciate your generous review!

name: Shaneka Richardson
text: When I say I LOOOOVE FREDRICK MCCRAY! She has taking her time and has provided the UPMOST respect in the process. She has provided detail for detail in the process and has patience of gold.

resp.text: Thank you for your upbeat review and a five-star rating. We are thrilled to see your feedback about Fredrick and will be sure to pass it along.

name: Nate Watson
text: Everybody was friendly and courteous. The apartment I toured was clean and well kept and the dumpster area wasn’t overflowing with trash.

resp.text: Thank you for the positive review, Nate! It is always gratifying to hear that our team is doing a good job making our guests and residents alike feel at home in our community. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

name: Shaniqua Eve
text: This place is EVERYTHING. The senior leasing agent Fredrick is awesome. Soon as I walked in, the place already feels like home.

resp.text: Shaniqua, we are delighted that you were able to immediately feel at home in our community. Thank you for your recognition of Fredrick's awesome service and for taking the time to share your experience.

name: Emily Tamburelli
text: Me and my boyfriend move into Haven apartments in December and we couldn’t be more excited!! Thank you Mrs Fredrick for answering all of my questions and concerns! Can’t wait to move in

resp.text: Emily, it's great to read how excited you are to move in. Thank you for highlighting the top customer service provided by Mrs. Fredrick. We can't wait to welcome you to our beautiful, comfortable community.

name: Chancelor McDaniel
text: great service and great staff can’t wait to move in shout-out to Frederick McCray

resp.text: Chancelor, how good it is to hear that your experience in our community has been great! We're so happy Frederick has made things a little easier for you. Thank you for sharing the positivity with us.

name: Sirilo Baza
text: After experiencing one year at haven apartments I’m highly disappointed.  I lived here from Jan 2020 to Jan 2021. When I moved in, it found dried dog poop left in the bedroom closet, as well as the previous owners dishes in the dishwasher. I found this after the leasing agent Fredrick, told me the apartment would be “deep cleaned” before moving in. She also said that the countertops would be replaced, which never happened. Maintenance techs come into your apartment whenever, even if they have told you a certain date and time. When it was time for me to move out, I made sure to clean and vacuum. It was as clean as it was when I initially moved in, but because it wasn’t spotless we are being charged enough to keep my security deposit and more. I would not recommend Haven apartments, just for the simple fact of not having good quality control.

resp.text: Sirilo, we are thrilled that your visit to our community was a great experience! It's wonderful to hear that you were impressed by the top-notch service from Frederick and our lovely amenities. Thank you for the review, and we are so pleased to welcome you as a resident soon.

name: Cyrus Patel
text: Lived here for a little over a year. It’s fine.

resp.text: Thank you, Cyrus, for your excellent rating. If there is anything we may do to enhance your experience, please don't hesitate to let us know! And we're sorry for not responding to this review earlier - this review platform had suspended publishing reviews due to the COVID-19 situation, and we are only now seeing your feedback.

name: Saria Dickinson
text: The unit is beautiful, neighbors are nice. The Hoover school system is one of the best school systems in the area. The playground that is directly across from our building is lovely. The cleaning crew needs to do their job thoroughly. On move in day, the carpets should not make my socks black after 15 minutes nor should my allergies/sinuses be going off like crazy after the same period of time. After a week of constant cleaning, the carpet is clean and my sinuses/allergies did not get set off. I’m extremely thankful for the air conditioning and the heating system, it works perfectly. My family and I can even enjoy a nice fire in the living room when it’s quite time as we read stories to our children before they go to bed. Nothing is more peaceful than that.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving this detailed feedback about your experience with us. Please let us know if there is anything else we can do to provide you with an exceptional community experience.

name: Zatie
text:
Upon arriving to these beautiful apartments, my friend and I walked to the leasing office and the sign said please come in but the door was locked and no one was in there. I called the number and I was directed the call center and made an appointment. My friend and I sat outside for 45 minutes before someone came back. When Fredricka returned to the office, she was off the rip rude. I was washing my hands at the sink and I guess that is frowned upon at the Haven apartment complex.
When my friend was explaining the purpose of her visit, Ms. Fredricka was not comprehending anything she was saying. Before viewing the apartments, I gave a suggestion to Ms. Fredricka that she should turn the sign around so people can know she is not in the office at the moment. She explained to me that she didn’t turn it around because she was just getting her lunch. Although she was just getting food and not handling business pertaining to the apartments, she should have still turned the sign around so others can know that she is not in the office.
We went and viewed the renovated version of the Madison and it was beautiful. One thing that I might add is that the description of the “patio” should be worded and explained as a balcony because that’s exactly what it is. The bedrooms in this particular unit is not big enough for the price of rent.  Upon our return to the office to view the other unit, there were people standing outside because once again, the sign was not turned around to inform them that she was on a tour. We went to view the classic version of the Hamilton and how Ms. Fredricka explained this unit is not how I envisioned it. This apartment has cream counter tops and appliances and it is not appealing to the eye at all. The cream appliances and grey cabinets make the apartment look real country. The fridge had rust on the side and I asked Ms. Fredricka if they would replace or paint over this rust stain on the refrigerator should my friend move into this unit. Maybe she did not see nor comprehend what I was saying because she said that this apartment comes with cream countertops and appliances. That’s clearly not what I was asking her. I asked the question again and she seemed perplexed as if I was asking if she personally would replace the refrigerator. When she finally comprehended what I was saying, she explained that no one has ever asked that question but she would have to check into that and see. This whole experience, completely turned my friend and I off from ever thinking about renting apartments from here. I gave it two stars because the first unit we viewed and the property itself is very beautiful. If you can deal with this lady’s attitude then I 10/10 recommend this apartment complex.

resp.text: We're delighted to know that you liked the first home you toured as well as the community in general. We assure you that if your friend had any concerns about her home, we would address them to ensure her satisfaction, and we're sorry if you left with any other impression. If you have any further questions, we invite either of you to contact us at thehaven@trinity-pm.com. Thank you.

name: Jamaal King
text: Great location. Yet, the complex doesn't seem to have a high moral ground when it comes to business. My family and I just moved out of this place and I am glad we aren't giving them a penny more. We left the apartment expecting a few charges for cosmetic cleaning, but the bill they tried to issue us in the end, with no hint of such charges to be expected during the walk through was quite surprising, especially the " wear and tear" charge for the carpet for $600 dollars, when not so much than a stain can be found in the entirety of the carpet.Begs to wonder, what is the point of the walk through at the end, if they are going to charge you anything they want once you are gone. It is quite ridiculous and I will never recommend such a place to anyone. Rent at your own risk, but take heed to those that have taken on that risk already.

resp.text: Hello Mr. King,  We appreciate your feedback. During the move-out process, we conducted a visual inspection of the apartment and its condition. At that time, we discussed both a heavy apartment and carpet cleaning. While attempting to professionally steam clean, it was determined that we could not salvage the carpet due to excessive soiling/staining and matting. The damages were beyond normal wear and tear and the charges are reflected accordingly. Please contact the leasing office to further discuss charges and review photos taken during our walk-through.

name: Vivian Hood
text: JUNE 2016: The location near the Galleria Mall is exceptional because every store, pharmacy, restaurant, movie theater and freeway acces is less than 10 minutes away. The three bedrooms are large with bay windows in the living room.  I moved here in 2014 and have never seen any bugs or pests, but make sure valet trash is properly handled and not left out all the time. I have very clean neighbors. The pool area is well maintained and overlooks the lake. Tonya and Cindy in the office are accommodating, polite and always helpful. Maintenance is phenomenal. They respond immediately to both big and small issues. One of them told me he has been here about 20 years.  I chose this property because Hoover City Schools is one of the best school districts in the entire state and because I do not want to spend my weekends in the yard making home repairs.  Changes in ownership are always a pain and the water problems are aggravating but they always try to make things right.  As long as they keep the staff and crew, we will stay.

name: Don Honaker
text: Don't waste your time going here.  The place does not even rate one star.  Went to see what was available.  Apt mgr told me how busy she was, handed me a rate sheet, and asked if I had any more questions.  Very sorry I bothered you.  Certainly will not bother you again!

resp.text: We appreciate you taking the time to share this feedback with us. The team at The Haven Apartment Homes takes our reviews very seriously. We would like to have a better understanding of your experience. Please reach out to us at (205) 847-5933 at your earliest convenience and we will do our best to resolve this with you.

name: Malcolm Jordan
text: Before you apply for an apartment look at the ratings. I failed to do so and consequently had to suffer the consequences. I wish there was a no star rating on this review or a negative star rating. Management sucks and is very unprofessional. I was not informed that I wouldn't receive my Admin & holding fee back if I didn't decide to go thru with the apartment process. I didn't find this information out until I called the apartment complex explaining to them I wouldn't need the apartment anymore. The leasing manager is rude and very sarcastic. Take my advice DON'T do business with these people!

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. We were happy to communicate with you and confirm that you did receive our property facts sheet that outlines our application policies and non-refundable fees. Our team members are trained to confirm these policies verbally in order to ensure that we maintain transparency throughout the entire leasing process. Please let us know if we may be of further assistance.

name: Ameer Kotadia
text: Very nice community to live in.moved here in august.move in process was very smooth and friendly.leasing office staff very friendly.definitely recommend.

resp.text: Ameer, it's great to see your wholehearted recommendation of our friendly, well-maintained community. Thanks for letting us know that your move-in was a smooth one. We hope you keep feeling right at home.

name: Kyler Dunning
text: Frederick McCray is amazing!! She was so helpful and  nice

resp.text: Kyler, thank you for sharing your 5-star review! We are thrilled to hear that Frederick provided a helpful and positive experience.

name: Kirsten Myette
text: Currently living here and the water has been going out on and off (quite consistently, almost every week) for the past 4 months. They keep claiming to have fixed it, they even had Alabama Water Works out here 4 days ago. The Haven left a nice note on the door stating it was THEIR problem to fix and that they had done so. Me thinks not!!! Never had a problem when this place was Waterford Landing.

name: Juliet Campbell
text: Fradarick mccray helped us so much and she was so nice!

resp.text: Juliet, we are delighted to hear of your positive experience. We will be sure to let Fradarick know how pleased you are with her friendly service!

name: Crystal Sherer
text: If you are looking at this complex, please ask for "Lauren". She has helped with the process from start to end. I am extremely happy with the service she has provided. I am relocating from Georgia. Thank You Lauren Planz.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback. We strive to provide excellent service here at The Haven Apartment Homes.

name: Lynette Franks
text: I have been here since 2016. With wonderful customer service from previous management. Now the new property management, tells us we are no longer with AUM  water company. Now they tell us our water bill will show up on our ledger. That's what we will pay. It's my right to see my water bill, especially if I'm paying for it. Not be told they are unable to email me a copy. I really don't think they stopped using AUM Real Pages utility management.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We hope you continue to enjoy calling our community home.

name: Dionne Trannon
text: I am editing this post and adding a response for the owner since there is no way to add a response their your post below. You received this one star from me due to the parking and towing issue. I have come to you already several times and this issue was not resolved properly at all. I lost $335 that has yet to be reimbursed to me. You can't penalize residents when there is limited parking. Then, tow the car without any kind of notice. You don't do your residents that way. You said you wanted to improve my experience, well I'm here if you want to reach out to me and do the right thing.
