resp.text: Thank you for leaving feedback. Please reach out to us at (205) 988-9266 so we may identify ways to improve your experience.

name: Kartikeya Sharma
text: I am temporarily relocating from Florida to birmingham, and the Haven administration (Lauren and Michael) have been absolutely supporting me to ease my move in through constant communication over phone and email. I really look forward to staying in this community during this summer.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We are happy to be of service!

name: Howard Brown
text: Definently one of the best apartment complexes around

resp.text: Howard, we can't thank you enough for your awesome review of our community! We're delighted to be known as one of the best!

name: Lyn Franks
text: I love living here. It’s quiet n when spring hits, it’s awesone to have windows up n b able to hear the kids playing such a joy. The office staff Ashley, Michael, n Ray and all the rest are so awesome.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We are happy to be of service.

name: Ashley Williams
text: Moving made easy and simple!!! Thanks to Dawn. if you need a nice place to live and no hassle doing it, this is the place to be!!! Thanks Dawn Pope!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback. We strive to provide excellent service here at The Haven Apartment Homes.

name: E. Y. Rodgers
text:
I actually live at a condo property nearby and my concerns would be the caliber of people that reside at your property. On a daily basis, I see persons riding from property, speeding and throwing trash out of their car windows. Personally, I would like to know your screening process and criteria for residency at your complex. I can only assume that anyone that would do such things to lower the standards of the community, does not and did not have favorable landlord history.

Please screen your prospects for current and previous landlord history, maybe even criminal. Your current residents (I am sure, not all) are giving your complex a bad reputation in the community.

resp.text: Thank you for bringing these concerns to our attention. Our records do not reflect any reports that bear resemblance to the concerns you have presented here. However, we are happy to look further into these concerns as we strive to maintain a comfortable and peaceful environment. Our screening process is used by many reputable management companies and is an industry standard. Please let us know if we may assist you further.

name: Anderson Watts
text:
Tons of problems... for example, we requested a completely new AC unit in October of 2017, all they did was put in more fre-on in our old unit instead and the problem continued for the next next summer and is still an issue now. It was a constant 75-85 degrees.
My car got towed last summer and they chose to use a towing company in TARRANT.... so we were out $360 just to get my car and this all happened 2 days before rent was due.
My moving out process was an absolute nightmare and the property managers communication skills and are beyond frustrating and unprofessional. It’s too bad that management is awful because this is a beautiful and safe complex, but it’s just not worth it.

resp.text: Thank you for this detailed feedback about your experience with us. We are sorry to read that your experience has not been as you expected. Our team strives to not only meet but exceed expectations and provide a great experience for all our residents and guests. We would welcome the opportunity to discuss your concerns directly with you. Please reach out to the management team at thehaven@trinity-pm.com or call us at (205) 988-9266 at your earliest convenience to discuss any previous service requests that were not satisfactory. We look forward to speaking with you soon!

name: Savannah Stamps
text: I have lived here since February and all I can say is wow. My air has been working on and off since February.....it's the end of April. The maintenance man would come out and say that there was nothing wrong with my air conditioning when it was 85 degrees in my apartment. I called the emergency maintenance request and they said that they would send someone within 2 hours...no one ever came.  I live on the 3rd floor and the sun sets in my apartment. My air stopped working 2 weeks ago and I have been without A/C for the past couple of weeks. Lisa finally told me that they would replace my A/C. I received a call a couple of days ago stating that they would fix my A/C the next day. I never received a call or any sort of notification stating that they were going to fix my air. I called 6 times that day and no one answered the phone, so I went up to the office and Lisa was sitting right by the phone. Every time I call no one answers, I have to physically go up to the office and speak to someone and all they have are excuses as to why they won't fix my air. It is miserably hot in my apartment. I have called Trinity's customer service and left several messages starting 3 weeks ago...no answer. I e-mailed feedback...no answer. I e-mailed the regional Manager Danielle Wilcox...no answer. I am sure that I will receive an automated post on here stating how sorry they are and for me to contact customer service or feedback. Well...I've tried that, I can't get in touch with anybody. The communication is non-existent. Maybe I shouldn't pay my rent...that way someone would have to talk to me. No wonder their reviews are awful online, reflects the company. Please take it from me and the other reviews, do NOT live here. The air conditioning does not work and they are not on top of maintenance. I could continue on how much of a joke that this apartment complex and property management is.

resp.text: We appreciate you taking the time to share this feedback with us. The team at The Haven Apartment Homes takes our reviews very seriously. Please reach out to our Cares Team at feedback@trinity-pm.com so we may address your concerns with our upper management team.

name: tiff lee
text: For a single mother this was my safe haven: I was a resident for about 3 years and I must say although all places have flaws this place by far well exceeds where I have made the most horrible mistake to move to. This complex really gave me the true meaning of exceptional living. They catered to my household needs and gave my child a safe haven while I battled traffic to get her. They made sure she was safe, gave her snacks, and also taught her things about money, technology, fashion, etc My child was very fun of them and I felt very lucky and I assure you since I moved NOTHING is the same.  I must say that the mere fact that they cared enough to watch after my daughter kept me there and I am so grateful. Now there were some flaws but they were always good about getting them fixed, the only recommendation I would make would be to add more light in some places for people who come home late. I truly miss this place and if I could and I am thinking about it I will be back. THIS PLACE IS THE TRUE DEFINITION OF A HAVEN!!!!!!!!!

name: Nina C
text:
I honestly enjoy living here. It's going on my 3rd year here at Haven Apartments. And not only am I happy and satisfied with the community. I am please and comfortable with the staff here! I'm a hugh people person so when I tell you they ALWAYS (no matter if they are hard at work ) manage to look up and waive! Some even know my name by heart. That means a lot. I've also been in this industry before out of state, so let me just say I do not hesitate recommending HAVEN APARTMENT COMMUNITY IN HOOVER, AL!!!! #havenapartment #awesomestaff #youshouldlive
SHOUT OUT TO: Michael, Raymond, Bilal, Grace, & Dawn! Keep up the Great Job!

resp.text: Thank you for sharing these comments. We hope that we continue to meet your expectations.

name: Esperware Interactive
text: Renter beware, we received notice the complex was sold a couple of weeks ago. They then stated inspections would be performed and a note left when completed. Well, that time has passed and no note. When we signed our lease we chose that no one could enter without us present unless it was an emergency of course. They pay no mind to that and stated "we can only take that into consideration but can't always abide by it". Way to break a contract. When our lease is up we are gone because with all the "improvements" they say they will be making, you can expect rent to go up exponentially.

name: Sarah
text:
Left my belongings in my (locked) sisters apartment for a day to help her move her things to Florida and someone working at the apartment complex entered the apartment before the move out date, stole my backpack of everything I owned and other misc. things and then relocked the doors. Apartment complex management did nothing to help. Just shrugged it off.

Edit: And no, no one else had keys and we did not leave the doors unlocked. It was someone working here. Who locks the doors after robbing a place?

resp.text: Thank you for bringing these concerns to our attention. We recommend that you file a police report for your missing items. Our team does not enter apartment homes unless a maintenance request is submitted or keys have been turned in for an apartment. We require permission to enter and every service request is documented in our system. If you have any additional information, please reach out to us directly and we will be happy to assist you.

name: Aj Jonesy
text: I was rushed there the whole experience. The apartment wasn't clean on the day I received keys. Least than a month in and cabinets are undone, the closet want close the the furnace. It's a scary looking maintenance man, he looks like a damn thug. They say I owe money, due to a guy that they hired and fired. Now my family and I have to suffer due to the incompetence of the Havens employee's. I wish I had of listen to the reviews, but I figured the place was to nice for some of the things to be true. They have one person handling all the duties of the office. I'm outside as I text waiting for some service. The Havens owner needs his or her ass BEAT for hiring this confused MESS! Then they blatantly steal money for the water bill and say you owe a certain amount that they can't even prove. The water bill is one big bill from every tenant. If you are not there often, who cares you still owe. I wasn't told about the water until, I was signing the least and it still wasn't explained for me to understand how someone can just make up a figure out of no where. They wouldn't even get one star if I had a choice. I'm pissed!

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We are happy to share that we have made updates to our community team and we have a new Community Manager starting next week to help better address the needs of our residents. Please contact us at 205-988-9266 and we will happily address your concerns. We look forward to enhancing your living experience with us.

name: Nathan Jordan
text:
I lived here for 18 months did everything I was asked to do and gave a 30 day notice at my lease end asked if there was anything else I needed to do before I moved and was told no. I gave a forwarding address for my deposit to be returned and it was not so i assumed no big deal it was $350, even though I paid someone to clean the apartment before I left.  I got a call 3 months later from a collection agency and was told that I was past due by 713.65 for clean up and damages. I was very upset and was told that if I did not make arrangements with them  it would be reported to my credit. I asked why i had not been contacted before and told them that i left the apartment in as good of condition as it was when I moved in.  They told me since I did not schedule a move out inspection and have it in writing that i would have to pay it even if i disputed it they would be filling it on my credit that day.

All I can figure is that the remodeling they are doing is being financed by people moving out. I would look everywhere else first.

name: Sarah
text:
If you like the below, then please, do sign a lease here:
-Being charged exorbitant water/sewer bills (300% higher than normal) and being expected to believe that this is due to normal "cost of living increases" and legal changes in utility billing
-Having your lease breached by the complex by not being provided a reasonable living standard in your apartment or community
-Not having anywhere to park after dark and having to walk hundreds of feet through a poorly lit parking lot with questionable youths loitering (most of whom don't even live there), THEN having the threat of your car being towed when you have to MAKE a spot because there are none left
-Mold that they deny, then force you to clean up and/or just paint over themselves
-Roaches
-Cabinets that are LITERALLY falling apart due to rotting and/or water damage
-Moving in to carpets that were "cleaned" but actually smell like throw up that you and your 60 year old mother have to spot clean on your hands and knees.
-Fixing 75% of the issues you find when you move in because you either a. don't want to wait months for them to fix it and/or b. actually want it fixed correctly
-Incessant water leaks, A/C, toilet, you name it.  Count on having to call in to maintenance once a month, then wait 2 weeks for it to get fixed, then for it to start leaking again another few weeks later.
-Not being able to get a truthful answer out of the local or corporate property management teams about anything, including their malicious business practices that take advantage of many lower-middle class families that can barely make ends meet after the drastic utility increases.

name: rb S
text: DO YOURSELF A FAVOR AND AVOID THIS SLUM-LORD OWNED PROPERTY.. Trinity has a horrible rating with the BBB and many current residents are speaking out. $170+ water bills as well as fictitious and frivolous charges added into rent. This was a decent affordable place. Thanks for turning it into a nightmare. By the way, puke green and charcoal grey are they worst two colors you could pick. Should have started working on the real issues like main breaks and mold instead of painting. Either way it goes, pink or gold, a turd is still a turd. Repair the 30 year old A/C's, do something for the long time residents instead of pricing us out of homes. And quit saying you are pet friendly because you are not. Pet rent on something considered property in Alabama? And where did you find that troll Lucretia? She won't last long. This is Hoover but this is still the south. You are messing with people's happiness and homes. I hope you guys sleep well at night knowing some residents and their children can't even afford groceries after your exorbitant rent hikes, hiked up water bills and even more outrageous move out fees.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We have repaired three leaks and adjustments will be made to next month’s bill so we may address the billing discrepancies. We have addressed these concerns as promptly as possible and thank all residents for their patience.

name: Sarah Durrani
text: This place has so many names that it's ridiculous! Waterford Landing, Waterford at Chace lake, The Peninsula and now "The Haven". I imagine it is to try to escape the horrible ratings it gets. Please let that be a BIG red flag to not rent here among the other reasons that I'm about to give you. The ownership of this place changes constantly and never for the better. Our current owners have added monthly pet rent and in addition to paying a security deposit you will be charged for every item in your apartment that is not cleaned to their standards AND you will be charged for replacement carpet and to repaint the apartment even if you have lived here for years!  Any decent apartment complex does not charge for normal wear and tear but this place is run by money hungry vultures so BEWARE!  Bugs (especially mosquitos)  are also a HUGE problem here because of the lake. Children play/scream unsupervised in the parking lots and roadways. Parking is terrible. There is no assigned parking so if your neighbor has friends over you may have a very long walk back to your apartment with your arm full of groceries. Maintenance staff are rude and incompetent. This place SUCKS no matter what they change the name to. Don't let a fresh coat of paint fill you. This place is a dump and a money pit!. I lived here for several years, recently moved out and wanted to warn prospective tenets so they don't get fooled. Read ALL the reviews and ALL the fine print.

name: ashantey green
text: Whatever you do! Take it from me! Do not move here! They will not contact you back. They screen phone calls. I've been waiting for 3 weeks for then to research and issue I have with the water bill. Tonight I go to pay the water bill (even after They didn't call back) and to my surprise the bill is higher on the website. I've called several times. I've emailed. I've covered the charges they requested! If apartments want quality tenants than they must have quality workers. In the am I'll start my rant with the bbb and upward to the necessary powers. It is absolutely pitiful for apartments to handle tenants in such a fashion when you attempt to do right by them. They are so quick to slap late fees on accounts but aren't quick in handling your concerns. Take it from me save your pennies! Oh and they screen phone calls.

resp.text: We are disappointed to hear that your stay with us has not been to your satisfaction. If you have any additional comments or suggestions of how we may improve your experience with us, please email our Cares Team at feedback@trinity-pm.com.

name: Unknow Unknown
text: Been living here for about 2 months. Only complaint I have is my apartment smelling like smoke at all times which is coming through the vents from another apartment. It's not good because my child has asthma very badly. So far, no other complaints as of now.

resp.text: Thank you for bringing this concern to our attention. Please contact us at 205-988-9266 so we may learn which apartment you reside in and properly address your concerns. We are here to be of service.

name: Mike Jones
text: I’m not sure what’s going on with this complex but things are not looking good as of late. The false advertisement of the weight room that’s been under construction since I moved is the start, but most recently is with my utility bill. I’ve been living here for 2 years and my bill has doubled, almost tripled in just one month. After reaching out to the new management about this issue, they told me there was NOTHING they can do and the cost is the cost. They couldn’t give me any explanation as to why the utility bill has changed other than saying each apartment has to pay a share of the entire complex’s usage. It was my understanding in the lease I signed that I was responsible for the water that “I” used. I was told to reach out to American Utility Management (AUM) for further assistance. After doing so, AUM said that it seems like there has been a substantial amount of water being used throughout the complex lately, which makes sense due to the major sewage and water leakage issues and construction that’s been occurring for the past month or so, which adds to the water/sewage usage. Sounds like they’re overcharging us so they can cover the cost of the sewage issues that we don’t have anything to do with. There are other things that concern me as well but I’ll just say that there has to be a better way to handle these situations. I WOULDN’T RECOMMEND THIS PLACE TO ANYONE. I’ve had enough, looking forward to moving out in October!

name: Ashely Artis
text: TERRIBLE MANAGEMENT! The only good thing about this complex is the fact that maintenance is good. One of the maintenance guys Bilal hurt his back really bad and still came back 3 times to make sure my a/c was working. I still wouldnt recommend them because management cares nothing about your concerns and makes no efforts to pretend to. They're only nice until you sign the lease. I DIDNT WANT TO GIVE THEM ONE STAR BUT I HAD TO. P.S. There have been a lot of break ins, this is the hood of Hoover

name: Liana Manroh
text: Low class

resp.text: Liana, we are saddened to see your low rating. We strive to provide a place our residents are proud to call home. At your convenience, please email thehaven@trinity-pm.com so we may learn more about your experience in our community.

name: Justin Chandler
text: The best thing about this complex is the location. It's near everything you need. Other than that it is average/below average. Management is very unresponsive, some of the units are older and in need of updating, maintenance is lacking, and the grounds aren't the best.

resp.text: Thank you for your constructive feedback. If you have any outstanding maintenance requests or see a portion of the community that can benefit from additional attention, please contact us at 205-988-9266. We are here to be of service.

name: William Davis
text: I stayed here for two years. Worst apartment experience ever. The Ac never works, they did repaint the complex but turd green and gray isn't that quite pleasant to look at, the front office is no help at all, EVER! I've never been late on rent and my price increases tremendously with ever renewal. The absolute worst apartment experience ever I wouldn't recommend to even my worst enemy. Rippppp offffff

resp.text: We are disappointed to hear that your stay with us was not to your satisfaction. We strive to address maintenance concerns in a timely manner and make improvements throughout the community that enhance the overall resident experience. We wish you the best of luck in your search for the ideal home.

name: dude man
text: I would give 0 stars if I could. This is THE WORST complex ever to live in. I am so glad I moved from that cesspool.Please please pleaseeeee stay away from these crooks. Lisa in the office is an incompetent, uneducated bimbo that doesn't know her mouth from her anus. She talks to the people in the office like they're little peasants beneath her. I can't believe they put up with her. I understand people need their jobs, but good Lord!! She always smell like Marlboro Reds and Newports. The Haven is always taking advantage of the Hispanic tenants and other poor people out there. My sister in law had cameras inside her apartment when the workers came inside after she pissed Lisa off one day(can't say much about this case). Nothing ever works out there. Lucretia was like an angel compared to that brainless Lisa. Wonder why Lucritia was fired. Hmm.Kristin wasn't much better but she was more approachable than CruellaLisa Deville. Lisa should be blackballed from any type of jobs that deal with the public.These people should not even be allowed to do business in Hoover. Several tenants have gotten together for a class action lawsuit against these crooks. Boycott the haven!!!! And boycott Trinity Property Consultants.

name: Alexis Mahaffey
text: It's honestly a waste of money! The apartments are old.. Most apartment complexes when they do upgrades  usually upgrade every apartment even  in the ones that people live in. So anyways they done upgrades and you can get it upgrading your apartment unless you pay like three or $400 extra month there's never no where to park here it's really ghetto they don't keep the place clean up there's trash everywhere I hate it here

name: Jacob Chesser
text: My unit has been without an air conditioner for over 3 weeks now.

name: Myra Elaine Watson
text: Worst place to live.  AWFUL managment....very rude and not helpful at all.

resp.text: We appreciate you taking the time to share this feedback with us. The team at The Haven Apartment Homes takes our reviews very seriously. Please call our Community Manager directly at (205) 988-9266 to discuss ways in which we may enhance your experience with us. We look forward to hearing from you soon.

name: Tiara Walker
text: I just didn't like it they never come to fix anything they have spider webs everywhere outside the rent is always going up the amount your paying for rent here you should just get a house

name: Quinton Price
text: Man the staff are horrible they don't tell you everything when you move In he apartments are ok but we having a pests problem right outside our apartment but back to the staff first when we moved in they said that we won't have to pay anything to move on then turn around we have to pay a 100 deposit fee next the bills the rent 855 so I'm thinking utility's are included which they are not and they don't tell you they billed us for a bill of 680 dollars for the electric which if I pay 755 on my rent u give me a notice saying I owe you a hundred dollars but you can't give me a notice saying u been paying my electric bill like the staff are idiots I'm just waiting on my lease to be up so I can get the hell away from here

name: Giselle Carney
text: Good

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback. We strive to provide excellent service here at The Haven Apartment Homes.

name: corey leventis
text: Easy move in process. Friendly management. I had to change my move in date twice due to some unexpected stops driving cross country and this was no problem. So far community is quiet and I love it .

resp.text:
Dear corey,
Thank you for your positive feedback! Our goal is to continue to provide a 5 star experience. We appreciate you and your business.
Sherry Burger-Lee, burgerlee@hpilancasterplace.com

name: Diana Kennamer
text: I have been a tenant here for four years and I don't have a negative thing to say.  It is very quiet, clean and very safe.  The office staff is always very helpful, they make your home very pleasant.  Maintenance keeps everything working in a safe and efficient manner.  I consider Lancaster Place my home and my family.  You won't regret living here. It is pleasant every day.  The apartments are very spacious and well laid out.  All of the apartments have a private outdoor space.  There is a pool here, tennis court, fitness center, laundry facility, valet trash pick up, and a safe place if you like to take a daily walk.  I highly recommend making Lancaster your home.  You won't regret it.

resp.text: Diana, thank you so much for the kind words about Lancaster Place property, maintenance and office staff.  We are all one family even though we may not know everyone.  Please let us know if you should need anything.  And again thank you for your 5-star review.

name: Viper Venom
text: Very friendly staff, flexible appointment scheduling for complex move-in plans, warm/welcoming community & easy online application process.  Would recommend to anyone.

resp.text:
Hey Viper! Thank you for your 5 star review. We appreciate you and your business.
Sherry Burger-Lee, Community Manager

name: Samantha Dennis
text: I am currently on my 2nd year lease. I absolutely love the apartment complex and amenities. What really has impressed me, was the compassion Lancaster has had during the pandemic. That is very rare to find. I plan to stay a resident here until I am ready to purchase a home.

name: Vanessa Bartley
text: All of the ladies I've interacted with in the office are very friendly! We've had a few issues here and there(our heater went out; turned out to be a fuse. And then our water heater started having issues) but the maintenance guys are always quick to come look at and fix anything you tell them about. They are friendly as well. These are the nicest apartments I've ever lived in!

name: Alecia Long
text: Overall strict rules but I understand also that without them you want have a nice place to stay in. Can also use some up to date in kitchen and bathroom.Other then that had a awesome living here.

name: Roger Shugart
text: Management is outstanding and the response for maintenance issues is exceptional, but cutting the budget for pine straw in the flower beds prevents this amazing complex from looking like a 5 star property.

name: Audie Edwards Jr
text: Gone down hill after new owners wooden fence that blow down in storm has not been repaired in mouths grass on bank has not been cut all year and is grow up making a perfect place for rodents and if you are older you need to think twice because if you need anything taken care of in your apartment you can’t call the office you have to go on line and put in a work order they want your rent money but after that taking care of the tenant it secondary

name: AJ
text: I’ve viewed their one bedrooms and I’m in love with the layout! But their prices are waaaay too high especially with nothing included and no updated appliances. I would really love to live there so hopefully the prices will go down in the fall.

name: Remedy Chiks
text: The one bedroom units are nice and spacious, they have easy access to I-65 but for the area, they’re pricey. For the calera area the price should be under $800, or at least have utilities or something included. Apartments in the alabaster are the same price but have internet/cable included and are surrounded by plenty of shopping choices so they’re worth the price.

name: Colby Key
text: The apartments are ok to live in but maintenance is horrible. Don’t expect any help unless they are at the property. I’ve had light switch issues In my kitchen for months and they have still yet to fix the problem because, “it was like that when we moved in”. It wasn’t like that when we moved in because I could flip the switch and it would work. Even if it was like that when I moved in it’s not functioning correctly and they should’ve fixed it. Now my other switch in the kitchen doesn’t work. Can’t turn the lights off without flipping the breaker or taking the bulbs out. Great service maintenance! Like always I’ll fix the problem myself. I’ll keep paying you to take it easy.

name: Cindy Werner
text: I have lived here since April of last year and have LOVED it!! I have never waited more than a couple of days for maintenance (usually come the day  I make the complaint) and they are incredibly nice.  Also, the office staff has been wonderful as well.  I honestly didn't have the highest of hopes when we moved here, but it has truly exceeded my expectations.  I have recommended them to friends as well.  The grounds are pretty. They are pet friendly.. just a wonderful place to call home.

name: Amy Jackey
text:
Nothing but good to say! It's quiet. Maintenance is beyond fast and easy. You set the request through the app for the complex and short time later you get a message that it's done. The office staff is very friendly but professional.

I have recommended this place to SO many.

The grounds are kept very nicely, pool is beautiful, workout room and laundry facilities are clean.

My only negative is my counters in bathroom and kitchen are very outdated and kitchen floor needs replacing. Otherwise it's great in the apt.

Strongly recommend. I've been here for 5 months and this is my HOME.

name: Stink Palm
text: This is a great place to live. I have lived for here 4 years now.Never had any problems, it’s quite clean and you can actually use all the facilities they offer. Nice pool, great staff, if I ever had any thing that needed to be fixed I called the office and they had it fixed very prompt.its also a great place for kids nice Park.its near Walmart and Publix.the staff here are great and very helpful.the apartment are nice clean fresh paint and new carpet when moved in and super clean. They also care about the grounds and they are very respectful about your needs.give them a chance u won’t regret it.

resp.text:
We appreciate your time in reviewing our community,Stink.  The staff and I are happy that
you’ve enjoyed your stay here at Lancaster Place.  We’ve enjoyed having you as
a resident! Your kind note has really made our day and we promise to continue
to offer the highest standards of apartment features and community amenities.
Feel free to contact us at (205) 476-0050 if there is anything at all we can help with.

name: Alabama Crappie Adventures
text: We are having mice in our apartment. Someone please contact me asap! Apartment 727. We don't know if they are coming from another apartment or a hole under the sink, but this needs to be addressed. This is day 3 having mice running through the apartment. Glue Traps are not working. We need maintenance to stuff the holes with some wool or something please. Thanks, Brian

name: Andre Lacey
text: I've been living there for a month now and my experience with the staff was and has been great so far. I enjoy my new apartment, and all of its amenities.

name: j milwood
text: Decent looking apartments and the management is pretty good.way to many ADDITIONAL fees to add to your bill at the end of the month to make your bill well above $1100. Also there is no o red light at the front entrance of a very busy and fast moving highway at this complex and someone will eventually get badly hurt if they haven't already.

name: Sulmorko Nightstorm
text: Great place. Staff is wonderful. The maintenance staff is on point. Would totally recommend living here. We will probably be here for years!

name: Jamye Morris
text: Great place to live.  Brandon in the office is awesome!  He is always so friendly and helpful.

name: adrienne williams
text: So much to say where do I start. You pay for trash service and they barely pick up your trash. Next you pay for pest control but bugs are all over the place. Then when you request maintenance they come when ever they feel like it no rush to help. The apartment above me flooded into my laundry room causing leakage into my circuit breaker. And to fix that they dried it out with a fan. Mold has started to grow in the laundry room I told them and as usual nothing was done. I had 2 floods and now my apartment smells like sweaty gym shoes. The worst part is the college boys that moved in. The college boys are loud, rude, inappropriate with 13 year old girls, they never go to bed keep up working people. When we asked to break the lease for all these reasons we were told we would have to pay. My daughter bike was recently stolen right off our patio I walked around the complex and there it was laying in someone else's yard. You pay all this money to be uncomfortable and forced to stay because they make it impossible to afford to move. I wouldn't advise any hard working family to live here. Living here is like a  fraternity house. Worst place I've ever lived. Oh and let me not forget to mention they barely answer the phone. You have to go to the office and they are just sitting there so why wasn't the phone being answered.

name: Aquarius X2
text: My brother's apartment on ground floor was flooded from 3rd floor at 3:30 am on September 13 Tuesday. He and I were both promised maintenance and cleaning that day. Here we are September 14 Wednesday 7 am. 27 and a half hour later NOTHING!! No hotel provided! This is not a little flood. Not a single room in his apartment isn't wet!!

name: Chanda Mitchell
text: Seems really crowded, but the pool is nice and I've heard the management is nice. I don't live there though

name: Taylor Woodall
text: Have had nothing but bad experiences, apartment flooded after 2 weeks into moving in, (from 3rd floor all the way my the bottom floor, where I'm at) now 2 months later still have half unfinished walls, they came into to paint the first time unannounced(after requesting numerous times to be notified before coming to paint since I am pregnant) You pay monthly for pest control and then get told that they only spray twice a year, they can spray once a week but you have to request it. Needless to say my apartment is infested with ants, coming out of cracks in the walls, and if I pay every month for a pest service of course I want to apartment sprayed. Office people are rude.

name: TERRY HENLEY
text:
I stayed there in 2015. The only thing I can say  negative about my stay is, I didnt feel safe most ot the time when I left my apartment. Other than that I had a great stay. It is near everything. I played around with the staff and manager who was very to me. I must give the two men, cant remember their names, who kept the apts in good repairs a raise. Thanks for keeping my apartment in good shape. If I had a complaint, never had too wait hours or day for you guys. My hat off to you, because I dont know how the owner or owners expect two person to take care of such a large amount of apartment that you have. If several apartment are flood, refrid out, air cond, out stove dont work, etc How are they to be there on time for all the people. Some people are not willing to wait when things stop working. I suggest you hire more laborer when you are booked up and let some take time off when things are slow.  Dont you care about letting your guest suffer like they do, so they have to write such bad things about. Just hoping you stay in business. The place was in good shape when I was there. Looks like the last year was bad.
Just happen to see your web review and thought I would add my two cents.

name: Rosalyn King
text: This the worst place to stay.  I suffered a really bad experience here, this place is the luxary hood.  They have a group home of college boys staying at the faciliy.  I feel is so unappropriate, for a family environment.  The apartment is infested with bugs.  The manager is so unprofessional and so is the other lady, they run through staff.  Did I mention that the bugs there are horrible.  When pest control is suppose to be spraying they aren't spraying.  DON'T GO HERE.  I REPEAT DON'T GO HERE.................

name: Nathan
text: I wouldn’t quite say luxury, but over all our stay has been fine.

name: Christine Colmenares
text: Amazing apartment complex

name: brittany mitchell
text: Management is awful

resp.text: brittany, please reach out to the Lancaster Place staff at (205) 476-0050 so we can address your concerns directly.  We are sorry we have not met your expectations and we will do our best to remedy that.

name: Christy Hargett
text: Never been there

name: Maddie E.
text:
The property manager Darleen tried to get me and my boyfriend to pay a $500 security deposit one week before we even saw the apartment, saying we would get the deposit back if we decided not to sign the lease after seeing the apartment. We looked over the application we had signed and it said that the security deposit is $250 and that we would have 72 hours to get our deposit back after paying it, which is clearly much less than a week.

Darleen also refused to reply to my email, instead insisting on talking over the phone. She called me 3 days after I sent her an email in which I asked for clarification, and she got an attitude with me for not paying the $500 yet and said we were causing her to lose business because she was turning other potential tenants away for us. She acknowledged my email in that phone call but still explicitly insisted on handling everything verbally. She was also extremely pushy throughout the whole process.

She also acknowledged that my boyfriend and I are first-time renters and "don't know how things work" which leads me to believe she was trying to take advantage of us.

Very concerning. Please be careful with Cedar Creek, especially if you are young and/or a first-time renter.

name: Greg Woullard
text: It was very disappointing

name: Katie Brent
text: I lived in this apartment complex for over a year and a half. The staff was wonderful, very helpful, and understanding. I only had one problem with the other tentants (some with pets would not pick up their dog poop) which I brought to the attention of the manager and she addressed the issue in a timely manner. It was very quite as a whole and I never heard any of the people living around me. This complex was in a safe area of town but still had police patrol. I would for sure live there again, no questions asked, and recommend this property to anyone.

name: Kevin Harris
text: Been here bout 3 months love it

name: BYRDIE Yeah
text:
When we first arrived(last friday) we spoke with the assistant property manager. And she was so nice. She took time out with us, told us all about the complex, pricing (625 for a 1 bedroom 715 for a 2 bedroom etc), how their process goes etc. When left we felt great and was looking forward to becoming a resident.
We originally made arrangements to come and do all of the paperwork on monday but couldn't make it that day due to personal issues. But we called and notified the assistant that we spoke with that we would be in on friday. (Today Nov. 16, 2018 ) well when we gets there on friday(today) the assistant property manager appeared as if she didnt know who we were at first. But as we got closer she recognized us. And offered us to come into her office, have a seat, and began to telling us that the apartment we were looking at last week has been given away to someone else that they felt was more qualified for it than us. And she had this other apartment coming up that was near the woods. And then she began telling us that the rent price would no long be 625 now the price is going to be 725 for a one bedroom. She never says how much more the deposit was going to be. But she informed us that since last week that we spoke with her a new tenant has come and grabbed the other apartment we were looking at, and changes to the rules had been made. Now they want you to meet 3 times the rent to qualify( in which that was something she never meantioned last week) plus she stated that the rent was going up 100 bucks because THE OWNER is wanting to do upgrades.  To the carpet, and the floors, and paint the cabinets, etc. Showed us a sample of what type of carpet it would be, plus the type of new flooring for the kitchen and laundry and bath...I really wasnt impressed with it. She seemed like she was rushing. Trying to hurry us out of there. Unlike the way she acted last week which was very kind, warm. Welcoming, patient, talkative
She then grabbed some income info and calculated that the amount of income would not be enough to qualify to be a resident at their complex. THIS IS SOMETHING SHE ALSO COULD HAVE DONE LAST WEEK WHEN WE WERE HERE RATHER THAN HAVE US COMING BACK ONLY TO BE TOLD A TOTALLY DIFFERENT RENT PRICE ALONG WITH TELLING US THAT WE HAD TO MAKE 3 TIMES THE RENT IN WHICH SHE DID NOT MEANTION THE WEEK BEFORE. She tried giving this little pep talk about how she believes how well blah blah blah. And keep up the good work and blah blah blah. Keep in touch with me and blah blah blah. Come by anytime and blah blah blah. Gave us back our papers and pretty much brushed us out of her office. Last week she got up from her desk and walked us to the door. Today she stayed seated and said nice meeting you all. Smh. Glad she didnt waste our time by doing a credit check and leaving us with an inquiry to lower our score for no reason. At least she spare us that. Good thing we actually own our houses and dont really need an apartment complex or else we would be screwed. We only wanted an apartment because we wanted a fresh start on a different side of town. But if the people here at cedar creek is going to be doing random pop up changes out of the blue like that and we haven't even made it to being a resident then I can only image what it would have been like if we actually did move in. .....thanks for the surprise( we dont qualify because we are short 300 bucks)
Changes, thanks for giving us the info that wasnt given the week before. Thanks for us wasting our time and our gas. I mean had she told us this stuff last week...3 times the rent to qualify, the rent is going to be going up to 725 for a one bedroom in the month of December because the owner decided to make upgrades. Had she been honest from jump we would have just not even wasted our time. And we could have just gone somewhere else. I think it all was a trick to be honest. Hoping to hurry up and get us in then out of the blue pop up with the surprise you now have to pay 725....yes we are a bit angry but at the same time grateful that things didnt go that way.

name: Jacoria Little
text: Cozy apartments and a cozy price... the area is quiet and well kept

name: Robert Harvis
text: It a place I visited sand it's very nice

name: Dontae Lawery
text: Zero points if I could VERY ( UNPROFESSIONAL ) reason being I was in a car accident somebody else had hit me . And upon that I was getting everything taking care of .In the mist of the accident and i did so well afterwards this company that . I had applied once before for a position at  called and I told what had just happened they told me to take care of my situation first and like I mentioned earlier I did . So afterwards they  asked If i would work for the amount offered for servicing two separate properties and to think about it well I didn't accept it . Due to a unresponsive communication of a fair wager . So sometime last week they  called  again and asked if I wanted to accept the job  after we discussed a proper salary . And I said yes for the servicing of two separate properties well after I completed all the necessary paperwork ,the drug test . And also waiting on the manager to get through smoking not one but two cigarettes and receiving a start date of the next day .The manager Rebecca Henson and the company that was so determined for me to work for them. Called thirty minutes before closing and said that she and the company say I am not a right fit although I was before but now I am not now. I wonder why I was so profitable to hire last week and upon today and thirty minutes before closing. Even after my patience with the unprofessionalism they demonstrated all of a sudden I was not the right fit . "Even with the proper certifications in there own WORDS ". Was what I was told after the phone was hung up in my face .  Am I wrong for thinking and saying this was very disrespectful and unprofessional to do not just to any individual . :-!  If not please comment I would like to know why not .

name: Robert Harvis
text: Great place to visit

name: Vernon Hunter
text: Great place

name: La Wright
text: DON'T DO IT!!!!!

name: Bernard Smith
text: I'd live there.

name: Teon Smith
text: I wouldn’t recommend to anyone

name: Kirsten Hollinger
text: I have been staying here for a while and I absolutely hate it. The apartments are spacious but are not full quality. One morning I was in the bathroom and out the corner of my eye I saw something painted over on the wall, I look up to see that it is a baby roach painted over. There has also been cases where hair was painted over on the wall also. It seems like they are  worried about everything but their jobs. The light in my room has never been fixed and I put in a work order sometime last year. Also to mention the windows are not sealed completely there is no reason for gnats to be flying around in my apartment !! 10/10 do not recommend !!

name: Hey Danie
text: Have notified them for the last two weeks that we have been having a leak, and now raw sewage is leaking from my tubs and toilets resulting in all carpeting soaked. I have black mold all over the apartment, and lets not talk about the water backup when my neighbor washes clothes. Maintenance comes when they want. Have filed a complaint with the Health Department for the living environment. DO NOT LIVE HERE!

name: Bridgette Moore
text: I love it here. I moved here around August and as a college student it has been affordable and comfortable. Maintenance can sometimes delay but they've come at a decent time. And I love the staff that I deal with. I haven't really had any bug problems either after maintenance came and sprayed once when I first moved in.

name: Bashan Gumm
text: Haven’t lived here in years but my friend does and seems to have the same troubles I’ve had such as bugs even with pest control, water being turned off randomly, rent money not being accounted for or random fees, maintenance not fixing things in a timely manner, etc. The management is forever changing. I would absolutely avoid these apartments honestly. I hated when I stayed here and my friend does too. It’s cheap for a read if willing to spend a little extra i suggest looking further.

name: Fred Wash
text: worst place to live i advise you if you want to find a good place to move do not. The maintenance is horrible they do not want to fix anything. i have lived here for a year and my A/C has gone out multiple times and it still hasn't gotten fixed again horrible place to reside

name: Kendra Bradford
text: Maintenance is HORRIBLE would give .5 star if I could. Been having a leak since June and it’s Still not fixed. Everytime it rains. I have a soaked carpet in the living room! Don’t move here!

name: Brittney Davis
text: Very rude! Very disrespectful! I wouldn’t recommend no one and I mean.... NO ONE TO MOVE OUT HERE! I’ve been staying out here for 2 years 7 months never been late for rent nor did I get disrespectful to no one  with my rent well due to financially problems I’ve went to the office to talk to the staff to let her know due to financially problems I will be late for my rent. Well the staffs went and tried to look up for more problems that I’ve been having.. Friday afternoon I come home to a eviction letter on my door saying that I haven’t paid for the month of April. So I went to the office wanting to know why this letter was on my door. When I went to the office the staff already had a attitude and had a attitude with me. When I didn’t get loud nor did I put my hands on her. She called another staff to report me. Also she was very DISRESPECTFUL WAS BLOWING HER BREATHE HARD NOT TRYING TO LISTEN TO ME OR HEAR ANYTHING WHAT I HAD TO SAY! Well of course I called my lawyer to handle the situation. She tells him my information couldn’t be discussed! VERY DISRESPECTFUL! So he got me to speak so we can discuss my information. Staff lied to my lawyer stating that I right checks which I don’t do. I do money orders!  My lawyer told me to find my receipt for May which I did! So when I went to the rent office to prove to the office manager that I’ve paid for May! Her question was..... why you bringing this up here for? I don’t know why you’re bringing this up here for!! NO APOLOGY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! NO IM SORRY!!!!!!!!!! NO ANYTHING!! I WOULDNT RECOMMENED NO ONE!! Keep your receipts AT ALL TIME!!

name: Autumn Cannon
text: Enjoyed it when I first moved out here 3 years ago.  Maintenance wss quick but now.... I had to keep reminding the office about my work orders for things that needed to be fixed . Took them a year to make repairs and fix things in my apartment.  I had mold in my apartment they still have not come out to check. I don't know what the disconnect is when you tell the rent office and getting maintenance out there , but it is highly frustrating.  High turnover with management, and there are bugs ,but they have pest control.  Only good things aboit this place is my rent is cheap.  Can't wait to move once I get the chance.

name: Megan Fuller
text: Would not recommend to anyone!!!! Shooting right outside my apartment!!! Little flying brown bugs and roaches everywhere!!!!! Staff seems friendly at first but never willing to make repairs, and always have an attitude when you call in for any reason. I am so glad my lease ends next month. One of my worst experiences every!!!!!!!!

name: Jan Johnson
text: This is the absolute worst place to live. I have lived here now for 3 years and still have things from when I first moved in that has not been fixed. My stove and a/c have both needed maint now for months. Still waiting!!!!!!!!!!  Do not more here!!!!!

name: Shaniqua Davis
text: They have the most ghetto/ ratchet  leasing agents I've ever seen. Very unprofessional place I have ever seen. Ive only leaved here for a month and every week there's something wrong with this town house. From holes in the wall that have not been fixed  (before we moved in), plumbing, alot of safety hazards, thresholds in the bathroom cracked in pieces where you can cut your feet on.

name: Jessica Loy
text: Don't move here. The maintenance is super slow, the property manager is very rude. Don't move here.

name: Brittney Davis
text: Disrespectful and unprofessional staffs!! Not all but some except for two people

name: Dyana Gomez
text: It beautiful and the rooms are wonderful

name: Aaron Chappell
text: Great area and quiet

name: Niecey Niecey
text: Went down hill

name: Antwanya Benson
text: Great...

name: Yolanda B
text: Cute

name: Jacia Maria A.
text: The staff is very professional. Sheree was my leasing agent she was really sweet & I love the fact she communicated with me to let me all the updates of my apartment status. So far the apartment complex seems quiet, the playground is nice, and the gym is open 24/7 which is very convenient for me.

name: She Norvel
text: These apartment are very pleasant. Friendly, quiet neighbors, and the sweetest Property manager Jennifer Murray!! She was awesome start to finish.....I've been here a year exactly and have not had one problem that wasn't fixed immediately!!

name: Richard J M
text: I lived here for years before it was called The Park at Sunderland. The management that was here prior to the company change was great and respectful. Once the new company bought the complex, it went downhill quick. There were multiple accounts with management entering without valid reasons or no reasons at all, which led me to buy some cameras for litigation purposes. There was inadequate lighting in the parking lot with them turning off the tennis court lights all the time so it always felt unsafe at night. Management had a very high turn over rate so that says a lot. Appliances would break with maintenance not fixing them in a timely manner. I once had a dishwasher that did not get fixed the last 6 months I was there while I put in a maintenance request every 2 weeks. Once in August, my AC unit went out and did not get fixed for 2 weeks!! They did not consider that an emergency even though it was almost 90 degrees in my home without the AC. Mind you, I paid my rent every month on time, kept the place clean, and rarely ever complained about anything. Most landlords would consider that a good tenant and would want to keep that sort of tenant. This place did not respect me or even cared how good of a tenant I was. Be very careful if you decide to spend your money and live here. It’s a complete rip off and they will not respect you! I’m so glad I moved out and will never come back here again!

name: Shayla Mckinney
text: I can honestly say Jennifer and diamond have been god sent! Everyone is going threw difficult times right now and they have no handled me like other landlords would have! They are very caring and understanding to my situation and I am very thankful they are the ones who answer when I call! Thank y’all so much!

resp.text: Hello Shayla!  Thank you so much for your review!  I'm very happy to hear that Jennifer and Diamond have done such a great job making sure you have everything you need!  They'll be excited to hear the news!  Thank you again.

name: Ebony Paige
text: Leasing agent has a really bad attitude. Not customer service oriented.

name: G MEADOWS
text: Great place to live...very quiet and with the addition of a gated entry and exit Sunderland has become safer than it previously was

name: Jolhn Eatmon
text: Diamond Is a Wonderful Leasing Agent she fulfill all my needs kept me updated every step of the way and i'm very Satisfied with my apartment so if in need of some where to stay go speak to Diamond!

name: Wendrell Lowe
text: Diamond is a wonderful leasing agent she took that extra mile to move me in and I’m very please with my apartment this has really been a wonderful experience with Diamond

name: Amanda Marrero
text: Jennifer and Diamond are very professional and great to work with. They made our move to Birmingham so easy. I would recommend anyone that is looking for a nice apartment to go to The park at Sunderland. The apartments are beautiful.

name: Aleisha Smith
text: This place is wonderful . The staff and maintenance members are very professional and helpful . They will go the extra mile to satisfy your needs . It is very nice and peaceful here . Beautiful remodeling in the apartments and friendly neighbors . Malik is by far the most helpful & fastest employee I’ve ever seen . He’s VERY professional and helpful, he will make sure you are satisfied and comfortable. VERY EXCELLENT customer service .

name: Asha R.
text: The lady Jennifer that works the front office has the worst disposition. She is very rude and nasty. No one told you to pick the job Jennifer if you see this. She definitely needs some customer service classes. I decided not to stay here based off of that. I can’t spend my money with people that don’t respect me.

name: Elliott McGaughy
text: Jennifer and Diamond were excellent! The experience was delightful...they were very helpful and professional. If you're looking for a place to stay and a good environment please stop at the park at sunderland and ask for Jennifer and Diamond!

name: Raven BeGreat
text: My boyfriend lives there. Rent is on the higher end. No playground, on site gym it only open 9-5 (most people are at work 😒). The dumpster is COMPLETELY OUT OF CONTROL. It's trash alllllllll over the ground. It's no up to date appliances or floor plans. It's ALWAYS water issues. They are always digging up the pipes and replacing them. There has been several car break ins. No cameras or security.

name: Ashley Long
text:
Jennifer and Diamond were very helpful. They made it very easy for me to apply with my busy work schedule. The apartment are well kept up and the outside is clean.

So unhappy now. I hate I made this post before I move in but you live and you learn. Can’t wait til my lease is up.

name: LaTerika Reed
text: I just want to brag on the awesome work Malik has put in from beginning to end... he kept in contact with me during my application process to let me know where I stood & what was next. My apartment is clean & seems newly remodeled with new appliances. Very quiet neighborhood, love the upkeep & the staff is very people/tenant friendly. So glad to call this home

resp.text: Hello LaTerika: We are thrilled to hear of your positive experience with Malik and know he and the rest of the staff at Park at Sunderland will continue to provide exceptional, friendly service. Welcome to the community!

name: William Miller
text: Listen don’t call an ask anything if Jennifer is there she is very rude and unhelpful. When she answers the phone you can instantly tell that she has attitude and doesn’t want to be at work. She lacks serious customer service skills an emotional intelligence.

name: Erin Nicole
text: Jennifer has been wonderful since the day we moved in definitely would recommend

name: Angel Abdullah
text: I am very displeased with the living conditions.  I have never had to worry about my kids or my safety at this complex until recently. Far too often, my neighbors decide to walk outside and shoot their guns for no apparent reason. I have called the office about this issue and emailed them, but NOTHING has been done to fix the issue! My kids are scared to sleep at night because of this and rent is too high to be living under such poor conditions! Something has to be done!

name: Diamond Harris
text: I can honestly say I had no problem as far as moving in . Diamond was very helpful in the process. She kept me updated literally on everything . She was very nice and kind as well.

name: John White
text: Maintenance is HORRIBLE! The temperature in my apartment is 85 degrees and has been so! I have a 3 year old but we were pretty much forced to stay over night in this apartment because maintenance moves at their own pace... will definitely be getting in contact with corporate in the morning! Luckily I’ve recorded every call I’ve made to the tent office as well as the brief conversations with maintenance! 🤬

name: Jalen Stephens
text: Diamond and Jennifer are really helpful to me every month and the gym service is very fantastic.i highly recommended u moving here ‼️‼️‼️

name: Chris Crum
text: Very easy and smooth process with Malik. I highly recommend anybody to go through him.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback, Chris! We are happy to hear that the staff are taking good care of you!

name: Erica Burrell
text: Malik is a great person to work with... Any problems I’ve had he work he hardest to get it done or make it better.. So far I haven’t had any problems out of him but the type of person he is I doubt I ever will..

resp.text: Hello Erica!  I'm pleased to hear about how much of a help Malik has been for you so far.  I will be sure to pass this information along to him.  Thank you so much for your 5 star review and feedback.  We greatly appreciate hearing from our tenants!

name: kemontae Matthews
text: Diamond is very professional! She has been nothing but amazing since I have been here...

name: Shakeri Molette
text: The park at Sunderland is a great place to stay!! The management staff is very friendly and available for all your needs. Quiet and clean, I have loved living here the 2 years I’ve been here

resp.text: Shakeri Molette, thank you for your kind words and this wonderful review!

name: Verna Jordan
text: This is to the owner's u'll couldn't have made a better property manager u can't go wrong with Jennifer she's very refectful kind heart and do what she have to do as a manager.I wouldn't change manager at all u'll need to keep her.She's the best manager she get the job done. Thanks  Mrs. Jordan

resp.text: Hello Mrs. Jordan!  Thank you so much for the kind words.  I'm very glad to see that you've had a great experience with us, and I'm even happier to see that Jennifer has been doing whatever she can to ensure that!  I'll pass your praise along to her.  She will be glad to hear it!  Thank you again!

name: Lee Anthia Ford
text: Malik was very nice and followed through with everything. Everytime we discussed a work order, it became Done :) Great People’s Skills.

resp.text: Thanks for the positive feedback, Lee! We are proud to have Malik as a part of our team - he does a great job! Please don't hesitate to let us know if there is anything we can do to ear a 5-star review!

name: li derricka
text: I don’t have any problems with the apartment but my appliances are starting to break. Another thing, the pools are never clean. I would appreciate being with my kids in the pool on hot days.

name: Brielle Thompson
text: Alot of these reviews are fake....Look at the dates. So all of these people moved in that fast and used Malik? Stop it

resp.text: Hello Brielle.  None of our reviews are fake.  Our leasing staff did move in a large quantity of new tenants in a short amount of time, and they always tell their tenants and potential tenants to share their experiences via Google Reviews or other social media platforms.  Malik has done a fantastic job helping to fill vacancies at his property, and everyone here at Alltrade is very happy for him, and we are extremely proud of all the hard work he has been putting in.  It is an absolute pleasure having Malik on our team.  I personally look forward to his future success with the company, and we will all be cheering him on for his hard work.

name: Meeka Acklin
text:
Negative 20. These apartments have went DOWN. Office & corporate are a joke. Nothing gets fixed. But always having a water issue. No pool for most of the summer cuz they were too sorry to clean it. Never the same answer for any questions. Office staff rude. Especially Jennifer. Christina is ok.
Corporates doesn't help. Seeking lawyer because they want me to pay a rent not listed on lease. Just waiting on lease to be up. Stay away

name: katrice maddox
text: This complex falsify information to tenants. The leasing office wants tenants to pay rent on time, yet the amenities aforded to us are not available but are included in rent. I was told by Jennifer in the rent office almost a week ago and asked when was the pool going to open? She lied to me and said they were waiting for the Health Department to come inspect the pool yet in the same sentence she said the pool had not been cleaned. How can the health department inspect a dirty pool? I am over apartment complexes over charging people for rent and not providing amenities that are included in rent. I do not reccommend this complex to anyone. The employees and managers have no compassion about their tenants they just want their money.

name: Kara Hurst
text: My hubby went he said it was nice

name: Richard Thompson
text: I love the new staff and property improvements— maintenace is wonderful too!

resp.text: Laurance Thompson, thank you for your kind words and this wonderful review! Please don't hesitate to reach out to us if there's anything more we can do!

name: Pamela Williams
text: The maintenance guy Courtney went above and beyond . I only submitted a request for one problem and he asked did I want other stuff done that he noticed needed fixing . The previous maintenance guys never did that

name: Nilla baby
text: maintenance is horrible. Very inconvenient and inconsiderate to not fulfill *emergency work orders

resp.text: Hello, and thank you for contacting us and leaving a review.  I'm sorry to see that you are unhappy with maintenance.  I would like to look into this for you and see what I can find out.  Will you please email me at info@alltradeproperties.com so I can gather up some information and investigate this for you?  I'm extremely sorry that things aren't being fixed in a timely manner, but I would like to try and make sure that it doesn't continue.

name: Ann M McCollough
text: Nice place to live and it is somewhat quiet most all of the time.

name: Zekiyah Abdullah
text: These apartments are not worth waisting your money on. THEY HAVE RATS!!!! And the rent office refuses to do anything about it

resp.text:
Hello Zekiyah,

Thank you for taking the time to write a review. Your feedback is appreciated. I can assure you your request is important to us and our staff is working diligently with professionals to address your concern. Should you have any questions or like to speak with someone from our staff please contact us at (205) 549-8020.

-The Park at Sunderland

name: Michelle Moore
text: Nice place to start out its quiet

name: ceearra Rox
text: The park at sunderland is a safe place to live. The only thing that i was annoyed by is that me and my husband were charged 25 dollars because we left our empty trash can out side during the day for a few hours.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to inform us about these issues in our community, Lena. We are disappointed to hear about your less than positive experience, as it is of great importance to our team that we foster a true sense of community here. While we clean the property regularly, we also rely on residents to manage their waste and clean up after their pets. If there are specific problems areas, we would like to hear about them so we can get someone out there to take a look. If you have outstanding concerns, we would enjoy the opportunity to speak with you in our office so we can work toward resolution.

name: Keekee Black
text: Have a roach problem do not fix anything the people in the rent office stay telling lies. Please do not move here it is not worth it.

resp.text: Our team is sorry to hear that your time in our community has not been the positive experience that you expected. We have pest control available to our residents so please stop by our office so that we may create a work order for you. We look forward to improving your opinion of our team and providing you with the five-star experience that you deserve.

name: MEGATRON 6MO
text: Nice space

name: Wesley Watts
text: NICE PLACE TO  LIVE.

name: Shelby Valladares
text: They only care about money and not your well being or how they treat you as tenants or your health they have you living in mold and roach infested apartment units

name: Alyssa Mariah
text: The old management was better than the new one

resp.text: Erika Hubbard, we are so happy to read such a great review about The Park at Sunderland!

name: Blue HoneyBunz

text: I been there since 2 years now since I moved to Birmingham. The apartments are nice but a little over priced. Just need to inforce rules more.

We took care in making our rates accurately reflect our offerings, though if you'd like more details on how we reached our charges, please stop by the office.

text: We like living here
