name: 2 Credits
text: This complex has no interest in getting in contact with a renter if they have any kind of issue or maintenance request.  Several times I would have maintenance requests ignored until I complained on the survey asking how they had done on my service request.  This was after no one had shown up for it initially.  There were also quite a few times where they would show up and not finish the service request I had made.  Overall, I would not recommend moving into or staying at this complex.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your feedback, though we’re sorry to see that you are experiencing maintenance issues with your home. Our maintenance team works hard to address resident requests in a timely, efficient manner and we sincerely apologize for any inconvenience. Please submit a maintenance request for any outstanding issues. If you have already done so, we invite you to call the office for an update on the status of your request. Thank you.

name: Charity Hunter
text:
This property is the prettiest and roomiest of apartments that I have seen. We have a view of the lake and it’s extremely peaceful inside and outside on the patio.  The apartment itself has been very good to us. We are in an updated apartment and it accommodate my whole family plus 2 dogs. Maintenance is usually right on time to fix whatever I need. We had issues with the water heater initially and they replaced it with a new one. Had a pest issue and they sent the pest company within an hours time. No more pests! The grounds are kept up and we absolutely love that they will be installing a new playground just near us! So far we have enjoyed our stay!

2 year Update:
Lakeview in my book still remains to be a great option for space and safety! We still love this place! Really feels like home. Whenever I have a maintenance issue I call and can get the issue resolved swiftly. Neighbors are quiet and polite.  The apartment grounds are well-kept. There is duck poop and sometimes the neighbors don't pick up their dog's poop either. But management works really hard to make sure everyone does their part in picking up after their pet. I haven't had any issues with staff. We haven't had any staff issues. Everyone treats us respectfully.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing some feedback with our team. We’re happy to hear that you’re enjoying many aspects of our community. Even though your time here hasn’t been without any issues, we’re glad that we’ve been able to address your concerns in a timely manner. If you have any additional feedback, please feel free to give us a call.

name: William Davis
text: Beautiful setting, comfortable & secure lodging, proactive management, & at-the-ready maintenance!

resp.text: Thank you, William, for taking a moment to review Inverness Lakes. It brightens our day to know that you’re enjoying your experience. As always, don’t hesitate to contact our office if there is anything that we can do for you.

name: Jamecia James
text: The manager Kelly was very rude when approaching me about my vehicle parking

resp.text: Jamecia, thank you for sharing your thoughts with us. Each member of our team strives to carry themselves with high degrees of respect and professionalism, so it was never our intention to be rude towards you. We invite you to contact our office so that we may discuss your review in further detail.

name: Brittly Allman
text: I have lived at this apartment complex for over a year and a half and I am so grateful that I didn’t let the negative reviews stop me from signing my lease because this place & the staff are wonderful! I’ve had a few issues with my AC unit and have had to call maintenance and they never take more than 30 to and hour to show up and fix the problem every time! I live in a newly renovated one bedroom apartment right now but needed a little bit more room but didn’t want to leave this complex so they went above and beyond by offering me a 3 bedroom newly renovated apartment that met all my requirements and are transferring me to the bigger apartment in a little over a month! This complex is safe, quite and beautiful. I recommend everyone see for yourself how wonderful the environment is here, you won’t regret it.

resp.text: It’s great to hear that our team and community have made for such a positive experience for you, Brittly! We take a lot of pride in our quality and expedient customer service, and are happy to know that it makes a difference in our residents’ satisfaction. Thanks for taking the time to give us your five-star feedback, and please let us know if there’s anything else we can do for you!

name: Kailyn hurst
text: I've been here for three months and love it!! The staff is very nice and helpful! i had a problem with my ac and the maintenance man stopped cleaning the pool when I told him and ran right over there and fixed it immediately! My apartment is so nice and feels like home! I love how the trees are every where! The pool, the lake and the views is so beautiful it's like a resort! Everyone is super nice and helpful. I've lived in other apartments but I love this one the most!!!🙂

name: Tan
text: Nice, quiet place to live.  Management responds quickly to all concerns.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to write us a review! We’re glad that you’re enjoying our community and that you’ve had great interactions with our team. If you have any additional comments, questions, or concerns, please feel free to give us a call.

name: MGM Black
text: I asked for my socket to be fixed in the kitchen.  Instead I come home to all my lights on. Blinds all the way open. And my baby whole box of wipes is gone. It’s sad I don’t get it. Out of all things my baby wipes smh. It’s all good tho

resp.text: We're saddened to see a low rating for our community because we work hard to provide our residents with excellent service, Makalian. Please give us a call so we can learn more about your situation and work with you to improve your experience.

name: Crystal Grider
text: Great place friendly staff and beautiful views would recommend anyone to live there!

resp.text: Wow, our team is delighted with your amazing review of our community. We are dedicated to providing our residents with an amazing place to call home, so we’re glad that has been the case with you. Feel free to give us a call if you have any additional feedback.

name: Obrian Sims
text: The very first time I visited these apartments, I knew that this is where I wanted to be. From the beautiful lake to the updated apartments to the excellent staff working in the front office. Everything was just perfect. I wasn't harassed by the staff when I was trying to make my decision on where I wanted to live. So that made the process even better. Justin, staff member, made sure that I had everything during move ins and it went by smoothly! If you are looking for security, nice neighbors, and a beautiful place to live, Lakeview is the answer!

name: Cloie Smith
text:
Lovely atmosphere. I have been very happy in this apartment. The staff in the office have been extremely courteous when ever I have needed anything. I had trouble with my front door and it was fixed immediately! :)
Thank you, Justin, Crystal, Kim And Kyle for great service.

name: Morgan Mitchell
text: Justin Hall helped us with our move in process, he made the experience smooth and exciting! We have a dog he loves it here, there are some breed restrictions. Staff is friendly and helpful, the pool is great with a lake view! Close to shopping and places to eat out.  I suggest this place to anyone looking for a place to move, glad we found it!

name: Shunteria Cooks
text: I thought about moving here because it seemed like a great place to live but after reading the reviews I second to that. It seems like they try to get you to move in by telling you what you want to hear then afterwards your doom. I think they should consider looking at the reviews and see if they can change things because this is horrible!

resp.text: Shunteria, we're deeply disappointed to see that you've allowed the negative opinions of others impact your impression of our community. Our team always wants to encourage an in-person visit to our community so we can have the opportunity to answer any questions and demonstrate all the wonderfully convenient features and amenities this neighborhood has to offer. Please consider giving us a visit and taking a tour. We would be happy to address any concerns you have at that time.

name: Sam Tate
text: These people are crooks and I would not recommend anyone moving to these appointments they just took a major part of my deposit for no reason.wish I could rate it a zero rating all Veterans stay clear of this place and they don't offer any Military Discounts. 920.00 a month with no balcony yeah right. Email you sit down and talk you people no just what y'all are doing never moved in are signed a lease my Full Deposit Should have been returned that make you and your Organization Crooks Period you took money that wasn't yours .

resp.text: It’s unfortunate to hear that you’ve been dissatisfied with our community. We strive to provide a clear and thorough understanding of our policies and lease agreements for all of our residents, and it is disappointing that was not your experience. We would be happy to sit down with you and clarify any misunderstandings you may have, and work together to address your concerns. Please give us a call or email if there is anything else our team can do for you.

name: Matthew Brannan
text: I've lived here for a couple of months and I have to say that I love it here. The management is so nice and helpful! The complex is clean and very quiet! I recommend this apartment complex for anyone of all ages!

name: Marvin Miller
text: The apartment grounds are wonderful, and the office staff are very helpful. The move-in was quick and painless, and the apartments themselves are priced fairly. I've lived here for two months and would recommend people to check them out. Maintenance can be slow at times but if you stay persistent then your problem will be fixed.

name: Antiana Smith
text: Ive been here for 3 months now and I love it. The staff is always helpful and very friendly and the atmosphere is so nice it really feels like a home. Plus the complex itself is gorgeous and very safe and warming. Cu dos to the new management staff.

name: whitney webb
text: BEWARE. Do not move here. You GIVE them $600 just to move in as what they call a DEPOSIT then they tell you it’s non refundable. Who donates $600 just to move in somewhere? Plus $800.00 rent. Then they tell you cable is included. Lol sike. $50.00 is added to your rent every month. Why don’t people have the option to get cable or not? These people are jokes. Bad maintenance. Horrible customer service. Bad area. Everything is terrible. Management will argue with you and tell you things that they never did after the lease is signed. Everybody better double think before moving here. It’s a JOKE. No wonder they can pay people to cut the grass twice a week. Everybody that moves in donated $600 😂😂😂. They got me, I’ll admit. But I’m trying to warn others!!!

resp.text: We appreciate you taking the time to share your personal experience with us, Whitney. We include cable for our residents as a premium community amenity intended to make their stay the best it can be. That being said, we apologize for any inconveniences you’ve encountered and welcome the opportunity to speak with you in person. If you would like to discuss your feedback regarding our included amenities or deposit policies in more detail, we encourage you to reach out to the office directly. We look forward to meeting with you soon.

name: Jonathan Martin
text: Well justin and the others in the office are very good plus friendly. The maintenance could be better at getting things done. I've had nothing but so many different problems and it takes them so long to respond or get the work done. I have spots on the wall that need repair and the painters are the worst at fixing problems right. As far as the staff I highly recommend them for their efforts and to the maintenance and painters they could be better.

name: Brandi Young
text: I am writing to give you our experience with Providence Management Company LLC.  My husband and I moved to Mobile Al to start our lives.  After touring multiple apartments in the area we liked Inverness Lakes. Upon moving in we toured the area settled on an apartment. I keep up on our credit but was told we would have to pay $600 in administration fees just to move in. I should have taken this as a negative sign. But my husband and I needed to get moved so we could get back to work. So we paid it. We moved in and at first really enjoyed the lake and ducks and such. My husband and I travel for work so we really were only there a few days a month. Soon we realized maintenance was awful we had a flood in the kitchen the first month. They had to cut holes in the wall to repair. They repaired the sink but not the wall it wasn’t until I finally told them we were having a dinner party and this is an eye sore that they finally sent someone. Two months later my husband came home to a flood from the AC units from upstairs flooded our dining room. Our Mail box had been broken into many times. And we didn’t have a garbage disposal for 6mo because we couldn’t get anyone to come fix it. The trash situation is absolutely atrocious. Every day you cannot get near the compactor due to trash all the way out to the street. Many things have been stolen even my lug nut cover on my pick up. But we paid our rent on time every month and soon we discovered Apartment living is not for us.  My husband and I are always away from home. And when home it is so loud people running down stairs constantly we was unable to relax the fire alarm box battery going off. You could not walk the property because people do not pick up after their dogs. Right before we moved  the office called us to tell us they needed to come in and do some measurements I advised them we was out of town and in the middle of moving and didn’t want anyone in our apartment .  They came in our apartment anyway.  We decided to move.  We had been traveling so much prior to moving that we was 11 days late putting in a 60 day notice. Two weeks after getting into our new place we then received a bill for $460.36. We were in shock.  All in all this was a lesson in Apartment living that we will not do again.  I hope whoever is reading this Protect yourself. If you do decide to make this mistake. Know that they are not human and if they can legally charge you for anything they will. All they could get me to for $40 for stove drip pans and late rent. But when I went to the office to confront the issue I saw stacks of bills for tenants some as high as $900. Beware!!!! And they will send you to collection. It was a bad relationship cost 600 to get into and 500 to get out of.

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback, Brandi! Our team truly valued your residency and we are sorry to see you go, but we wish you well on your next home. Our goal here is to provide our residents with a comfortable and beautiful place to call home, so we are disappointed to hear that you were not fully satisfied with your stay. We truly care about our residents - past, present, and future, but we do apologize if you feel that is not the case. If you'd like to speak with us regarding your move-out evaluation, please give our office a call!

name: William Marriott
text: I've been living here for a few months and overall I've been quite satisfied with everything. Moving in was easy and streamlined thanks to Justin. A few things had to be worked out inside the apartment by maintaince, but that's about it.

name: Emily Lynch
text: I recently was about to lease an apartment from this complex.  Everything went smoothly, all the paperwork and everything went through easily and the staff seemed very easy to communicate with.  My family and I went to the apartment and was infuriated by what we saw on move in day.  The counters were supposed to be replaced before I moved in, they weren't.  I would have had to leave my apartment for an entire day and remove everything from my dining room and kitchen  for the maintenance team to come and replace them within a week of moving in.  Furthermore while looking around the apartment the "wood" floors were curling, the toilet was chipped in numerous places and there was mold around all of the windows.  Also my father is a city inspector and saw the numerous fire hazards throughout the apartment.  This also was my leasing agents first time to look through the apartment. From a professional stand point that is highly inappropriate.  I would have appreciated him walking through the apartment prior to me seeing the apartment in order to try and have some of the obvious problems fixed prior to my move in day.  Needless to say, I did not move in to this complex and found something else.

name: aimlessvoyager
text: I'm a current resident here. This place is the absolute worst! I only gave it 1 star bc negative 500 wasn't an option. Or, trust me, that's what I would have put. There is literally 1 dumpster for the entire community. Unless you have a truck, you have to put your trash on your car and drive it to the front. Pretty much everyone here has to do that. So when you're leaving, sometimes there is a line of people dropping off there trash. This makes it very difficult to get out. The dumpster has over flowed practically into the entry way street on multiple occasions. The inside gym is terrible. Most of the free weights are now missing and have been for months. The outdoor grill seldom ever works. When I asked the front desk about it being fixed, the woman rudely told me I should just go buy my own. I couldn't believe it! There are only 2 charcoal grills on 1 side of the lake and 1 is next to the dog park. So if you're looking to grill by the pool, you can't. I have never seen the fire pit lit. When I asked about that the front desk just said "oh" and walked off. At this point, I'm not even shocked anymore by their responses. As for my actual apartment, it is not at all practical. I have to completely close the bathroom door (of my 1 bedroom apartment, mind you) to get to my bathroom drawers. The dishwasher doesn't work well, yet is supposed to be new. To get anything clean I have to scrub it before putting it in there and turn the hot water on in the sink for 5 minutes. All the kitchen drawers are slightly too small to fit anything in. The linen closet doors are hard to open and close. Anytime I've called about anything that needs checked or fixed, they "put in a work order" and never did anything about it. I've had to call back repeatedly to get anything done. Most of the time, they had no recollection of said work order. Ergo, there is evidently little to no organization and communication amongst the staff. Now, I'm a little OCD about cleanliness, and yet I've had a mild bug problem when I moved in. They took 2 weeks to look into it. This makes no sense to me. When I asked for a new filter for my AC, they had to order more which took 3 weeks. I had to be the 1 to inquire if it had come in, bc they never let me know when it did. The people in the front office are not helpful in the least. Furthermore, the prices and fees are absurd. Especially bc I'm essentially paying for amenities that I don't even get a chance to use! I could go on for days about how much I hate living here, but hopefully what I've already said is enough. Thank you for your time reading my review.

resp.text: Your feedback is appreciated, though it's very disconcerting to read such a negative impression of our community and our team. We are eager to improve the quality of your experience and address all of your concerns in full details, so we encourage you to stop by the office at your earliest convenience. At that time, we will be happy to follow up on any outstanding maintenance requests and answer any questions you might have. We look forward to the opportunity to work with you towards a resolution soon.

name: Blake Waters
text: Nice complex with beautiful grounds. Beautiful updated apartment. Only complaint is the price was a little high and they kept raising the rent every year.

resp.text: Thanks so much, Blake! It is our pleasure to offer our residents nothing but beautiful homes, stellar customer service, and a comfortable community here at Inverness Lakes. Our team truly appreciates you for taking the time to share your experiences with us!

name: miA andrews
text: From the first day , Justin was very helpful. I always look for him when I visit the office. Apartments soo peaceful . But the fact they never answer the phone. And the washer machines suck.

name: Ashton R
text: We moved in about a month ago and love our apartment! Justin has gone above and beyond to make our signing and move in process as simple as possible and always checks in to make sure everything is still good with our apartment!

name: Steven Dubuisson
text: I'm honestly surprised by most of the negative reviews. Me and my girlfriend have been living here for a few months now and have absolutely loved it.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us this kind feedback! We're thrilled to hear you both have been happy with your experience and if there is anything else we can do to help make you even more satisfied with our community, don't hesitate to let us know!

name: William Aron
text: They will court you in the beginning to believe that they are the best apartments out there for the money. Please read some of the experiences below regarding maintenance. I am leaving this bad review in reference to the rent almost doubling when I was leaving. The day that I was told they needed to know if I would move out, I told them I would be moving. I had taken another job outside of town and no longer needed the apartment. They said they would need 60 days notice to vacate. Which I was giving 60 days. I recieved a bill that looked like I was paying someone else's rent on top of mine and called to see what was going on. It turns out they were going to charge me more because I was going into a month to month. I understand that there should be a time period for which this business can find new tennants. I also understand that going into a month to month  should cost more, but the idea of a mediocre apartment bill to be almost $1900 for a little over a month is absolutely absurd. I hope that everyone who reads this will get to learn from my very poor decision to rent from this company.

resp.text: William, we’re sorry to see your negative impression of our community as we strive to provide accurate and fair pricing for our homes based on a fluctuating market but understand seemingly sudden rent changes can be frustrating. If you would like to discuss end-of-lease billing policies in more detail, we encourage you to reach out to the office directly. Moving forward, we’ll continue our efforts to openly and effectively communicate with all our residents and wish you the best in your future endeavors.

name: Tha Wright Man
text: I do not recommend this place at all. Moved out a few months ago and they say we owe on a water bill due to it being 2 months behind when we paid water with rent.

resp.text: We’re saddened by your negative perception of our community and apologize for any inconveniences you experienced as a result of delayed payment requests. In the hopes of clearing up past miscommunications and improving your impression, we’d welcome the opportunity to address your concerns in person. Please reach out to the office at your earliest convenience. We look forward to meeting you soon.

name: Chris Ward
text: Friendly staff, great attitude. Justin answered all questions, felt more like renting from a friend than a business. Awesome apartment with amazing view of the lake.

name: S S
text: Water heater is broken. Nothing is being done to help.

resp.text: It’s unfortunate that you’re having problems with your water heater. Please reach out directly to our team so that we may discuss your concerns and submit a maintenance request for your apartment home. We hope to hear from you soon.

name: Time for change -
text: If I had the option of no stars that would be it. Im a single mom of 3 I went and toured the MODEL. Apt and was told my unit was getting ready for me but was the exact same. I had the leasing agent Ashley call my phone and email me multiple time a day after i told her i was at work.  Finally she told me i HAD. To come pay the $175 RESERVATION FEE. To secure my spot. When iIget there she informed me i was to pay also 600$ deposit and first month's rent! Mind you i was still told cleaning ppl were getting apt ready. Now Saturday i was able to do a walk through and the apartment was filthy! Peoples belongings bugs stains holes n walls mold leaking tubs n faucets. Sooo I go to the office and the one lady working blows me off sayin she is with a new applicant and will call me back.  That was at 11:15 am.  I had to go to work so iIcalled her and left 3 messages with no call back. !!! I was supposed to move in! Now my kids ans I are without!! Crazy how they call me back to back to get  that money but now I cant get anyone on the phone!! DO NOT MOVE HERE THIS PLACE MIS REPRESENTS WHAT THEY HAVE! ITS FRAUD AND I WILL PURSUE LEGAL ACTION IF I MUST!   What horrible people to do business this way!!!

resp.text: Kristin, it saddens us to see that your experience here has led you to feel so frustrated. Our team always does their best to avoid confusion and communicate all of our policies and expectations upon leasing, including any and all fees associated with the process. We encourage you to contact us or stop by the office to address specific questions or concerns about any aspect of the process so we might have a chance to clarify and work towards a resolution with you.

name: Candace King
text: Apartments are very nice. Justin Hall has been nothing but helpful with my move in! Really enjoying these apartments!

name: Kera Barr
text:
I lived there for 20 months. ONLY 10 months on purpose. Tried to move out at end of lease they said I should have given them a 60 day notice to vacate. So I stayed another 10 months, they wanted to up my rent if I signed a new lease, so I didn't sign it; it just renewed automatically.

Crime got worse as well did the trashy neighbors. Felt sorry for the elderly lady next to me because she had to threaten them(disability housing act) to get her a mailbox close by her door, because she couldn't walk to main mailboxes. Not only that but the whole time I lived there the security lights that where out in our hallways(and still are visited her yesterday). I am a single female, this is the worse place to live.

After move out before I turned in my keys, I insisted a walk through.  AFTER the walk through with a maintenance employee, they said I owed nothing & I would get my deposit back in 4 to 6 weeks. Not only did I not get my deposit back but 3 months later I call to find out why & I have a balance.

The balance was due to a carpet cleaning($70) which is STANDARD after every move-out (should not be on my account responsibility because I cleaned carpets before I left, but I can't produce a reciept, so therefore they don't believe me now). Also, an oven cleaning, after I also bought brand new drip pans that I left in kitchen & it had a large drip pan in the bottom of the oven (so what you charged me another $70 to throw it out & put in new drip pans that I bought).

name: Carolyn Fountain
text: Nice staff haven't had a problem been here almost 2 months very friendly neighbors. thanks to Mr. Justin for helping us find what we really wanted .

name: Whitney Webb
text: DO NOT MOVE HERE. TERRIBLE STAFF AND $600.00 ADMIN FEES JUST TO MOVE IN. ROOF LEAKED MULTIPLE TIMES AND NO ONE FIXED IT FOR WEEKS. NO HOT WATER. TERRIBLE NEIGHBORS.

resp.text: Whitney, our team seeks to create a perfectly comfortable community for all our residents, so it’s disappointing to see you have yet to enjoy your stay here. We would welcome the chance to improve your experience with our maintenance services by discussing your feedback in person. Please stop by the office so we may have an opportunity to work through your concerns. We hope to speak with you soon.

name: Taylar Kidd
text: Please do not let the fake reviews fool you! The only thing nice about the place is the outside. The apartments are falling apart in the inside and it takes forever for maintenance to come and fix things! The staff are VERY unprofessional (KIM in particular) and they act as if they hate to see you coming when you do have a question or a maintenance request! I had termites crawling up the walls every night in the summer and when I called them about it they got nasty and told me to keep my doors completely shut and it will blow over! My door had a horrible seal under the bottom and when I called them about it the maintenance never came!  There was mold around the windows! Do yourself a favor and look somewhere else. I stayed there two years too long and the only reason I renewed is because my lease date interfered with other complexes and their availability!

name: April Stienstraw
text: THREE APARTMENTS FLOODED AND WE HAVE TO MOVE OURSELVES BC PROPERTY MANAGER WANTS TO TELL INSURANCE COMPANY THAT THEY FIXED FLOOD ISSUE! II am rating  this place one star because I have to click on the start to leave a review at all. I’m writing  this tired and sick so pardon the run on  sentence. Lakeview Apartments  complex property manager has sat by and watched three apartments flood .. families, in turmoil ,  homes wrecked,  personal property destroyed and have chose to lie to all three of our insurance companies and say the apartments were repaired, yet they never stepped foot in the door until our insurance reached out to them.So we now pay out of pocket for the time being without any care or plan of a professional resolution. This causes a trickle of what pulls the people who work to pay the rent on these apartments now spending money on lawyers and time off work without pay and time away from kids or family., we have to pay the hotel to put our families now in so they ,”cover up ,”. instead of putting us up in another apartment or hotel for the time being and moving our family’s belongings as we have jobs and lives and some of us like me ...single mom, illnesses, recent surgeries to recover from and a new job promotion waiting on the other side but losing work hours because their maintenance crew is coming in when you leave for work , getting caught leaving tools , trying to fill up the apartment cracks from the severe leak within the walls and  cover what now shows through...the water damage, black mold growing everywhere. My  children start school in two weeks , we just moved in...and now we must start over. I must be apart from my kids, my livelihood , bc apartment complex has failed to even stand up like all professions do and take blame and right their wrong! Integrity ....you were not taught to this company. OSHA has been contacted as well.

resp.text: April, we’re sorry to learn of your negative impression of our community as we have taken multiple measures to provide you with excellent maintenance and customer services. Because your home was not directly affected by the flooding, we followed best practice and decided not to take out the entirety of the flooring. Due to your dissatisfaction with this solution, we also gave you the option to break your lease which you declined. That being said, we hope this information addresses some of your concerns and apologize for any inconveniences you have experienced during your stay. Moving forward with your feedback in mind, we’ll continue working hard to provide five-star living experiences for all our community members and wish you the best in your future endeavors.

name: Michael Pippin
text: Apartments are very nice. Justin Hall was very helpful in assisting us with the lease.

name: Karissa Evans
text: This is the WORST apartment complex I have ever lived in! After having one of the sales ladies yell at me, I called cooperate and never heard anything back from them. I renewed my lease for six months after being there a year and a month later they wanted to say that my dog who I had when I signed my lease originally was no longer allowed and I had to get rid of him or move out. I went to the office to talk about moving out and they said I had to pay to get out of my lease even though the reason I was leaving was because they told me I had to, I could not get rid of my daughter's dog. And do not ask for maintenance to come out they have NO clue what they are doing and never fully fix anything. My power bill for a two bedroom two bath apartment with me never home, always at work is $200 because the front door is broken and they refuse to fix it because "it will cost too much." Plus, I have black mold growing in my air vents, they just paint over it. Please do not get sucked into the fact its reasonably priced because you will regret ever signing a lease with these people. Once you sign the lease, you never receive help from them.

name: Ryann Lashley
text: The Excellent Score is clearly given by a employee trying fool possible future residents into renting. We have been here one month to the day and since day one have had issues with our air not working. We have called the office 6 times and we have only had one visit from the repair man with a failed promise to repair the next day. The young staff is clearly aggravated and annoyed by us reporting our issues. We have had termites all throughout our building, not just our apartment and we were told not to contact the office about the issue. We can not wait until out lease ends here. Please understand i have NEVER been one to issue online reviews i am not a bitter person, i'm simply posting this so that you, like all 4 residents in our building wont be miserably awaiting your lease to end so that you can leave.

name: Katie Singleton
text:
They're harassing us about the kind of dog I have when he was approved when we moved in. We've been here for 4 freaking months.

The apt below us reported some leaking coming from up here and they just came and caulked something in our bathroom. My fiancé had our dog outside the whole time because they called before coming over to say put up our dog because the MM is afraid of big dogs. A lady came with the maintenance man and was like "sooo y'all don't know what kind of dog he is" which they JUST asked me on the phone when she said the MM was coming. Fiance said "no he's a hunting dog" I said "I said he's a mix..."
So the lady went with my fiancé outside TOOK PICTURES OF OUR DOG and said that he has to go unless we can get documentation that he is not a Doberman/greyhound/ whatever she accused him of being. There are pit bulls EVERYWHERE in this complex.

He's only lived here for less than 4 months and was approved when we moved in and they just NOW want to say something?!  I want my $350 pet deposit back and $15/month fee waived.
Pissed is an understatement.

And honestly we pay $945/month in rent and it is NOT what we expected. We have a renovated apt and the laziness when it comes to maintenance and craftsmanship is completely obvious. (Paint, baseboards, leaking, cracks in the popcorn ceiling, caulking, etc) Ready to buy a home. I want OUT.

name: gregjr63
text: Justin was extremely helpful with our move in process. Couldn't ask for a better apartment

name: Travis Smith
text: I live here now and I love it here.

text: absolutely worst place I lived . The apartment itself was nice . But the staff and maintenance are what get the 2 stars .

resp.text: Abay, we pride ourselves on the maintenance of our community and care of our residents but it seems that the quality of the customer service you’ve received is not up to our high standards. We apologize for any inconveniences and miscommunications you’ve encountered during your stay and would love another opportunity to show you the true quality of our resident care. At your earliest convenience, please contact the office so we can discuss your particular concerns in person and work together to improve your living experience. We look forward to speaking with you soon.

name: William Hildreth
text: If u have kids don’t move here they hate kids

name: Juan Gipson
text: An apartment complex is a business. This is a poorly operated business.

name: Ava Cooke
text: Love living here

name: Alexus Lambert
text: This complex is AWFUL!!!!!! Don't do it to yourself.

name: Renator English
text: I'm been month to month  for year a lot has prevented me from leaving because of life situation since pandemic family member pasting and so on.  But last night I came home with a hallway full of water and this morning it still leaking maintenance wast able to resolve the problem so my hallway to may 2 bedroom and bathroom has a least 4 in of water and still coming down no way to get in touch with management second dealing with since I arrive back home yesterday evening this us not the first time water has leak in my apartment clothes shoes and furniture is being damaged from sitting in this water

resp.text: Renator, we are deeply sorry you've had this experience at our apartments. We understand your frustration and are working swiftly to rectify the situation. We understand you have spoken with our manager and discussed the plans to restore your home. We offer our sincere apologies for any inconvenience you've endured as a result of this incident. We will remain in constant communication to ensure you are informed of our progress. If you have any questions, concerns, or would like further discussion, please do not hesitate to contact us. ​

name: Autumn
text: Why put an all in one washer & dryer in the 1bed1bath and it doesn’t have a lint catcher.

resp.text: Autumn, we appreciate your review and apologize for any lack of instruction on the features offered with your LG combo washer and dryer. Each appliance includes a lint trap, which requires regular cleaning. If you do not have the instruction manual, our team will gladly provide a copy. As your full name is not listed, we ask you to contact us for assistance with your machine. If any other issues need addressing, please don't hesitate to let us know. We are always eager to serve our residents!

name: Quita h
text: Walls are extremely thin neighbors are loud the office Staff is nice but does nothing with handling noise complaints . Would not recommend noise is terrible.

resp.text: Quita, we appreciate your feedback, and though we are glad you have found our office team cordial, we're disheartened to know you're displeased with life at our apartments. We understand excessive noise can create an unpleasant environment, and the team is happy to investigate any reports of sound which violate our leasing agreement. If the disturbance takes place during business hours, please contact our office immediately so we may observe the issues. If it is after hours or during our quiet hours from 10PM - 8AM, we advise residents to contact the courtesy officer or local authorities. We also suggest recording the sounds from inside your apartment for the duration of the disturbance so we may better assist you in resolving the issue. Our manager would be glad to speak with you regarding this situation and invites you to call or contact the office at your earliest convenience.

name: Michael Lee
text: I would not suggest anyone to live here. If you have another option. Take it.

resp.text: Michael, learning you're not pleased with life at our apartments is disheartening. Our regional manager would be happy to speak with you about your experience to understand how we may improve your lifestyle. Please feel free to reach out to the team and we will gladly provide her email address.

name: Donald Mcclain
text: Recently moved in a new renavated apartment these people have rats in the wall I have a new born smh

resp.text: Donald, providing every resident with an excellent lifestyle is our top priority, and we're sorry to learn you're dissatisfied. The cost of rent includes professional pest control, and our service provider is happy to offer treatment each Tuesday by request. Informing the team of the presence of pests and utilizing our professional treatments are the swiftest ways to resolve any issues and avoid future instances. We added your home to our treatment schedule once made aware of your concerns. In addition to providing service, the technician will inspect your apartment for any possible points of entry for pests. Upon discovering any means of access, maintenance will make repairs to ensure the integrity of your home. We want you to experience a five-star lifestyle and are always happy to assist. If you have any questions regarding your current pest control treatment or would like to discuss anything else, please feel free to reach out to the office.

name: VERANO ALEJANDRA
text: I will give a full statement once I move out ...

resp.text: Summer, we're sorry to learn you're unhappy at our community. We want to provide you with a five-star experience and would like to address any issues you're experiencing. Our manager would like to speak to you to see how we can improve your lifestyle. Please contact us at your earliest convenience.

name: Joanessa Barlow
text: So shouts out to the New Management Team at The Park at Allow Apartments. OMG, it's so refreshing to see the work actually getting done, and finally someone answers the phone just about every time I had to call. This really excited me as I am looking forward to being a resident here for some time. Maybe we will actually get to use the pool this coming summer. I really appreciate all of your help and hard work to make these apartments be Blue Magna Status for real. Thanks #206

resp.text: Joanessa, thank you for this thoughtful four-star review of Park at Alloa! We're glad you're pleased with our new management, SPM, and are experiencing the exceptional service you deserve. We can't wait for you to enjoy the great updates coming soon to our community! Please don't hesitate to call or drop by the office if there is anything we can do to assist you.

name: Simone Robinson
text: After living here at Alloa for almost 4 years I would absolutely recommend living here. The staff are always professional, friendly and on the ball. Maintenance request are taken care of within 24-48 hours almost every time we've needed something fixed or looked at. They're very good about following up on issues and letting you know the status of whats going on. The office staff are always empathetic to your situation and generally will immediately act on your issue. All maintenance staff are polite, professional and honest. The complex is full of greenery and always kept up by either the maintenance staff or the landscaping crew. We've also been very lucky with having respectful and polite neighbors.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to give us positive feedback, Simone. Your kind words just made our day! We strive to provide our residents with top-notch customer service, so we’re glad that has been the case with you. If you ever need any assistance then give us a call.

name: Kadija Booker
text: The new staff is HORRIBLE on notifying the tenants on “ important “ things ! They will send letters & even txt messages but will almost NEVER answer the main phones ! There is a different person in the office every month that acts as if they are new & confused ! & we pay for trash BUT it BARELY gets picked up !  I love my apartment but the staff from when I moved in to now is a dramatic CHANGE !

resp.text: Kadija Booker, we regret to hear that you had a negative experience with us, but would appreciate the chance to turn your experience around. We would like to work towards a resolution, so if you are willing, please reach out to us at (205) 591-4728 to discuss this further.

name: Jamie Janell
text: Their crooks! Mangament is a joke! I filled out an application;was approved. Gave 200.00 for admin so I was told. But b/c they gave false info on the website about what school is in their district I've decided not to move in.  Haven't signed anything yet the property manager told me its nonrefundable which is listed nowhere on the site neither was I told this. But the property manager said its the law! Which is false info. Asked for corporate number was given wrong number Team doesn't communicate with each other. I know all this from filling out an application smh

resp.text: Jamie, we appreciate you reaching out, though we wish it was to share a better experience. Please be assured that we work hard to provide timely and efficient service. We're disappointed to know that we fell short of that with you. We'll be sure to keep your feedback in mind as we move forward and continue to improve things for our future and current residents. If you'd like to discuss any of this in more detail with our team, please feel free to reach out to us directly. Thank you.

name: kimbberly3
text: I just love the manager here she is so sweet!

resp.text: Hi Kimbberly3, we are very happy to have provided you with such a positive experience!

name: Richard Thompson
text: Great office staff and maintenace is so quick to respond!

resp.text: Hi Laurance Thompson, thank you so much for your positive comments about The Park at Alloa Apartments! If you ever need anything else from us, please feel free to give us a call or stop by. Have an awesome day!

name: Latosha Gresham
text: Alloa have an exceptionally atmosphere and the decorations are nicely picked, and the maintenance is on point too.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a five-star rating. If you have any additional feedback regarding your time at Park at Alloa then give us a call.

name: Nicholas Smith
text: Never moved in but the staff were extremely helpful and friendly, during the application process!

resp.text: Nicholas, thank you for the positive feedback. Feel free to give us a call if you're ever interested in our community again.

name: Cheryl Duncan
text: The Park at Alloa is a nice community.  The staff is  professional and helpful.

resp.text: Cheryl Duncan, thank you for your kind words and this wonderful review! Have a great day!

name: Jackie McKinney
text: Just want to share with you the great service that is always given when maintenance is called. This is the type of property I like to live in. Thanks The Park at Alloa

resp.text: Jackie, thank you for the wonderful five-star rating of Park at Alloa! It makes our day to learn that you’re having a great experience in our community. Feel free to give us a call if you have any additional comments, questions, or concerns.

name: Annesha King
text: It is a nice complex. I have not encountered any problems with my apartment or the surrounding environment.

resp.text: Annesha, thank you for taking the time to leave us this 5-star rating. We’re overjoyed to see that you’re enjoying your residency at the Park at Alloa! Please contact our team next time you need our assistance.

name: Doby Mickk
text: I lived here in the past. Rented a two bedroom. When lease was up, signed another one for a three bedroom. After a few years away im signing another lease there again. It might not be the shangrila, but the grounds are kept well, i always remeber seeing maint dudes fliting around and the staff have always been helpful.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words and support! It's great to hear you had such a wonderful experience and it will be wonderful to have you back as a member of our community! We hope you'll enjoy it just as much as you did the first time. If any questions or requests ever arise, please do not hesitate to stop by our office. Thank you again!

name: Josilynn Janay
text: Management in the rent office sucks .. need more people WHO are willing tó do their jobs! They lock the rent office doors when they arent supposed tó. The only good thing is maintnence the people in the rent office are slow. Please stop hiring retards

resp.text: We are sad to see you feel this way about our team, Josilynn. We make sure every member of our office team is a superb worker who is able to keep our community running smoothly. If you have concerns over any interaction you have had, we are always looking for feedback so come by when you get a chance so we can work on addressing your concerns.

name: Michelle Cranor (FunSiZe)
text: I have lived in this apartments since Jan and it has been nothing but horrible. I live in the bottom apartment and all I can say is the people above me dont EVER sleep or sit down. You hear EVERYTHING from them going to the bathroom, the tv down to them sweeping the floor. The day we moved in we put in a maintance request. Sadly, we are still waiting for things to be fix. They recently changed owners and yet we are still waiting to see changes. They opened the pool but the hours do not stay open according to what they say. Please do not waste your money, time or experience living here. Nothing but horrible memories to come by.

resp.text:
Hello,

Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We are sorry to hear you have not been satisfied. We can assure you making our residents happy is our top priority. We would love to sit down with you to discuss your concerns. Please contact the leasing office at your earliest convenience to schedule a meeting. Thank you.

-The Park at Alloa

name: leanne smith
text: anyone who thinks changing the name and color of the buildings makes it ok to raise the rent 200$ is utterly retarded my apartment in building 6200 is infested with mice I moved from the 800 building cause the building has a crack in the foundation and my whole apartment flooded with ground water which they never fixed and kept telling me they were gonna move me and my two kids out of the apartment now covered in two inches of water idk how they expected me to live here I fell like they dont care and they do nothing but im still supposed to pay an obsurdly high rent when there is never anyone in the office and when they are they are incompetent I wouldnt want anyone to live here please look somewhere else

resp.text:
Hello Leanne,

We thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback and are sorry to see you have not been satisfied. In addition, we would like to apologize for our delayed response to your review. If your concern has not yet been addressed, please contact someone from our leasing office, and we will be happy to assist you.

-The Park at Alloa

name: Paula Boyd
text: These apartments are infested with roaches! The website is very deceiving.

resp.text: We sorry to learn that your time in our community has not met your expectations. Our community has pest control available for our residents so we kindly ask that you stop by our office at your earliest convenience. We look forward to providing you with the five-star experience that you deserve.

name: Syneta Jones
text: Staff has been nothing but helpful since I been there and it’s been a year now iam signing for another year 5 stars from me

resp.text: We are so delighted to hear that you will be staying with us for longer, Syneta. Our team appreciates your compliments and we sincerely hope you continue to like it here. Please let us now if this is ever not the case.

name: Erika Hubbard
text: The office staff and maintenance team are very professional and friendly.

resp.text: Erika Hubbard, we strive for 100% satisfaction, and it is great to see you had such a positive experience at The Park at Alloa Apartments. If you ever need anything else from us, please feel free to give us a call or stop by. Have an awesome day!

name: Anton Williams
text: I'm new to area is it real bad with mice ???

resp.text: Hi there. Although mice are common in our state, it is always our goal to keep them out of the home. If you find you are experiencing problems with mice in your home in our community, please contact our office so we can take steps to alleviate the problem. We hope you enjoy your time here!

name: Yolanda McCain
text: After leaving here

resp.text: Yolanda, it’s upsetting to learn that you had a difficult time in our community. We can assure you the comfort and well-being of our residents is our top priority. If you have any additional comments, questions, or concerns then don’t hesitate to give us a call. Thank you.

name: Khari Hines
text: I live there

resp.text:
Hello,

Thank you for taking the time to post a review. We are happy to hear you have been satisfied with our service. Our residents' happiness is our number one priority.

-The Park at Alloa

name: Matthew Sheldon
text:
I've worked with quite a few property managers over the years, and I have to say, I genuinely enjoy working with Southern Homes.

The staff and owner have been nothing but accommodating and thorough in taking care of my properties. They have risen to the challenges as they come up and have gone out of their way in accommodating my properties needs.

Highly recommend.

name: colleen merkins
text: Our house has been destroyed under the (mis)management of this company twice. 2018 we paid $35,000 to repair damages and now, in 2020, it will cost another $5,000-$6,000. This does not include the months of rent we are owed. The "manager" has never checked on the home nor have the attempted to collect past due rents. The house, which was 2 years old when we turned it over to them is now dilapidated and infested with mice and roaches. The head of the agency is shady and refuses to accept responsibility for his neglect as the person being paid to manage the property. The neighbor's dog could have done a better job of managing my house and I regret ever entrusting our home to this agency.

name: William Sanders
text: Would’ve gave him a 10 star review if possible I definitely recommend him for your tax needs

name: Janet Tucker
text: Ive enjoyed renting Tonsmeire properties! They’ve worked with me through everything and were great through Hurricane Sally. I just want to give a shout-out to Scott Mckinny. He is the best!! He takes time to explain things, very friendly to my family, and does what he says he is going to do. Provides excellent service.

resp.text: Janet, thank you so much for this wonderful review!

name: Sandy Benefield
text: I have rented a Fairhope house for the last 5+ years from Tonsmeire Properties. This group is very professional and exceptionally fast responding to any issue you may have. They are always available to discuss and give guidance on issues that arise. I highly recommend them with high praises.

resp.text: Sandy, thank you so much for taking the time to leave this wonderful rating and review! We truly appreciate it.

name: Jamie Sawyer
text: The best landlords!  I love my home in Fairhope.  Highly recommend Tonsmiere properties!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Jamie!

name: mary kelley
text: Fabulous company...very professional.

resp.text: We love hearing this, Mary! Thank you!

name: Sheryl Coffel
text: Great company!

resp.text: Thank you, Sheryl!

name: Mr Dave
text:
Beware of the pot holes, which appear as sink holes in the driveway,
There are plenty, and a couple are plenty  deep

name: Jackie Owens
text: RUN AWAY. You don't want to live here. They won't fix anything, they only cut the grass around the office. We have complained about the weeds and grass not being cut since we moved in. The landscape company came twice in 3 months and only cut part of the grass. They don't  show what kind of shape the ameneties are in, nor do that show you the real apartment you are getting. We are paying for an "upgraded" apartment that has multiple maintenance issues that have not been addressed since we moved in in MARCH. The apartment has a bug infestation that has still not been taken care of. The "gym" is a joke. The management is unconcerned and will not handle complaints. The management company that owns the property in Montgomery has not responded to four emails concerning my complaints. There are nicer complexes for less or even the same price range. Look elsewhere.

name: Rubba Alastal
text: It has been five months since I moved out and still didn’t get my deposit back to me. I had lived in different apartments and Lenxes Gates by far the worst of all. I don’t recommend to anyone.

name: matthew gray
text: I would like to appreciate the excellent service and professional experience we receive from Lenox Gates Apartments. These apartments are beautiful and clean with many amenities! They care about their residents and it’s in a great location. The pricing is phenomenal considering how big the apartments are from the inside! Would recommend this place to anyone looking for a place to call home.

name: Anne Marie S
text: Terrible. There are much nicer apartments in the area around the same price range. The grounds aren't kept up to par, the parking lot needs repaving, the apartments are dated.... The management company is terrible. The office staff... I don't even know where to start there. I guarantee you there are some Fair Housing violations going on in that office because you never get the same answer twice. All residents should be treated equal. That is Fair Housing 101. The assistant manager, MaKenzie, is rude and disrespectful at best. She should not be working with the public. What happened to Kim and Robin? Although Kim was firm, she was fair across the board and Robin was always friendly and eager to help. Good Customer Service goes a long way is all I'm saying.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback and rating. If we failed to meet your expectations, we sincerely apologize. This sounds like an opportunity for some reconciliation through listening. If you would like to share details of your experience with management, please fill out a comment form at www.bandm.org. The social media team will facilitate some communication for you. Note: While this response was being written, the regional manager has already seen this review and responded that she is looking into your concerns. Thank you for contributing to the feedback loop.

name: Alex Calder
text: No apartment complex is going to be perfect. That's an unreasonable expectation. The women at the front were nothing but kind, and they are always on the ball. We have had to call maintenance several times for very minuscule things and it has taken under an hour for them to knock on my door. The grounds are not perfect, but the place is surrounded by trees so I mean what do you expect? I am VERY VERY VERY picky about where I choose to make my home and have somewhat unreasonably high expectations, and Lenox Gates has been awesome. The interior of my apartment is nice, the neighbors are all nice, and the parking situation has never been a problem. Yes, the gates have been damaged or out of commission but it is fixed within a reasonable amount of time. I mean stuff like that happens, you cannot be upset about it. I would recommend this place to anyone. Our rent is only about 3 bucks more a month because a trash fee is tacked on, which is nothing and again reasonable because the grounds are free of trash and the trash compactor is great to have. They kept their word on everything, and you don't lose an arm and a leg for such a great place to live. Lenox Gates deserves 5 stars and nothing less.

name: Kaitlin Saunders
text: We moved in 6 months ago and have absolutely nothing to complain about. The neighbors are friendly, parking is good, the pool is always clean, as well as the grounds, and the staff are amazing. Maintenance requests are taken care of quickly. Prices are a tad high but we feel the cost is worth it.

resp.text: Hooray for a great review! Thank you Kaitlin. We value our residents and community and take pride in providing a great place to live. Your positive comments mean a great deal to us because we truly strive to have loyal residents. Thanks again!

name: Katrice Edwards
text: Lenox Gates is an awesome place to live. I have no complaints. The apartment has a lot of space. I havent had anything to malfunction while staying there.

resp.text: Thank you so much M. Edwards. We love your feedback. We value our residents and community and take pride in providing a great place to live. Your positive comments mean a great deal to us because we truly strive to have loyal residents. Thanks again!

name: Brittany Gibson
text: I really do love Lenox gates, the staff is nothing but nice, the apartment complex could use some updating but other than that I'm happy with living here

resp.text: Thank you very much for your feedback. We value our residents and community and take pride in providing a great place to live. Your positive comments mean a great deal to us because we truly strive to have loyal residents. Thanks again!

name: tony chaney
text: Over priced. Took them forever to get maintenance to do a work order and when they did, it was a patch job

resp.text: M. Chaney, thank you for your feedback. We value our residents and take pride in providing a great place to live. Your comments about maintenance procedures help us know how to focus efforts, training and investment. We sincerely hope to improve your experience, opinion and rating of this beautiful property. Thank you again for taking time to help us improve.

name: Jessica Smith
text: Horrible, People feel the need to stomp up stairs and it gets neighbors rowdy and it isn't worth it .

resp.text: Thank you for your recent feedback. We value our residents and work hard to create a positive community atmosphere. We also thank you for choosing to make your home with us!

name: Jenn Knodel
text: Spacious rooms, gorgeous pool, and affordable!

name: meagan land
text:
My experience here wasn’t too great. I was looking for a 1 bedroom apartment, and thankfully there was 1 left. I was able to do a walkthrough of the apartment. It was very spacious for a 1 bedroom. There is a pool and dog park, which was perfect because I have a dog. I was excited to apply, but was told to wait because “someone else is interested in applying.” I’ve never been told to wait to apply in case someone else wants it? Weird. So a few days pass and I called almost every day trying to get an update on whether or not to turn my application in. Every day I was told, “oh he’s supposed to be here tomorrow/this afternoon/etc” so at that point I was getting irritated. I had all the money to move in. You’d think they’d be excited to take my money and move me in but whatever. I called exactly a week ago (Friday, 9/11) and was told that she’d have answer for me the following Monday. Never heard from her, and honestly I dodged a bullet.
I know for sure it was because of how young I am.(20) While touring the apartment she was telling me this is a quiet community, everyone there is like a family, lots of elder residents, and they take noise very seriously. I understand all of that and I’m a quiet and reserved person myself so I thought it would be a perfect fit.
The lack communication is astounding. It’s an apartment, if she would’ve been honest and said no from the get-go I would’ve moved on and looked elsewhere. But I was just left hanging. Very unprofessional, but like I said I dodged a bullet.

name: Mischelle Ross
text: I have lived here many years and have consistently been pleased.  It is quiet and feels more like a home than an apartment community.  Karen, the manager is professional and honest; she is also helpful and caring.  The maintenance staff has always been helpful and pleasant, even when one of them has had to deal with an after hours emergency.  Everyone needs personal time, yet the guys never fail to show up, fix the problem, and assure you it was the right thing to do.  I am deeply appreciative of this hardworking crew.

name: Sofeeca Garrison
text: Totally Good!

name: Jeremy Owen
text: This is a "get what you pay for" kinda review, I lived here for a little over two years and never had a single problem. It's not the most updated and isn't in the most upscale area but as far as rent paid, neighbors, and places around to shop it's great. Definitely recommend but keep in mind it's a bit dated.

name: Hailey Hines
text: If I could give them ZERO stars I would. Absolutely do not move here if you have kids, unless you want them around cockroaches. Maintenance men dont fix anything. Pest control wont come. Our heat went out, and it took them a week and a half to do anything about it, at the beginning of December. Our apartment got down to 55 degrees, being on the upper level. And it was over a week before they even brought a heater. I wouldnt recommend this complex to my worst enemy.

name: Linda Gray
text: My mother rents here. Last weekend her apartment and another apartment flooded. My mom is 88 years old sight impaired, and uses a walker. Even though her apartment was not habitable they refused to provide another apartment or hotel room for her. As management told me, "we know what we can get by with. Get a lawyer."

name: denys martin
text: The management's handling of children playing at a pool is uncalled for and racist! My children were visiting their other parent and went swimming! They were told they being hoodlums and rambunctious?! How?! I didn't know it was a crime for CHILDREN to laugh and play in a pool in Summer! Now, because of the children playing their other parent is getting evicted?! Wow! Huntsville is one of the most racists places I have ever lived and Imperial Gardens is definitely run by racists and people who don't understand children play!

name: Collin Campbell
text:
Absolutely terrible place to live.

Cockroaches constantly. Poor insulation, both A/C and heat have gone out at several points. Aggressive and harassing neighbors. Apartment was broken into and robbed -management did nothing. Management did nothing about any and every issue that came up. I am absolutely begging you to look elsewhere for a place to live. Unless you don't care about drug addicts coming up to your car or front door at all random times asking for money.

name: Windy Langford
text: Great place to stay very quite and peaceful just beautiful!!!

name: Amarachi P Prince
text: Kinda secured

name: James Underwood
text: The apartment complex staff was very attentive to my requests and if I had any issues they resolved them quickly. Its an older apartment complex, which should go without saying; it has it's imperfections. I couldn't find a place in the area that offered the amenities and room for such a low price as Executive Lodge.

name: Terry Stepp
text:
I rented from Executive Lodge because they were managed by Sealy Realty and I had rented from them before in Tuscaloosa. The company is very quick to respond to work order issues and was always professional and had friendly staff. I'm pleased to say the same is true at Executive Lodge.

Move-in was effortless and the place I rented was perfect. Shannon was also very friendly and was excellent at coordinating and communicating with me as the process moved along.  To anyone looking for a good company to rent from I give my highest recommendation to Sealy Realty and I encourage you check out Executive Lodge if you are looking for a place in the heart of Huntsville close to the UAH and at a very reasonable price.

name: purva diwanji
text:
I moved into a 2 Bed 1 Bath here a year ago when I moved to Huntsville, and I have absolutely loved my stay here. All the people at the office are very helpful, and promptly respond to any issues. I've barely had 4-5 maintenance issues in the past year and they were immediately resolved, always within a day . I'll be moving out soon but that's only for want of a bigger space, with 3 bedrooms, which if they get in the future, I would definitely come back here.

A special shoutout to Rebekah and Rachel, for making us feel at home. :)

name: Duane Clemons
text: I am from out of town but will soon be relocating to Huntsville. Firstly, I would just like to say the apartments themselves are nice and clean as well as complex itself. Second, the staff are very professional and nice, especially the woman I spoke to named Rebekah. She was very polite, professional, nice, and seemed genuinely concerned about my transition to Huntsville and finding the right place for me to stay. I have picked Executive and will most definitely be moving here when I relocate. Hopefully my experiences continue to be nothing but positive once I move!

name: Britt
text: Asked a lot of questions and they sighed between each answer to my question. I am sorry I'm not used to the area. I don't think I'll make an appointment to see an apartment. I'll look elsewhere.

resp.text:
Hi Britt,
We are very sorry if you had a negative experience at our community. We would love to hear your feedback on what happened so that we can try to improve our community for you and all of our residents as well. Please reach out to us at executivelodge@sealyrealty.com and let us know how we can help.

name: Nicole Nix
text: Executive Lodge has been an amazing place to live.  The ladies that work in the front office are always very welcoming and accommodating.  They make you feel at home.  The apartments are well taken care of and  I have not had any issues since living here

name: Stephany J. Spencer
text: I have thoroughly enjoyed my time here. I am thankful to the ladies in the front office and all the help and support they provide, as well as their support and professionalism in handling all of my questions and maintenance issues. Their responses are timely and sincere, and you can truly tell they care about you!

name: mike b
text: Lived at Executive Lodge for 6 1/2 months in a 1/1 unit.  Clean, well maintained.  Night security.  No crime.  Appears staff do a pretty good job keeping the riff-raff out.  Office staff are friendly and helpful.  Would live there again.  Free gym dues at Powerhouse.  You could easily do worse.

name: Ardie Elgersma
text: I had a very good experience here doing corporate rental. The office staff are terrific. Only downside was the one neighbor who had people coming and going at all times of the day and night. That could happen everywhere.

name: Alice Cotton
text: The staff and especially Jessica made the leasing process painless and quick.  Apartments are nice and well kept. (181)

name: Matthew Dye
text: Executive Lodge is very clean and well kept! The lady’s in the office make sure the stay is very welcoming and make you feel like your at home!

name: Robert Young
text: I have lived here about 3 months and have had no problems of any type.  The management has been very professional, calling me by name when I come in the office.  They have been very responsible for the few very minor issues that I have had.  The apartments are very well kept and the grounds are clean and well landscaped.  From my experience, I would recommend this location for short term and TDY travellers.

name: LaTeira Owens
text: Apt 2- love the area and friendly staff. The neighborhood is quiet and well kept!

name: Sandy Yazzie
text: The staff here is great to work with. My apartment is beautiful, it's quiet and the apartment complex is very well kept.

name: Sierra Bolton
text: The rent here is to high. They are charging us almost 700 dollars for a studio!!!! The people that are suppose to be security guards are horrible. They don’t do there jobs and the one with the white truck is a stalker. He is a Hispanic guy with tattoos on him. And they won’t even let us get out our lease. He won’t leave us alone and they said they can’t do nothing about it. I will never ever come here again. This is the worst apartment complex I have very stayed in.

name: Rebekah Montgomery
text: We are truly a blessed staff, and property to have such wonderful residents!

name: Deepak A
text: Good apartments with very small closets. Leasing office people are very friendly..

name: Christina Goodman
text: Been here for a almost a year! Everything is great from staff to the apartment! ❤️

name: William Porter
text: Great people, clean and neat grounds

name: Elyse Esparza
text: Executive Lodge is very clean and well kept! The lady’s in the office go above and beyond with solving problems and making everyone feel welcomed!

name: Mykel Purifoy
text: Wonderful staff and great place to live.

name: Jaylyn Ligon
text:
my brother asked me to write this review for him.
I have been a resident of executive lodge for 4 years now and lets just say I should have left 3 years ago because this past year has been awful!! I have never seen such rude and nasty people in my life. I wouldn't advise anyone to move here if you don't want to be treated like a human being. The employees are just terrible. My roommate and I have been treated wrong even though we are good residents. I give them one star.

name: Monzir Hafiz
text: Today is the first day in my life to have dealt with the worst management ever; unreliable, unprofessional, and irresponsible. Executive Lodge is the worst example of treatment and they are impossible to deal with.

name: greg mabe
text: Very nice friendly staff

name: alex cfchran
text: Worst place to live

name: Jim Fisher
text: Great call now

name: Shae Johnson
text: the people here are so disrespectful and its sad

name: Colby Morris
text: I have mostly good things to say about Tapestry after having stayed here for almost 2 years now. It's safe, the staff is prompt and accommodating, and I have had no issues with loud neighbors. My only real complaint is the lack of signs with building numbers. I dread having things delivered because I know the drivers will be lost when they try to find my apartment, assuming they even make it through the gates. So that's why I am giving 3 stars. If you are considering moving here and you get a lot of stuff delivered, please take this into consideration, or better yet, swing by and see for yourself how confusing this place is.

name: raina eva
text: lived here for 2 years. this is NOT a gated community, has closed gates maybe for 2 days because it takes months to fix it? unsafe area, multiple cars broken into (I should have read the reviews before). no sense of security at all my entire lease. pool is rarely cleaned, has been green for the past week...it's the middle of July we would want to use it. way too overpriced for not even getting all the amenities. be careful here. I've reached out to the office multiple times. nothing offered for our troubles.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We are so sorry to see your experience has been less than exceptional.  The phase 2 pool had an issue with the pool motor, but this was repaired this past  Friday.  The phase one pool is open for you to use as well.  Please stay tuned, there are exciting changes coming for the gates.  Emails will be going out! I invite you to contact me and I will be happy to discuss any issue.  Thank you again, Lisa A.

name: Lorenzo Thompson
text: A place that truly feels like home. The Tapestry park team is excellent. Alicia and Lisa at the leasing office are kind and take good care of the community. Property managers are always taking care of necessary issues if any. Billy and David from maintenance are great!!! The maintenance team at tapestry truly deserves recognition for their expertise and attitude. Continue the great job guys!!!

resp.text: Lorenzo thank you for the 5 star review!  We are so pleased that you love your home here at Tapestry Park.  Our team is here to help you have the best experience possible.  We look forward to having you as part of our community for a long time to come!  Thank you again!

name: Jada Cox
text:
I’m a new resident and once my lease is done I will not be resigning with this complex again. They were not up front about all of their charges, the gates are never closed, and I’ve had issues with stenches (smells) throughout my apartment. It’s a beautiful complex to say the lease but I’d prefer when businesses are upfront and thorough. I was lied to during my tour about how water/sewage was monitored. I was also not informed about trash fees only valet trash fees.

And in response to Tapestry who left the message underneath my review... I’ve already contacted your office and the person that I spoke with (I won’t disclose her name because it’s not her fault ) basically said there’s nothing that can be done because the person who gave me this info doesn’t work there anymore but I have a paper with all the information this person gave me and it mention nothing about the $20 fee for trash only the $30 fee for valet. And it does not specify about the sewage only water.

resp.text:
Hi Jada,
Thank you for your review. We are so sorry for the issues that you have been experiencing.  We invite you to contact the office so we may discuss these matters further 205-599-5599.  Thank you again.

name: Jessica Pickering
text: Tapestry Park is one of my favorite places I have ever lived. It is so convenient to Downtown Birmingham and UAB and to all the shopping and restaurants you could want. The staff is amazing and is always so nice and accommodating! The apartments are really updated and if anything ever did stop working the maintenance team is quick and super sweet. I would still be living there but I relocated for my job. 10/10!

resp.text: Hi Jessica, thank you for your 5 star review! We are so pleased that you enjoyed your time here at Tapestry Park! You are right, our location is super convenient to Downtown and many other local attractions.  Our is team is always happy to assist our residents. We hope that if you ever make your way back to Birmingham that you would consider Tapestry again. Thank you again! Lisa

name: Roderick Smith
text: Appears to be a well kept place...

name: Cindy Trotman
text: My daughter has been living here for about 6 months and has loved it!  Recently her purse was stolen and her apartment keys were in her purse so she couldn't get in.  The office staff and the maintenance guy went over the top to make sure she got in and was safe.  David from maintenance was so extremely nice and helpful!  He was overly helpful and made her feel so much better!

resp.text: Hi Cindy, Thank you for your 5 star review! We are so pleased that your daughter is loving her home!  We are here to assist our residents in any way possible!  Glad she is proud to call Tapestry Park home!  Thank you again, Lisa

name: Trenton McDaniel
text: I absolutely loved living here. The community is so sweet & the staff is the best. Always so responsive & genuinely cares about your experience at Tapestry. 10 stars if I could. I only moved out because I moved away from Birmingham.

resp.text: Hi Trenton, thank you for the 5 star review!  We are so pleased that you loved Tapestry Park so much! You are right, we have a great community!  Its residents like you that make it such a great place to call home! Thank you again! Lisa

name: Vicki Kersey
text: Never have I been so frustrated !! I can't even get a response from this apartment complex either in email or by leaving a voicemail because no one answers the phone. The turnover in personnel and multiple stories of what is acceptable is misleading and deceptive. If I could give them a negative response I would. I will never consider this apartment complex again!!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you for your review. I apologize for any issues that you have been experiencing.  If you need further assistance, please contact me at 205-599-5599.  Kind regards, Lisa

name: Deseraye Samuel
