text: They are really nice apartments, all the staff are respectful 24/7 and always nice, and, if anything goes wrong they are fast about how to find a solution to whatever the problem was.

resp.text: Thank you Deseraye for the 5 star review!  We are so pleased that you love our community! Best, Lisa

name: Annabelle DeCamillis
text:
Every unit has different prices, and each year they’d raise our unit up by at least $100 a month, even after we switched units to avoid the raise. While they look like pretty luxury apartments, everything is very cheaply made. We had 2 doorknobs completely fall off in both units. In the second unit we lived in, the doorknob to the bedroom was already hanging off completely. Maintenance isn’t great. While they’re nice, they don’t actually fix anything until they have to. We had the heat and AC break at least 12 times before they finally replaced a part to actually fix it. Often in 90-100 degree weather when we were trying to work from home.

The management had maintenance keep up the grounds to an annoying and unnecessary degree. Ive been power washed when stepping out of my front porch. The halls reek of gasoline once a week so bad it comes in the apartment bc they leaf blow constantly. They are obsessed with keeping up appearances but don’t actually fix the important things.

The gates worked ONE day in the 2 years I lived there, no joke. We chose that place because it was a gated community. It is not a gated community, and it is not safe. There were constant break-ins in cars and apartments. One car was set fire and literally reduced to ash. The management would do nothing. No security, no cameras, no gates. They would however send an email every once in a while explaining that they aren’t liable for breaks ins and they keep up “certain security measures.” And that any breaks ins are our responsibility? Also there are no security measures, as I stated. They also are terrible at managing packages and deliveries.

They charge you $25 a month for valet trash, but they only take one bag and often skip MANY days, and the dumpster is usually full. So we’ll get an email saying “don’t leave your trash outside the door, the dumpster is full and valet isn’t coming.” so we’re expected to keep bags of trash inside for days? No one would, of course.

They don’t let dogs off leash and yet put tons of large obstacle course things in the one, TINY area for dogs. So now dogs can’t even run around in there. No one’s dogs would do obstacles of course, so no one goes to the “park” (tiny fenced in area) anymore. There’s no nearby roads good to walk dogs.

Neighbors are mostly med students living of their parents money. Seriously. Everyone drives very VERY fast through the property, even though there’s always someone walking their dog. People tail you like crazy, everyone’s just pretty rude. I’ve also seen a couple of med students just swing their car door open and hit the car next to them without caring. It’s a pretty stuck up community.

Oh, and there’s hardly ever available parking. The lot is almost always full when you come home at night. Very hard to find parking.

The management is not helpful at all. While they are friendly, it’s absolutely a front. If you ask for help, they suddenly become cold and unreasonable. Very two-faced. They just don’t care and are actually pretty rude if you ask for ANY help.

Definitely the worst management I've ever dealt with. And this was supposedly the fanciest place I've lived. Not worth it. Not safe, just exhausting.

resp.text:
Hi Annabelle,
Thank you for your review.  I am so sorry that we did not live up to your expectations. We strive to provide everyone a positive experience, We would love to talk with your about your concerns.  We invite you to call us at 205-599-5599.  Thank you again.

name: Tristen Finch
text: nice grounds with  fast acting staff.

resp.text: Thank you for your 5 star review!  Our team is happy to take care of our residents and provide a great place to call home!  Thank you again!

name: Jaye Hughes
text: Loved living here at Tapestry Park! It was very painful saying goodbye. The office staff and maintenance team were absolutely amazing which made me enjoy my living experience here even more! Forever in my heart!

resp.text: Thank you, Jaye, for your kind review we truly appreciate it!  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your experience and hated to see you go!  We hope that you will keep us in mind if you should need an apartment in the future! Thank you again! Lisa A.

name: Daniel Brake
text: My wife and I have lived at Tapestry Park for almost two years now and have had a great experience. We have lived in two different units during our time here and have loved both of them. The staff at Tapestry is incredibly helpful and have addressed any maintenance issues quickly and graciously. I have recommended Tapestry Park to several friends and will continue to do so!

resp.text: Hi Daniel,  Thank you for the review! We are so pleased that you are loving your home!  If there is anything we can do, please do not hesitate to let us know!  Thank you for recommending us to your friends.  Best, Lisa A

name: Roy ORR
text: Nice apartments.

name: Scott Fayard
text: Modern look, upscale! Good location

resp.text: Thank you for the positive review! Please let us know if we can help with anything in the future.

name: Kristian Cottle
text: Currently live here and my roommates visiting friend had her car broken into and my bf had his car broken into and stuff stolen. So much for a gated community. Def can’t wait to move out of this overly priced, no security guard, rude neighbors, apartment complex!

resp.text: Thank you for your review.  I am so sorry that happened.  Please contact the office at 205-599-5599 to discuss.  Thank you, Lisa A

name: William Standeffer III
text: My wife and I moved to Tapestry 4 weeks ago and are loving it! The leasing staff has done a great job helping us get settled into our apartment. They were a huge help answering all of our questions regarding available apartments before we signed our lease. Highly recommend!

resp.text:
Hi William,
Thank you for your kind review!  We are so happy that you and your wife are loving your new apartment!  We are excited to have you as part of our community!  Please know that our staff is here to help you have the best living experience possible.
Kind regards,
Lisa A.

name: David Ullman
text:
I've lived here 4 years.

Pros:
1)Excellent location if you work at UAB

Cons :
1) Overpriced
2) Break ins

In an attempt to fix Con #2 the gates have been "fixed". As outlined in the attached diagram. My advice, if you do move into these apartments do not move into the apartments in the back. Unless you enjoy driving lengthening your commute by 5 minutes driving in a circle.

resp.text:
Thank you for your review.  We apologize that you have had problems with the gates.  We will be opening the front gates during high traffic times to lessen any backups.  If you have any additional concerns, please do not hesitate to stop by the office.
Thank you again,
Lisa, Community Manager

name: Danice Carlisle
text: I recently renewed my lease for the third time. I can’t say enough positive things about my experience with the leasing manager, Lisa, and her staff. The maintenance department is always willing to go the extra mile to accommodate me. The grounds are beautiful and very well maintained and I most definitely enjoy the salt water pools and the gym.

resp.text:
Thank you for your kind review!  Our residents make our community a wonderful place to call home.  We are committed to providing the best experience possible. Thank you for continuing to be part of our community!
Lisa A.

name: Macy Spry
text: We have lived here for almost three years and the gates have only ever been closed for about 3 days. Apartments have been broken into as well as multiple cars broken into, but have seen no progress on the gates. Pools are great and well maintained; however, these gates have also been broken for multiple summers leading to the pools becoming very overcrowded with people who do not live in the complex. Great location and large apartment with responsive maintenance staff, but you could probably find something better for the price given all of the property issues

resp.text: Thank you for your review, we appreciate your feedback.  You are right, we have a great location and team.  We have had some issues with the gates.  We have some exciting changes coming in the next few weeks!  We are adding barrier arms in addition to the gates.  Please stay tuned to the community emails that we will be sending out with details.  If there is anything that I can assist you with, please know my door is always open.  Thank you again, Lisa A.

name: Kayla VanEtten
text: My best friend has lived in an upper level apartment here for about 5 years or more. Really nice gated community. The apartment has a great balcony overlooking some woods and two awesome spa type bathtubs. Nice sized kitchen and the bedrooms and closets are big. Also has a great outdoor pool area in walking distance. However sometimes finding a parking spot at the apartments is a problem and the three flights of stairs are less than convient when you have anything to carry especially if you had to park far away. But other than that no complaints it's beautiful every time I visit her.

resp.text: Hi Kayla, thank you for your review! You are right, our apartment homes are nicely appointed with very spacious rooms and the spa bathtubs are amazing. Our salt water pool is centrally located in the community.  Friends make the best neighbors!  We would love to have you as a part of our community as well.  I invite you to stop by the office for a tour! Thank you again, Lisa

name: Michael Pitt
text: After living here at Tapestry for almost 4 years I would absolutely recommend living here. The staff are always professional, friendly and on the ball. Maintenance request are taken care of within 24-48 hours almost every time we've needed something fixed or looked at. They're very good about following up on issues and letting you know the status of whats going on. The office staff are always empathetic to your situation and generally will immediately act on your issue. All maintenance staff are polite, professional and honest. The complex is full of greenery and always kept up by either the maintenance staff or the landscaping crew. We've also been very lucky with having respectful and polite neighbors.

resp.text: Thank you very much for your review! We are thankful to have you as a part of our community and are pleased that you love your home! Our team strives to provide the best service for all of our residents. We want to make sure everyone has a positive experience while residing at Tapestry Park. Thank you again for taking the time to review our community!

name: Slade Methvin
text: Great place to live! The rooms are spacious and well designed. The staff is great and very helpful with anything you need. Location is awesome too.

resp.text:
Thank you for your review! We are so pleased that you are enjoying your new home! Our staff is committed to providing the best experience possible for our residents.  You are right, our location is awesome! Thank you again!
Lisa A.

name: Maria Gramma
text: I have lived at The Tapestry for almost three years. My first comment would be...there is no place perfect...but...The Tapestry is as close to perfect as you will get. And, I have had an opportunity to review all the comments; and, I totally disagree with negative reflections regarding The Tapestry. As I said, nothing and nowhere is perfect but I can say to all that it is a pleasure to call The Tapestry my home! I commend the entire staff; as well, as a HUGH SHOUT OUT, for the maintenance team. They do an outstanding job to exceed every expectation to keep things working for all of us...they are always on! They make a commitment to fix something; they keep me updated and follow through to make sure all is done to meet my satisfaction. The Tapestry is a very welcoming community and I look forward to each day as I call this my home! I hope you can too!

resp.text: Hi Maria, Thank you for your 5 star review!  We strive to provide a positive experience and are so pleased that you are proud to call Tapestry Park home! We hope that you will continue to be a part of our community for a long time to come. Thank you again!

name: Edwina Farrow
text: I have had a great experience so far, been here just over a month and love it here! Much better than my previous apartment complex in Inverness!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to review Tapestry Park. We are so happy you love it here! Please reach out if we can help with anything at all. You can reach our office at 205-599-5599.

name: Emily Vansandt
text: my sister lives here and got her package stolen from the front door along with many other people’s packages, while the management watched the man steal them/was aware of what the man was doing. Also, they do not keep the gates closed like they should to prevent this. Poor management

resp.text:
Thank you for your review, we appreciate your feedback.  Our team filed a report with the police department regarding the packages.  All package delivery services have been notified and arrangements have been made. If you have any further questions, I invite you to contact our office.  Thank you again.
Lisa A.

name: Jesse Nagy
text: Always loud neighbors above. Paper thin walls and ceiling offer no rest for the weary. I would aside from issues independently mine, not a bad place, I wouldn't rely on the trash pickup or going to bed before the zoo above.

resp.text:
Hi Jesse,
Thank you for your review. We would love to speak with you directly regarding any concerns you may have. Please stop by the office and let us know what we can assist you with.  We are happy to help.  Thank you again.
Lisa A.

name: Richard Crum
text: I'd give zero stars if I could. This place was absolutely horrible. Don't believe the advertised prices and don't believe that this is a gated community. I lived there for 13 months and the gates worked for a grand total of 2 weeks. The gym is not maintained and they only clean common areas once a year. They also horde packages in the front off where you can only pick them up during their tiny windows of working hours. These are only the most frustrating items, there are tons more reasons to look elsewhere.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to review Tapestry Park. We are sorry to hear your experience was not positive. We value feedback and are always looking to improve our service. Please reach out at your earliest opportunity, you can reach us at 205-599-5599. Again, thank you for your feedback and we hope to speak with you soon.

name: John
text: Nice place

resp.text: Hi John, thank you for your 5 star review.  We are so pleased that you enjoy your home here at Tapestry Park!  Thanks again!

name: Hailey P
text: literally the worst management. takes a week for a simple work order to be noticed and still not complete. called front office and rude staff just hangs up after saying they'll look into it. its been another week and no progress. ALSO rates for the same floor plan WILL change and even be $300 cheaper every MONTH for another identical unit. huge scam. apartments are huge though but definitely not as advertised. elevators are not even in the apartment buildings for example. unless you sign for the cheapest rates, this place is not worth the hassle.

resp.text:
Hi Hailey, thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear your experience has been less than exceptional. In regard to the pricing, our prices change everyday based upon the market, and the availability. We have one building that has an elevator, because it is four stories.  We apologize for the issue with your service request.  No one on staff should ever be rude, I am very sorry for that happening and will address it with the staff. If you would please contact me at the office so we can discuss this further, it would be greatly appreciated.   Thank you again for your review.
Kind regards,
Lisa A.
Community Manager

name: Deborah Austin
text:
Beautiful apartment! Tall ceilings, large porch, easy parking, convenient location, trash pickup- love it!

The staff are so friendly and quick to respond, very helpful.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our community! We are so pleased that you are loving your new home and are thrilled to have you as part of our community. Please do not hesitate to let us know if there is anything we can do to further better your experience here at Tapestry Park.

name: Justin Lucas
text:
I submitted an application 2 weeks ago and have yet to hear back. The first money order was lost and even though I sent a photo of the receipt, it still hasn't been found. I then mailed another money order. Guess what? Wasn't found!!! It was delivered by certified mail and shows delivered. I'm now out of $100 and still no word. I haven't received a reply to emails or a call back. I've sent Lydia and Jessica over 6 emails. Not one word.

I'm sure management is unaware of these issues and I still want to live at Tapestry Park, but I think the office staff definitely needs approving.

name: Tommy Townsend
text: These apartments are super nice on the inside, kitchen islands, laundry rooms, his and her sinks. No idea how much it costs, but money being no factor I'd want to live here

resp.text:
Hi Tommy,
Thank you for your kind review!  We would love to have you as part of our community!  Please come out for a tour to find out more information.  We look forward to hearing from you soon! Thanks again!
Lisa A.

name: SeantheSwede
text: Great staff and apartments but very pricey. Would recommend.

resp.text:
Hi Sean, Thank you for your recommendation!  We do have great community and staff!    The best part is our residents, they are who make the community feel like home!  All the best,
Lisa A.

name: Corey DeLoach
text: Good luck getting an appointment at this place EVEN IF you’ve booked an appointment. We setup an appointment and were never seen. In fact, people cane in after us and were seen before we were. Not impressed.

name: L Johnson
text: Great location, beautiful apartments, maintenance is quick to respond to work orders, and the staff are nice and friendly.

resp.text:
Thank you for your review!  We really appreciate your kind feedback. We strive for everyone to have a positive experience and are so pleased that you are loving your home!
Kind regards,
Lisa A.

name: Haley Walters
text:
UPDATE: lived here for so long and can't remember when the gates actually work... so much for safety. building next to us literally got broken in and had tv stolen. hallways are gross from spilled trash stains = bugs... needs a pressure washing asap. beware of loud dogs living near you as well. gym could use more equipment its tiny. at least the apartments are a little more on the modern side
UPDATE - it is now november.... therefore way past summer, management still has not taken care of the problem with washing breezeways. gates are not closed, not our problem if they cannot handle outside issues, just would like the slightest bit of consistent safety for once

resp.text:
Thank you for your review.  We apologize that your experience has been less than exceptional. We are working to have the gates up soon and for solutions to help prevent them from being hit as often.  Now that summer is slowing down we will be pressure washing all the breezeways. I invite you to stop by the office to discuss any other issues.  Thank you again for your review.
Lisa A.

name: Kadykooo
text: I recently went on a tour at Tapestry Park since I have been thinking of moving locations in Birmingham. I was blown away by all the 5 star amenities and the central location of the apartment complex...not to mention the absolutely apartments are STUNNING. Would highly recommend

name: Ashley Dixon
text: The site is amazing, the area is also. The hospital is across the street, which I love. I just recently contacted them today about leasing information via internet (inquiry) and I am currently waiting on a response. I can't wait to hear from them...

name: Jessica Pickering
text: I was SO sad to leave these apartments! They were the nicest place I’ve ever lived and I would move back in a heartbeat if I ever relocate back to Birmingham. The office and maintenance staff is PHENOMENAL! If there are any issues they try their best to have them addressed and fixed as soon as possible. The location is amazing as well! You are just close enough to downtown to enjoy the perks of being 10 minutes from anything you could want, BUT you don’t pay a downtown price! It’s the best! An Uber ride is only about $8-$10 to downtown, Avondale, Lakeview, etc. It’s wonderful! You won’t regret living here!

resp.text:
Hi Jessica,
Thank you for your very kind review!  We have a great community that is very centrally located, especially to the downtown area!  The Tapestry Park Team is always happy to assist our residents to provide the best experience possible.  We wish you all the best with your future endeavors and hope that you will continue to consider our community if you ever move back to the area.   Thank you again!
Lisa A.

name: Ellen Davis
text: DON'T LIVE HERE! There are so many problems with this complex. Maintenance takes weeks to respond to requests, they charge you for trash pickup, but they never pick up trash, there are extreme mold and bug problems, and there is literally dog poop everywhere. Don't expect your packages to ever get to you. I've had 3 packages stolen in the past 2 months. Front office wont do anything about it. This is the WORST apartment complex i've ever lived in. STAY AWAY!

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. We apologize for any issues you have been experiencing. We invite you to stop by the office so we can discuss and address any concerns with you. Our office is open 7 days a week for your convenience. We strive to provide a positive living experience for all our residents and are available to help in any way possible. We look forward to speaking with you. Thank you again.

name: Johnathon Palomarez
text:
I am a new resident to Tapestry Park, and I love it here! The staff they have on hand at the office have been really easy to work with, and friendly. The maintenance staff will get the job done in a reasonable about of time and make sure that you are completely satisfied.

The apartments themselves are great, I love the location being minutes away from downtown Birmingham. It is also quite peaceful, I feel like I’m the one making all the noise when I am at home watching Netflix and my TV’s volume is on 10…

Overall, I would say that choosing to live at Tapestry Park has been one of the best decisions I’ve made in 2017 thus far.

name: Ray Grossman
text:
Outstanding service, outstanding facilities, and altogether an extremely pleasant place to live.

The staff is extremely friendly and has resolved any maintenance issues as soon as they occurred, and the apartments themselves are extremely nice and fairly close to downtown.

name: Katherine Joyce
text: I absolutely love living here! Tareka is by far the best leasing consultant I have ever met and is always so professional. And the property manager Lisa? Hands down the sweetest thing! They are always so helpful and kind. I was a little nervous to tour such a nice place when we came to look at the apartment, but everyone's just so nice! The mailman, the maintanence guys, even the neighbors! I really love living here. I encourage anyone who's looking for a great place to live, with an awesome property, and super friendly staff, THIS IS THE PLACE!

name: Bella Davis
text: When will the breezeways be washed? SO many stains going up to my apartment and not fun seeing it right in front my door every time from previous owners (about a year ago). Will the gates ever be closed for more than a couple days out the year? Will the light fixtures be actually working when driving in at night? Slow management.

resp.text:
Hi Bella, thank you for your review.  We are going building by building to pressure wash all areas. We have some exciting changes that we will be making to the gates this year. We are hopeful that this will elevate some of the issues we have had.  I invite you to stop by the office so we can discuss how we can improve your experience. Thank you again.
Lisa A.

name: Elizabeth Garriga
text: If I could give Tapestry no stars I would. We had a mold issue that maintenance would not fully address, as well as pretending it wasn't mold. When we first stated this problem, Tapestry refused to acknowledge it, and before we left apparently half of the buildings had some form of this problem. Additionally, the lease terms are unreasonable. Rent increased at least $100 every year with no improvements in quality, and the termination fee clause makes it impossible to get out of your lease with out breaking the bank.

name: amanda lopez
text: yep read the reviews before signing a lease here. full of false promises and blaming corporation. ive already talked to management multiple times throughout my year of being here, don't have the time or patience for it again.

resp.text:
Hi Amanda, Thank you for your review.  I am so sorry you had a less than perfect experience with us, we strive for excellence in all that we do and we are so sorry to hear we have fallen short.  I would love the opportunity to chat with you about how we could have made your stay in your apartment home more pleasurable.  Please let me know how we can connect to discuss opportunities to improve our residents’ experience.
Lisa A.

name: Matt Taylor
text: We had a good time

resp.text: Hi Matt, thank you for your review!  We are glad that you enjoyed your time at Tapestry Park! Please let us know if there is anything we can do for you.  Best, Lisa A.

name: Bailey Covington
text: overpriced for what you get. the experience with them has been exactly how the other reviewers said, especially in regards to service. issues brought up to management just get delayed for months because their hands are tied? wish they cared more for their residents.

resp.text:
Hi Bailey.  Thank you for your review.  I apologize for any issues that you have had.  I invite you to stop by the office or contact me so we can discuss and resolve any issues.  We are happy to assist you and want to do all we can to improve your experience.
Lisa A.

name: Robert Daniel
text: I moved in about a year ago. Best apartments I have ever lived in. Maintenance guys are friendly and knowledgeable. The office staff is always super polite. Lots of pretty people live here. Lol. The best is our leasing agent Tareka. I vote her to be the Employee of the Year!!!! Also Ms. Lisa the property manager has helped me get some things fixed that I could not fix myself(i.e. my crazy water bill).Thanks so much Tareka and Lisa. Yall help to make this a great place to live!

name: James Baker
text:
If you're looking for an apartment complex that operates like you expect one to operate, this is the is the one.
Of all the apartments I've lived in across Ga and Al this is by far the best. We've had an ac problem once but it was fixed immediately. They even replace light bulbs when they go out - within the hour most times. The maintenance staff is always available and always doing great work post haste. Many apts that say they do things like this but never actually do them or at least not in a resonable amount of time.
Tareka was our leasing consultant and has been awesome from day one. She has been helpful with all questions or concerns and has always conducted herself very professionally, yet warmly.
We recently had a problem with our water bill where we were being incorrectly charged for 4k gallons in a single day. Lisa the property manager stepped in and got the previously unhelpful company to correct the error. This is after we were told that they could not be wrong multiple times and ways.
The entire staff here has been overwelmingly great. Some very good descisions were made in the hiring of these folks. They do an exceptional job in the managment of this property.

Now, hit the call button, ask for Tareka and set an appointment today.

Thanks- from one happy tenant.

name: Nick L
text: Great place. Really friendly

name: evelyn kelley
text: I'm excited about the outside and from the photos that was shown I Love them. I need some prices

resp.text: We would love take you on a tour of the property. Please call the office at (205) 599-5599 to set up a time that is convenient for you. We look forward to hearing from you soon!

name: Hettie Yarbrough
text: I like to live there!

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We are so pleased that you are enjoying your home. If there is anything we can do, please do not hesitate to let us know. Thank you again!

name: Ramiro Monrroy
text:
(Translated by Google) Excellent place

(Original)
Exelente lugar

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your positive feedback. Please reach out if we can help with anything in the future.

name: Brianna Draper
text: Great place to live. Quiet and near everything. The maintenance is great! Friendly and quick. Very easy to pay your rent, valet trash is convenient. Price is very decent. Haven’t had any problems since I have lived here (July 2020).

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words about Chace Lake Villas, Brianna! We're glad our quiet community, with its top-notch staff and convenient location, has been such a great home for you. We appreciate your residency!

name: Breunca Meadows
text: To start off this was my second time living at Chace Lake. To begin it seemed as if every week there was a water shut off, sometimes with warning other times you were left just wondering why you didn't receive a warning. One occasion I witnessed lawn care blatantly blowing rocks and other trash under, on and around my car. I told management but apparently that did nothing. My car was broken into while on the premises and was pretty much told To make sure my doors were locked. Also my car was scratched and back into many times so beware of neighbors. Also As far as management Suzie was the only person that i didn't have a terrible experience with. Lisa Bearden who is the Community Manger, and Hunter Wright who was many times at the desk when going into the office either didn't pay attention to detail or just forgot things very easily. Upon moving out I signed the necessary documents but there seems to be a communication issue within the office. When one person told me one thing, someone else said something completely different.  I emailed Hunter and Lisa many times upon my move out date to make sure that everything was correct and that there wasn't a discrepancy in dates (which it was). Not even three days after my move out date I received a bill saying I stayed two extra days. The one star is sufficient due to the amount of headaches i received in the year living here. When moving in the apartment was not move in. You definitely don’t get your monies worth. Also whenever someone leaves a honest review they want to turn it around on the tenant. What does cleaning fees and damages have to do with the unorganized staff and cheaply put together apartment?

resp.text: Hi Breunca, thank you for leaving your comments. We are very sorry to learn you were disappointed in your experience at Chace Lake. We completely understand the frustrations and inconvenience that is caused when the water has to be shut off. Unfortunately, the property is unable to shut water off to individual units or isolated buildings; when a repair is required, they have to shut the whole property off temporarily. Because of this, whenever possible, management tries to notify residents at least 24 hours in advance. If it is an emergency, sometimes there is not enough time to provide advance notice. We hope this helps shed a little light on these occurrences! We are so sorry to hear about your car break-in. The team aims to provide the best advice and customer care. We understand there were some varying move-out dates between roommates, as well as a few damage and cleaning charges; if you have any questions about move-out charges, please don't hesitate to ask the office! We appreciate this opportunity to address some of your concerns. - Lindsay, Bell Customer Service

name: Morgan White
text:
I have lived here for 4 months.

PROS: We’ve had a few different maintenance issues, but Chace Lake is always pretty quick to respond. Plus Jeff and Kenny (maintenance men) are awesome- they make a great team & get the job done! Also I love our renovated unit, the dog park, pool, fitness center, plus the location of the complex in Hoover.

CONS: The dumpster at the front of the complex has been broken for several weeks, and the temporary dumpster with everyone’s trash is not a cute view out our window. Also our neighbors smoke, and that’s not cool with me.

resp.text: Morgan, thank you for choosing Chace Lake Villas! We're delighted to hear that our staff has gone above and beyond in making you feel right at home. We appreciate your feedback and welcome you to contact our office if you would like to go over your suggestions in more detail. We want you to experience the best in apartment living and are always happy to help!

name: Adamantia Paige
text: Considering I moved in right before all colleges in the area went back into session, I found this gem after searching about 20 other properties. The price was not bad and it was still in a great distance of my job, and so many other amenities the surrounding community had to offer. The property management and staff was super helpful, and did not overwhelm me with phone calls or emails to influence my decision to go with their property.  I have been here for over 2 years and have had the most amazing experience here. Yes, I had some amazing neighbors, and some very private neighbors, but everyone looked out for each other. The staff and maintenance teams were awesome, and super responsive to maintenance needs and other leasing questions. I had a leaking shower head at one point, and it was fixed within a day. My AC unit needed some attention, and it was resolved in the same day. Pest control is a great addition... many would complain, but never report it. You have to report it for them to handle it. I had no communication issues and resolution was what this property team would work to achieve... successfully. Thanks guys, for making my stay here one of my best experiences with a rental property.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review. We are so happy to hear that you love your community and Chace Lake Villas team. We are so sad to see you go and we wish you much success on your new adventure. Thank you again for the awesome review.

name: Kamesha Aaron
text: Shelby is AWESOME! She made my move in process a breeze. She was very consistent with keeping me updated on the entire process. I’ve been living here for about a month now & love it

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We are so happy you are enjoying your home at Chace Lake Villas. We are blessed to have Shelby on our team and glad to hear she took good care of you through the move in process. If you ever need anything in the future, please let us know. Thank you!

name: Shenetha Williams
text: I’ve been living here at Chace Lake for a little over 3 yrs and love every single thing about it. From nice office workers to having an awesome maintenance team that’s always prompt with fixing any issues to being in walking or driving distance to many stores and lastly being in a great school system. Just the other day I placed a work order late in the day , but the issue was fixed before the end of the day before I got home. Great place to live!!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review. We are happy to hear that you love your community and the staff is providing A+ living. Please let us know if there is anything we can help you with, and thank you for choosing to call Chace Lake Villas home.                                                                                                                                                                                  Chace Lake Villas Team

name: Shirley Grant
text: I lived here for one year and the experience was excellent. Maintenance is very quick to respond and resolve your issue. The management staff is phenomenal! If you are looking for a clean and quiet place to live, this is a great complex.

resp.text:
Thank you for leaving your feedback for Chace Lake Villas. We are so happy you experienced A+ living with us. We love hearing from our residents so that we can ensure we are providing the best possible living experience for everyone. Thank you again for the wonderful review!

– Chace Lake Villas Team

name: TAKEVIA RAY
text: I moved in one month ago and so far everything has been great! I called the rent office to ask when the maintenance people will be out to fix something in my apartment and they came out to fix it the next day! Maintenance and rent office staff are very friendly. When I first moved in the cabinets and everything was very clean! So far I’m happy I made chace lake my home and If everything continues to go smoothly I will be renewing my lease when it’s time to!

resp.text: Thank you for the A+ review. We strive to provide the best living experience possible and we're happy to hear that you love your community and staff. Please let us know if you should need anything and thank you for continuing to call Chace Lake Villas home.

name: Aneisha Will
text: Staff is awesome! The apartments are very nice and clean.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We are so happy to hear that we're doing an excellent job and we think you're awesome as well. Thank you for choosing to call Chace Lake Villas home!!                                                                                           The Chace Lake Villas Team

name: Rakia B
text: Their maintenance team is always quick and proficient! Any request you have, they do their best to get the job done!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review. We love to hear that our maintenance team is providing quick and proficient service and the best living experience possible. Thank you for choosing to call Chace Lake Villas home!

name: Amber Hammack
text:
Due to Corona we weren’t able to tour the apartment before signing our lease. We were told we were getting a second level apartment with hardwood throughout, but did not happen. We got all carpet on the 3rd floor. That complicates things with a toddler. I think they confused apartments or something. It was moving day, so we didn’t make a fuss. Other than that we love the apartment, community, and location The office staff is always friendly and helpful when we need them. Very clean and well kept, quite and friendly. We’ve had to have a few maintenance calls already and they have always been fixed the same day. No fuss or anything! I suggest making sure you get a walk through to confirm what you’re getting before signing a lease. Other than that, I 100% recommend renting from Chace Lake Villas.

Edit- the original review was written 2 months after moving in, and was request by the management. After living here for 12 months, I do not recommend Chace Lake. They’re trash compactor is always broken, they have a dumpster in front of our building that is FOREVER full and absolutely reeking. Our payments are always on autopay and we’ve NEVER missed a single payment, we extended our lease by a month and autopay didn’t automatically update so we were 7 days late. Instead of calling us to notify we had an issue, they leave a threatening letter on our door saying we have 7 days to pay or they’ll evict us. We then try to pay online the day of and then have to go to the office for a 3rd time to find out it has to be money order or cashiers check when it’s late. They’re now under new management which has done ONE thing since the transfer and that’s change our trash valet company. We have so many more issues that need to be addressed other than who takes our trash to the BROKEN trash compactor replacing, overflowing, dumpster. GET IT TOGETHER.

The only good thing about Chace Lake is maintenance. Everything else is a headache and not worth it.

resp.text:
Thank you for leaving your feedback for Chace Lake Villas. We are so happy you are experiencing an A+ living experience with us. We love hearing from our residents so that we can ensure we are providing the best possible living experience for everyone. We will keep your comments in mind as we continue to make improvements to our community. Please don't hesitate to reach out if there is anything else we can help you with!

– Chace Lake Villas Team

name: Fernanda Blandino
text: I have lived here for a year in a renovated apartment, I love it!  and when i request maintenance they come right away..

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review. We are so happy to hear that you love your home, and maintenance is providing A+ service. Thank you for choosing to call Chace Lake Villas home, and please let us know if we can help you in anyway.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Chace Lake Villas Managment

name: John Griffiths
text: Very good work, very fast response, staff could not be more helpful. Very pleased!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review! We love to hear from our residents that we are providing excellent customer service. Thank you for choosing to call Chace Lake Villas home!

name: Kelsie Davis
text: I love Mr Kenny! He’s always prompt and professional!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review. We Love Kenny too, and we're happy to hear that he is providing A+ service. We strive to provide the best living experience possible. Thank you for choosing to Call Chace Lake Villas home!

name: Markell Payne
text:
I've been a resident here for over 2 years. The community is really quiet, my neighbors are friendly, all of my amenities work and the current staff is decent.

I work from home during the summer months, so I wish the pool was open longer and the fitness center was better equipped.

The old manager, Benjamin, was extremely helpful. He was an excellent communicator, manager and he really took the time out to get to know the tenants. Every so often, he and his team would randomly pass breakfast out in the mornings!

name: serena Ni
text: It's been almost a month since I moved here. My house has been decorated. I like the floor very much, not the carpet. It's very convenient for me to clean. When I moved in, there were some problems. For example, there is a kitchen floor that doesn't stick together to make it curl. The sockets of the two toilets do not work properly. The water and leaks in the room made me wonder if it was really decorated. When I told the office staff about the repairs, they quickly solved the problem, but there was no leaks because it used to be an electric light. Now the repairman turns off the light and no one comes to reinstall it, but it's not a big problem for me. It can be solved slowly. I really live here. Staff members and neighbours are friendly and will greet warmly, but the sound insulation effect is not good enough. I live on the first floor and often hear the unknown Dong Dong Dong voice upstairs, but this is a problem with many rental houses. The reason for living here is the good location. Whether you go to the supermarket to buy something or do something, it's very convenient. My child likes swimming very much. But swimming pools are not always open. The gym is good. You can go in and out at any time. Generally speaking, this is a place worth living in.

name: Jennifer Hwang
text: Great location and great staff! I actually really love living here. For a one bedroom, I have everything I need and it's perfect for just myself. For a one bedroom, I still get a washer/dryer hook-ups and a dishwasher! Which most places at this price do not have. Also, maintenance is awesome. They always address the issue within 24 hours, sometimes same day. But I rarely have maintenance issues. This is not a fake review; I am a rent-paying resident. I love it here and plan on staying for as long as I can. Only downside is that rent is going up because of the renovations taking place, which is understandable, but I am living in a non-renovated unit.

resp.text: Hi Jennifer! Thank you for taking the time to write a review and leave your feedback for Chace Lake Villas. We are so happy to hear you had a positive experience with our maintenance team! We want all of our residents to feel at home in their apartment so we strive to work as quickly and efficiently as we can. Thanks again for your feedback! -Lauren, Bell Customer Service

name: Saige Barnett
text: This place is okay to rent from but it seems every week there is a water shut off. You might get a warning or you might not. Also if you stay in the non renovated apartment things break alot and we always have to get the maintenance man out. Also they close the pool like every other day for some other reason. Its been closed so much this year that I have been swimming at the YMCA which i wish I could swim in my apartment pool. The club house renovation took longer than expected. I feel the staff doesnt like me and the nice ones are the maintenance men. Parking here can be crazy. I park by the pool since I cant get a park by my apartment. I wont rent here again.

resp.text: Hi Saige, thank you for your review. We definitely understand your frustrations. Please know the team is making some internal changes and working to address some of the concerns you mention. To our knowledge, the pool is now open. We appreciate your feedback! - Lindsay, Bell Customer Service

name: Seth Muench
text: The apartment itself was not bad, comfortable roomy and overall not bad quality, the issue is with the office and the shady practices of the apartment in general. You're better off elsewhere.

resp.text: Hi Seth, we appreciate your feedback. After speaking with the team, we understand there was some confusion around what the pet fee was used for and the fact that it does not cover damages. If you have any further questions, please feel free to contact the office. - Lindsay, Bell Customer Service

name: SLenn W.
text: My sister and I visited Chase Lake Villas today, the property is beautiful and the Management Team is amazing. If you are  looking for a place to call home, this is it. Ben and his team work hard to make your living dreams come true...

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We are happy to hear that you have chosen Chace Lake Villas as your new home! Ben and his staff work hard to create communities residents are proud to call home while providing them with Hassle Free Living and look forward to continuing to do this for you and your sister. We look forward to serving you both for years to come and cant wait for you to experience everything this community has to offer! -Kathy, Bell Reputation Team

name: Ryan Summerville
text: Great place to live! The staff is fantastic, very helpful and friendly! They made us feel right at home from the start. Would recommend to anyone. These are great apartments to live at!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a positive review! We are happy to hear that you are enjoying your stay in our community, and the staff is one of the reasons why! We at Bell know how important it is to build great relationships with the people who are in your community, so we make it a point to have your first impressions with us be the best! The location, staff, and amenities are some of the best things this community has to offer and we cant wait for you to experience them all! Thank you again for you review, we look forward to serving you in the future :) -Kathy, Bell Reputation Team

name: Livy_Lu
text:
Worst place to live! If I could give you all a ZERO, I would 🙄 I seriously would think twice about moving here to Chace Lake Villas. None of the amenities listed work properly such as the fitness center, pool, and laundry room. The fitness center equipment is a complete joke! Nothing barely works. The pool is only open maybe 6 weeks out of the summer. And now the laundry room is out of order due to renovation. The apartment manager, Lisa sent an email out stating that the tentative should rent washers and dryers at very low cost of $35-40 monthly. How inconsiderate! We’re always having plumbing issues. Last time, we were without water for an entire day. Residents had to warm up bottled water to take baths/wash offs. And if the water isn’t shut off 24hrs, it’s shut off at least 3 times out of the month due to plumbing issues.

If you want the Hoover experience move in to an apartment complex that’s actually in Hoover because Chace Lake Villas is considered Birmingham, AL.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback. I want to assure you that our staff is working hard to provide an exceptional living experience to our residents. I have been informed that the water has only ever been shut off twice and was only turned off in order to fix a broken pipe. Any time this happens it is clearly communicated that the fix will occur. The water has never been shut off for 24 hours but we do understand how frustrating this can be, which is why we do provide additional water during those hours. Please let us know if you have any further maintenance issues, so that we can immediately address those. We want all of our residents to have a positive stay with us so if there is anything else we can do to make your experience better, please don't hesitate to reach out. Thanks! -Ashleigh, Bell Reputation Team

name: Klint Rhodes
text: I lived here just shy three years and had a wonderful experience. The grounds, amenities, and most of all , the neighbors were wonderful. Benjamin, Michael, and the rest of the staff are amazing and I consider them friends after getting to know them . The majority of the tenants consist of professionals so it is extremely quiet the majority of the time. I had to submit two service requests during my stay and both were resolved within 24 hours. If you are looking for a safe, quiet, centrally located place to stay at a reasonable price, I would strongly recommend Chace Lake Villas.

resp.text: Hello Klint, Thank you for your review! We are happy to hear that you are enjoying your stay in our community and are having a 5-star experience for the last 3 years! We love hearing that our residents feel a sense of community living here, and our staff is able to help! We want everyone to feel valued and welcomed living here. We at Bell strive to provide residents with Hassle Free Living in a place they are proud to  call home and are glad we are able to do this for you! We look forward to serving you for many more years!! :) -Kathy, Bell Reputation Team

name: Andrea Raven
text: 2 stars is very generous but considering I had a roof over my head, I am grateful. “Management” (specifically Lisa) has been challenging to work with due to the manner she speaks to people. Which is very unprofessional and most remarks unnecessary. There was always a disconnect in communication whether it be about the trash, water shut-off or renovations they have planned. During my lease, I encountered raccoons on the roof that scratched all through the night, excessive amounts of stink bugs stuck in the windows (most escaped), my car having stuff stolen out of it, blood all over my car due to some event with a neighbor & someone else, my apartment smelled of smoke because the downstairs neighbor sat in the house & smoked all day, times I couldn’t use the water because the water was off! or use the sink because the sink was backed up in which they had to fix 3+ times. If you decide to live here, I pray the Lord grant you patience and be sure to keep all your receipts & documents!

resp.text: Hi Andrea, we appreciate your review. We would like to take this opportunity to address some of your concerns. Unfortunately, the property is unable to shut water off to individual units or isolated buildings; when a repair is required, they have to shut the whole property off temporarily. Because of this, whenever possible, management tries to notify residents at least 24 hours in advance. If it is an emergency, sometimes there is not enough time to provide advance notice. We would encourage any residents who have any pest or smoking concerns to let the office know; they will do their best to address these accordingly. If you have any questions about your move-out, please feel free to contact management. - Lindsay, Bell Customer Service

name: Julie Jibreen
text:
I have been living in Chase Lake Villas for about 4 months now. It was a great experience, hence moving here from over seas. The Staff was amazing and helpful, especially Dee, she is a kind, friendly, and supportive person. Overall this is a great place to move if you are looking for a quiet place to stay, with a great staff.
-Rania Lutfi

resp.text: Thank you so much for your thoughtful review! We are thrilled to hear that our staff has helped to make you feel more at home here and that you have been enjoying calling Chace Lake Villas your home. We look forward to continuing to provide you with Hassle Free Living :) -Ashleigh, Bell Reputation Team

name: issac Reed
text:
Worst management team ever. They took our trash can saying they the new valet trash company would give us a new trash can. It’s almost 2 weeks now and we don’t have trash cans yet. They said that the deal with new valet trash company is not completed.they should have at lest given the old trash cans.

People have been placing their trash bag out and it has stains in the breezeways because of it. Don’t get started about the smell. They keep shutting the water without  proper notice.

resp.text: Hi Isaac, thank you for leaving your comments. We apologize for the confusion that occurred regarding your trash cans. The team has since returned everyone's trash cans, as the transfer discussion is still ongoing. If there is a scheduled repair that requires water shut off, management notifies via email. Please let them know if you have any questions about the above! - Lindsay, Bell Customer Service

name: A
text: Absolutely awful experience living here. Management is almost never available. Maintenance rarely comes out to fix things and when they do the job is always done poorly. They recently came into my apartment without notice to change the toilets and threw a cabinet full of things into the sink since no one was home. The trash pickup is very inconsistent. They have double charged for a garage 3 months in a row now.  Most of the apartments see pests such as roaches and scorpions consistently. The pool is closed more often than its open and the gym is a huge disappointment. It seems they make promises that they do not intend on upholding.

resp.text: Hi there, thank you for your feedback. We're very sorry to hear about your concerns with Chace Lake Villas. We believe some might be due to some miscommunication or confusion. Please reach out to the Community Manager, as she would be happy to discuss these with you! - Lindsay, Bell Customer Service

name: Dresden Statum
text: We pay so much money to live here yet they closed the gym for MONTHS for renovations still not open. They opened the pool for a few days and closed it bc a few tiles fell off. They said they don’t know when it’ll be back open. Our air conditioner stopped working and it was 85 degrees in our apartment for 3 weeks until they finally fixed it. We pay all this money to live here with all the amenities that make our rent More expensive and we don’t get to use them. I CANT REPLY TO THE REPLY FROM THE MGMT BUT NO WE DID NOT GET A WINDOW AC UNIT WE HAD TO GO BUY A FAN AND LIVE IN HEAT FOR 3 WEEKS.

resp.text: Hi Dresden, thank you for your review. We apologize for the delayed gym re-opening! Renovations should hopefully be complete by next week. The office closed the pool due to the removed tiles because there were glass shards that came off into the pool. They are contracting the replacement of the tiles, and making a small repair to the pump; we're sorry for this inconvenience, as we know it is the summer season! We understand the office was able to provide a portable AC window unit until your AC could be replaced. If you have any further questions, please feel free to ask the office! - Lindsay, Bell Customer Service

name: Sara Littleton
text: Love this place! Very safe and wonderful location. Couldn't ask for a better office staff and maintenance crew.

resp.text: Thank you for your positive review! We are so happy to hear that you are enjoying your living experience with us; we look forward to continuing to make this apartment community a place where you are proud to call home! –Quan, Marketing

name: Bergen Bolt
text: Really nice apartment but customer service here is a JOKE. I have to call the office 10-12 times back to back to back in order to get someone to pick up the phone, I lived in my apartment for three. weeks. before they prepared a lease for me to sign (I took over a friend's), not to mention that they seem to only show up to work when they feel like it. I loved my apartment but am sooooooo grateful to be getting the heck outta there!!!

name: Brian Bufalo
text: I love it here. Maintenance has been great despite what others have said. Really enjoying my time here!

name: Leon Smith
text: Great place to live. Inside and out looks great with plenty of room.

resp.text: Hi Leon! Thank you for your 5-star review! We are so happy to hear that you are enjoying your living experience with us. We look forward to continuing to make Chace Lake Villas a place where you are proud to call home! –Lauren, Bell Customer Service

name: Elizabeth McRae
text: Great place to live! Would recommend it to anyone, any day!

resp.text: Hi Elizabeth, thank you for your review! We are pleased to hear you had a positive experience at Chace Lake Villas Apartments. We look forward to continuing to provide you with Hassle Free Living :) -Lindsay, Bell Customer Service

name: andrew peterson
text: Fitness center equipment barely works, Pool never open, don't advertise the amenities if they are barely if ever available. Aside from that not a bad place to live but I no pool or fitness center after being told there would be a pool and a fitness center is a little irritating.

resp.text: Andrew, thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback. We completely understand your frustrations and are excited to let you know that our property is going through renovation plans and we are going to be upgrading both of these amenities.  Currently, our pool is closed but is scheduled to open near Memorial Day weekend, just in time for the start of the swim season. The fitness center does have operating equipment and is open 24 hours per day. We will soon have all new fitness center equipment and all new pool furniture.  There will be a portion of the swimming pool area available year round where currently the pool area is only open during swim season. We hope you are as excited as we are for these new improvements  -Ashleigh, Bell Reputation Team

name: john freeman
text:
I have been living here since many years. It used to be a good place but it’s not so great recently.
First problem is the schools zone, it’s McAdory High, almost 14 miles away. The next apartment complex has Hoover High (couple of miles away). If you are a parent this isn’t your place
Gym equipment are broken since almost a year,   They still won’t change the treadmill which looks like it’s from 90’s. The pool is open for a very limited.
The new managment isn’t good at communicating, they changed the toilet and shower head without much notice.
And half of the review looks fake

resp.text: Hi John, thank you for leaving your comments. We wish there were more we could do to alleviate your school zone concerns. Regarding the gym, the team tries their best to ensure the equipment is up and running; the great news is that renovations will be happening down the pipeline, which will include enlarging the fitness center and upgrading equipment! The pool season is from Memorial Day - Labor Day, with open hours between 9am and 8pm. Finally, the on-site team has been communicating via door notices, emails and phone calls regarding the Green Project, which includes switching out the toilet and shower head! If you have not received any of this communication, please let the office know! We would encourage you to speak with management about any other concerns so they can assist. - Lindsay, Bell Customer Service

name: kie mcghee
text: I really love staying in these apartments I won’t be moving until I decide to become an home owner great place to stay when I signed my lease everything that was promised I’ve been provided with talk to Dee Patel she is the best 😊

name: Blair Arnold
text: We have been here for almost a year, in a 2 bed 2 bath, every month our water is over 50 dollars, and we are only there on weekends. Also, we bought a house and asked to put our unit on the market in hopes to leave early, they refused, said they couldnt, but we could bring them a renter and then we could leave. We've never been late on a 1200 dollar apartment,  we've caused any problems... but couldn't be worked with.

resp.text: Codi, thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback. We are sorry to hear that you are not having a positive living experience with us. Our staff strives to provide Hassle Free Living to everyone so I have looked into this situation further for you. It looks like our Community Manager went over the Buy Out Addendum as well as the Water/Sewer Addendum that is a part of your signed lease with you. Unfortunately we have to honor the date that is on your signed leased and do not allow subletting. But as we stated we are willing to start a new lease if you have someone who would like to take over. If there is any additional information we can provide you with or you still have outstanding questions please don't hesitate to reach out and we would be happy to help. Thank you! -Ashleigh, Bell Reputation Team

name: Bryant Lopez
text: Don’t bother leasing with this complex they have horrible management, there was a water heather that overflowed it on my upstairs neighbor and it’s been a month and they haven’t fix anything in my apartment, they still made me paid rent for the month even though I not living in there, they try to give me a different apartment but wanting me to pay more for a smaller apartment. Don’t bother renting with them find another place.

resp.text: Hi Bryant, thank you for leaving your comments. We sincerely apologize for the delays in repair; unfortunately, the on-site team has to wait for an insurance adjuster to approve the claim. As soon as the adjuster is finished, the contractor will be ready to get started on the rebuild! Please don't hesitate to reach out to management with any other concerns. They will notify you as soon as they have an update! All the best-Lindsay, Bell Reputation Team

name: Tiffanie Law
text: I would recommend anyone to stay here! Awesome place, and the staff is amazing! This place deserves a 10 star!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with this 5-star review! We are excited to see that you are enjoying you are truly enjoying your stay in our community!  It is reassuring to know that our staff is one of the reasons why you love living here so much! Our team works hard to provide residents with the luxury of Hassle Free Living in a place they are proud to call home and look forward to continuing to do so for you in the future :)   -Kathy, Bell Reputation Team

name: Jamie Blutcher
text: 2 Stars as of now... Dee Patel!! ADJUST YOUR ATTITUDE. Your customer service skills suck

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback, Jamie! We at Bell work hard to provide residents with Hassle Free Living  in a place they are proud to call home and apologize for not doing this for you. We will pass this message along to our staff member and will continue to work hard to provide you with the best customer care possible.  Please feel free to stop by the office or call us to discuss this further. -Kathy, Bell Reputation Team

name: Tim Riley
text: Terrible place to live! Don't get me wrong the people that live here are all laid back but the managers are terrible specifically Benjamin (Rude and inconsiderate) my advice is if he tellls u something GET IT IN WRITING I was lied to multiple times about little things for example I paid my last month rent to move and he says that X amount is what I had to pay I paid it and I go  return the key and I'm told everybody in the complex is 2 months behind on water now I owe 120 $ even though I've already moved. Also my apartment had ROACHS pest control did not help but they sprayed and caused mildew behind refrigerator and stove DONT MOVE HERE!!! Half these reviews are FAKE I can tell from just reading them because when I first moved in it had 1star now it has 4 mmmhmmm okay

resp.text: Good Morning Tim- Thank you for taking the time to provide us with this valuable feedback. We appreciate all feedback, good or bad, and will use it to move forward with making this the best apartment community it can be. I first want to say that our reviews are not fake. We as a company do not allow staff members to post fake reviews for their properties. We also want real, honest information so that we can use it for improvements! The reason the rating has gone up is because we are constantly improving people living experience and look forward to another chance to do this for you! We apologize if you have experienced anything but a 5-star experience while dealing with or staff members. We would like to talk about your specific situation further. Please feel free to call us or stop by the office so that we may do so. We look forward to speaking with you soon and providing you with a 5-star experience! -Kathy, Bell Reputation Team

name: Austin Edwards
text: Good place to live.. Maintenance is great

resp.text: Thank you Austin for the 5-star review! We are happy to hear that you are enjoying your stay in our community and the staff members are one of the reasons why! Our staff tries to go above and beyond to make this a place residents are proud to call home while providing them with the luxury of Hassle Free Living! We are happy you are experiencing this and look forward to serving you in the future :) -Kathy, Bell Reputation Team

name: Charles Santucci
text: Very nice complex with a great friendly staff

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review, Charles! We are happy to hear that you are having a 5-star experience in our community and the staff members are one of the reasons why! Our team works hard to create communities residents are proud to call home while providing them with Hassle Free Living and look forward to continuing to do so for you in the future :) -Kathy, Bell Reputation Team

name: Lucretia Sumerel
text: Beautiful apartment complex, well maintained.

resp.text: Thank you, Lucretia, for your 5-star review! We are happy to hear that you are enjoying your stay in our community! We pride ourselves in creating beautiful communities, both inside and out for our residents and are happy you are noticing! It is reassuring to know that the staff is also doing their job of providing you with Hassle Free Living in a place you are proud to call home! We cant wait for you to experience all of the wonderful things this community has to offer and look forward to assisting you with anything you may need! -Kathy, Bell Reputation Team

name: Husam Jebril
text:
I wish i can give them ZERO STAR
WORST APARTMENT EVER
We’re having a problem with the shower for like 5 days they sent somebody to fix it 3 days ago and he made it worse and left and never came back
I’m trying to call them of course nobody answer, went to the office 3 times and the last time they sent a guy with me and he said he’s gonna fix it the next morning and till now no body show up

resp.text: HI Husam, thank you for your feedback. We're very sorry you had an issue with your shower. After speaking with the on-site team, we understand the repair ended up taking a couple days due to a need for more supplies, but it has since been repaired. It was a little more difficult to schedule around the New Year, because it required scheduling with an outside vendor who also had different hours because of the holiday. We apologize for the delay! - Lindsay, Bell Customer Service

name: Jacob Simmons (Otherkid)
text: Nice apt
