text: Bad people..drug&acholic people..roach bugs never go away

name: Michelle T
text: We rent a business from him and we're very happy.

name: Mindy Mousie
text:
I'll try to be as diplomatic as possible here, but back in January 2016, my family and I were looking at other properties in the area. Several TR Properties popped up on our list.

First, the main office in Florence has multiple signs with "RENT IS DUE ON (DATE)". They were plastered EVERYWHERE. That should have been our first clue that we weren't dealing with top tier client service. It's their office building, but I found that pretty obnoxious.

Second, two out of the three properties we looked at were in pretty poor conditions with sightings of roaches, unkempt yards, and smelled rather bad.

To sum this up with the third and pivotal point: do NOT tell the office management that you are applying for financial assistance because they will flat out red-flag your application, assuming you can't pay. Fine, they have that right--- but look back at my second point above: roaches, mouse droppings in the cabinets, damages on the property, and a really bogus attitude behind the office window.... and they're telling me that I can't afford one of their rentals? Yeah, right.

Proceed with caution.

name: Brian Stowe
text:
They have a 1.6 star rating for a reason. I can only tell you to heed the warnings left by all of the other reviewers. I would almost say Tim Rhodes Properties is a criminal empire funded by not so “refundable” deposits.

Also, your lease is a binding agreement only when Tim Rhodes deems it necessary for his personal gain. Even if this is your only option for housing, please save yourself the agony and stay away. Be homeless. You’d be far happier than you would be renting from Tim Rhodes.

name: Joe Hill
text: To much red tape/irritation. No on site manager. Had to drive 80 miles round trip just to get key to see apartment. Drove same trip again to return key and fill out application. Then drive it again if approved.

name: Brandon Scott
text: only reason it's 1 star is because i have to explain how disgusting of a human being Tim Rhodes is.  Unprofessional alcoholic landlord who will verbally assault anyone he feels superior to.  NEVER rent anything from him.  The lease only matters when he wants to use it against you.

name: Randallkoller
text: Mixed bag, beware is my advise, they wanted to charge me a late fee when rent was due on a holiday and the office was closed, The HVAC never worked and after numerous calls it remained out, the utility bills were ridiculous, I finally got a key to the basement and the main hose piping heat and air into the house was disconnected, I repaired it myself and the utilities were cut in half, TRP took no responsibility. I never felt safe in the house after one of the neighborhood hang arounds attempted to walk in the front door and strong arm me, the cable was broken and my lawnmower was stolen off the porch in no small part because they wouldn't trust me with a key to keep it in the basement. There's plenty more all culminating with me telling them after renting for 18 months that I was leaving, I was never late or missed a rent, but the late fee on a holiday was the last straw, I put my own time and money into a couple small repairs as well. 3 years later I just got a notice that there a new file on my credit report, guess who? I'm sure they here people are going to sue them all the time, I don't make hollow threats, TRP we're going to court! So my summary is this, they aren't that bad but they are unreliable, rude and have some attitude like they're more than what they are, a rental outfit. but TRP has a lot of rentals and they aren't that bad or hard to deal with until you dont let them run rough shod over you. typical rednecks

name: Jamie Hayes
text: The worst landlord I’ve EVER dealt with. Disgusting properties, horrible management, etc. I would give zero stars if I could.

name: Keagan Neeley
text: I would not even rate this place 1 star if I didn't want to leave a comment. The office staff is completely and rudderly rude. I have never and hope to never have to rent from them but the business I am in requires communication with the office personnel and I hate having to call the office administration. I feel bad for the tenants, honestly!! Tim Rhodes needs to do a complete NEW hiring process if he wants to have loyal tenants!!

name: Heather Bush
text: I wouldn't recommend renting from these people.  My father recently had a stroke, I forgot to take the rent in, and they sent an eviction notice over 1 week being late.  I got to the office and explained what happened, instead of being understanding, they charged me $60 in late fees.

name: Google User
text: TERRIBLE! TERRIBLE! TERRIBLE! Rude staff, Very disorganized, unprofessional, and has a TERRIBLE LANDLORD! Also, good luck getting back ANY of your "refundable" deposit! Definitely not a "business" that I would recommend or want my name to be associated with! Would rate a zero if it would have let me!

name: Jeff Morrow
text: all but one dryer works at the lions den apartments and the supposedly "fast internet" they installed isn't so fast at all. download speed at 10-20 mbps is not fast and quite often it disconnects and stays out for a while.

name: MJ Ferrell
text: HORRIBLE!! So I get a bill FIVE years later for some damage from the apartment? FIVE YEARS LATER? Seriously? Also the apartment was damaged before we moved in? and they charged us for that damage.

name: Amber Wilbourn
text: We love renting from him!

name: Truwanda Eastland
text: Literally wants you to beg for an apartment and I will not do so! Period!

name: Melody Dawn
text: Horrible Reception.. The lady at the front desk is confusing and misleading.. Houses are unfit and unkept... Overpriced for someone who has a bad reputation in Florence... Got to jump through hoop just to get into one and out of town people are unwelcome!!!!!

name: Molly Roberts
text: Horrible landlord.  Will not repair things.  Staff is horrible and inconsiderate.  I would never rent from this company again!  Steer clear if you can.

name: Daniel Craig
text: Horrible landlord. Doesn't fix any issues.

name: Julia George
text: Landlord doesn't maintain property. He could care less about his tenants. It's all about the money with him. Wouldn't rent from this company again.

name: Nilay Patel
text:
The office manager is HORRIBLE and does not want to help new renters even though you have proper paperwork, she just follow POLICIES, POLICIES and POLICIES,

three words - DON'T WASTE TIME

name: Donna Robbins
text: Rude

name: Donivan Hagwood
text: Home is home

name: Falecia Killen
text: Rude

name: J. Michael Fortenberry, B.S.
text: Ridiculous requirements and curt, impolite service.

name: Johnson Fowler
text: Everytime we have a problem they're out the next day to fix it

name: M. M
text: Absolutely horrible. Take heed of the reviews and stay away from Tim Rhodes Properties!

name: Baily Austin
text: Josh was the best real estate agent we could ask for! He was attentive to our needs, thoughtful and willing to help in any way possible.  He and the staff at Bradford were great to work with and we look forward to working with them again in the near future!

name: Michael Ledbetter
text: If I could leave a more negative rating I would. I rented from this company and they attempted to take advantage of me by using MY utilities to renovate their other apartments in the building i was renting in  (apache flats) Josh Smitherman is a low down landlord. I confronted him about this and he was a complete jacka** about it. Needless to say I ended my lease with them immediately. Dont make the same mistake I did and rent with bradford. There are better/cleaner/cheaper apartments owned by other companys to rent from in montevallo. What a joke Bradford realestate is.

name: Tracee Miller
text: Rented from Bradford for 2 years while at UM.  Really enjoyed my time in Montevallo and my time renting a house from them.  Their office is conveniently located in downtown Montevallo close to UMOM- so it was easy to pop in and pay rent.  Super nice people, always made me feel right at home, willing to go the extra mile.

name: Anthony and Heather Bryson
text: During the moratorium set forth by president Biden, this company has decided to through a family out on the street even though they have followed the guidelines set forth by the president and cdc and was promised to pay in full once they got the money at the end of the month. Do not recommend this unprofessional, LAW BREAKING company to anyone.

name: Perish Underwood
text:
Great, down home, friendly real estate agency.

Listed my house and sold it in a day- couldn't ask for better service or nicer people!

name: charleta king
text: I placed a rental application with this company. I never received a  follow up call regarding their properties available or status of my application. I called a number of times and either they were not available or I was told they would return my call (which did not occur).  I follow up today only to be advised that my application was not approved. I would not recommend.

name: Nope Nope
text: It seems kind of crook like to make people pay to apply for properties they may not even be able to accept because they have pets.  Please consider getting that information available to prospective tenants prior to the application process so you're not taking people's hard earned money and making them gamble.  They have beautiful properties, but I will use a different service and recommend other pet owners use a different service due to this.  $30/application with the risk of not knowing whether or not the property takes our family members?  No thank you.

name: UM LOVE
text: Welcoming environment.  Great rental company to deal with.  They made my transition to my first apartment as easy on me as possible.  They were there to answer questions and offer help as needed.  They even came and hung my curtain rod because I didn't have the equipment.  Total 5 star company!

name: Tabbitha Conner
text: Awesome company! Just rented my first apartment from them.  They made the process easy for me and made me feel right at home in Montevallo.  They were also helpful in helping me get my power and water set up as well as directing me to cool local things to do! Thanks Bradford Real Estate! My roommate and I would highly recommend.

name: Debbie Jo Killingsworth
text: Great

name: Wayne B Colburn
text: Josh & the crew at Bradford are awesome.  they helped me find a place to live when I was down and out and took care of me the entire time I lived there.  they go above and beyond for anyone who walks through their front door.  they're also very supportive in the community and I like to support those who give back.  thumbs up for Bradford realty.

name: Sasha Jiminez
text: rented from this co for 6 years while I lived in Montevallo.  great to work with.  never had any major maintenance problems that they didn't take care of right away.  always kind and friendly and glad to help in whatever way possible.  lots of my friends rented from them as well.  would highly recommend.

name: Bowbee Outdoors
text: Josh is disrespectful to customers. Maitnance is nonexistent. If ac goes out expect 3 days minimum before anyone even looks. Flood in your ground level apt? Not there problem for at least a week. Plenty of other options. I rather blowtorch my nipples off than deal with this company again.

name: Bethany Aucoin
text: I have been renting an apartment from Bradford for almost a year now and I have absolutely no complaints. I have noticed other people complaining about their discrimination or problems, but as a lesbian couple in the south, we have had nothing but pleasant conversations with the employees and they have always been happy to help us with whatever we may need. Our house could have been in better shape when we moved in, but the few issues that we have had have been taken care of by the employees promptly. They are all very nice people and I always have the best conversations with the lady at the front desk.

name: Sal Vagal
text: FANTASTIC Rental agency! I wish I could pick them up and take them with me.  They've been nothing but an absolute pleasure to work with.  I've read negative reviews but completely believe what you put in is what you get out.  I never had an issue that wasn't promptly corrected, never called and had anyone be rude to me.  They were always a pleasure.  I feel like in this world people think they can be rude and ugly to people in the service industry and expect them not to be rude back.....

name: Larry David
text: These folks were a pleasure to work with. I’d recommend them highly. Great to work with. Always going above and beyond to make sure we were taken care of and happy

name: Brooke Morgan
text: Do not trust this company. The house we rented from them was destroyed when we moved in—so my parents and I had to fix it up all on our own: repairs in the walls, the floors, the fixtures. It’s ridiculous. Not to mention, many people at Bradford are extremely rude and make my roommates and I feel inferior for even asking a question. Do NOT come to Bradford Real Estate. Find someone else who is worth your time, money, and cares about you genuinely as customers.

name: Penelope Wallace
text: I'd give them 10 Stars! They're all amazing to work with, Jeannie is super friend and Josh has always been on point.  They've been nothing but helpful and accommodating in everyway.  I wish all rental managers were this awesome! Thanks for making Montevallo an awesome place!

name: Tonya Young
text: Awesome folks! I don't know why anyone would ever complain about them!  They're timely and courteous and are always awesome to work with.

name: Apricot Pearson
text: Great folks- would highly recommend working with them.  They represent lots of good properties.

name: Jackson Pearson
text: I could not possibly agree more with the negative comments that I've read on here. I've lived in three of Bradford's properties over the last 10 years and have only positive things to say about them.  They're open Monday-Friday 9-5, just like their website says they are.  I will say that I've called within those hours and had to leave a message before but they've always called me back.  They have an email address for emergency maintenance which they've always been responsive to as far as I am concerned at least.  The people who work there are always polite and helpful.  I've had issues with bugs in the past as well but they sent an exterminator over for an extra spray a couple of times between the regular monthly spray and the issue was taken care of.  The guys who do their maintenance seem very nice.  They've surely never been rude or disrespectful.  I've had a couple of situations where they came to fix something and didn't have all of the parts the needed, so they had to leave and come back- once even hey had to order a part and it didn't come until the next day, but they seem to be qualified and have always made repairs that meet my standards.   I've surely never been made to feel as if they don't care about me or my issues.  I see them at least once per month to pay rents. I always have a delightful conversation with Jenny who works the front desk.  She is always kind to ask about my family and my life.  This business is very community oriented and involved in most every event that goes on in Montevallo.  I always see that they've sponsored little league and parades and festival and food drives.  I just can't imagine anything than that the people who have left negative comments created negative situations for themselves.  I'd even go so far as to say that this company goes above and beyond for their tenants.  Josh even came by to check on my heater one year on thanksgiving night because it had been giving me some issues that week.  anyone that is going to come out after hours and on a holiday just to make sure my family and I aren't cold is ok by me.  I'd give these people 10 stars if it was an option.

name: Christie Albergine
text: I️ had a great e patience with these people. I️ have to imagine for those that didn’t that it was their own fault.

name: Reckless Love
text: Applied for a rental house with a co-signer that was within my price range, paid the application fee, only for them to waste 3 day of my time after being told my the agent that there should be no problem getting approved. I constantly felt an air of discrimination from the front desk secretary. multiple times I was refused to speak with my agent. I was quoted a timeframe of 12 hours, it has been 3 days and they refuse to work with me. This company has lied to me, wasted my time, and now put me at a severe disadvantage with less than 24 hours to find a place to go. Gina is overall unpleasant to work with and Josh refuses to speak with clients. The power of approval is in a single mans hands (josh). there is no regulated system, but seemingly approving or denying basred of opinions of the person. the entire time I felt I was being pushed away and like they were trying to keep me out. UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES SHOULD YOU GIVE THIS COMPANY YOUR BUSINESS.

name: Ouida Brackett
text: I called to deal with an issue of the company putting a check through on my account that was post dated. When I initially asked the front desk clerk if it would be okay to pay my 1st months rent,  and since I was there, give her a check for the upcoming months rent. I don't live in Montevallo and the property I was renting was in Alabaster. So since you can't pay rent online, I gave the post dated check so that I wouldn't have to drive back to Montevallo. I was assured TWICE by the clerk that this was okay. Fast forward after I paid my initial deposit as well as first month's rent. They decided to also deposit my post dated check for the upcoming month. Leaving me with an NSF due to the fact that the postdated amount wasn't accounted for in my monthly budget. ESPECIALLY after you already received $2,000 from me within a weeks time. I called and spoke with JOSH who verbally assaulted me and basically called me a criminal for writing bad checks. After he informed me that it's not their policy to take a post dated check and he doesn't know where I got that info from. I LITERALLY GOT IT FROM THE FRONT DESK  CLERK!!!! HE took no ownership, did not apologize, complained about a $50 fee he would have to pay b/c of my returned check and then hung up in my face. The crazy thing about this whole situation is that the check cleared on my end. My bank LITERALLY cleared the check and just charged me an NSF fee. All I wanted was my $30 back. He didn't even have the human decency to listen to what I was telling him before becoming beligerent!! This company is the absolute worst that I have ever dealt with in my life. And my husband is military so we have moved and dealt with numerous companies. RUN...DON'T WALK AWAY FROM THIS PLACE!!!!

name: Jansen Arceneaux
text: If you enjoy rental companies without an after hours line, customer service agents that will lie to you about appointments and then call you the liar when confronted than this is the place for you! Worst rental experience I've had in a long time. This is a small town, small family, small minded company. They truely don't care about you. From a customer service standpoint I was so dissapointed. Do yourself a favor and look elsewhere. Also they do not do electronic payments!!! This is the 21st century Bradford!! Try and keep up 😉

name: Jennifer Patterson
text: great company.  I'd do business with them again.

name: Thadia Newton
text: If i could give them zero stars i would. They do not maintain their properties and take advantage of college students. Whenever I would send a maintenance request they would not come and even told me they had no record of me calling. This is a terribly run agency. DO NOT RENT FROM THEM.

name: Jeanne Roberts
text: They could care less about their tenants. When maintenance issues occur, they ignore you! They have no sense of urgency in resolving emergency maintenance issues! Do not use this company!!!

name: Keirsten Lee
text: paid my money for a home application and was never called back with an approval or denial... Seemed to be because of my skin color.

name: Cynthia Winegard
text: Awesome group of people to work with!

name: Keandra Pope
text: If you have any other options, do not rent from these people. We moved into an apartment (Crown Royal) with a full-blown German cockroach infestation. They were all smiles as we handed them money, but as soon as we started mentioning problems, they became rude and unfriendly - we were allowed to break our lease rather than them actually fixing our problems. Go to a complex that cares about its tenants.

name: Angela Smith
text: Not a good company at all..

name: Joanna Reiter
text: Has been using them for 4 years, no problems, maintain my house for reasonable price, rent is always on time! Couldn't be more satisfied!

name: Michael Kenny
text: Terrible company.

name: Sallie Walker
text: 5 star company!

name: Vincent King
text: Can be kind of rude and hard to get in touch with.

name: Cathi Tinney
text: Great people and service

name: Stephanie Burch
text: Really loved dealing with this group

name: Q Will
text: I scheduled an apartment viewing with this company and it was the most filthiest thing I ever seen in my life. The apartment smelled like soggy mold and newports, but the worst part was the bugs I kid you not there were 100's of dead roaches and insects throughout the bathroom and kitchen it looked like a episode of hoarders. The fact that they even had the audacity to even show the apartment in that state is apalling even a run of the mill slumlord would be offended at the condition. Do yourself a favor and look elsewhere.

name: Alisa Crumbley
text: I love my spacious apartment. I just moved in yesterday. The staff is amazing. They have been so courteous and friendly. I was even greeted at the gate by the entire staff and given a wine cooler and snacks. How awesome is that. Plus they treated me to a free pizza, bread sticks, and a two liter Pepsi from Papa Johns. My apartment was spotless when I moved in. I am so impressed with my whole living experience so far. I am so glad I moved into such a wonderful community.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and we hope you continue to enjoy your Home and everything this Community has to offer!

name: Thomas Wagner
text: Very friendly staff that recognizes me and easy to help. The random get togethers with food are delightful and allows me a chance to get to know other people. Temporary name tags at them would help me get to know other people and name tags for staff would help me remember their names. - From a verified resident on ApartmentRatings

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and suggestions for each resident and staff to wear nametags.  We hope you continue to enjoy your home and everything Elevate 5050 community has to offer!

name: Kimberly Mccombs
text: The place is very spacious and nice but there's a bad roach infestation....... Very large roaches that are in the bathrooms..... Once you kill one another one comes..... This is very unsatisfactory...... I'm very terrified of them and it mks me not want to live here anymore!!!  CAN SOMEONE PLEASE COME FUMIGATE!!!!

resp.text: I really hate you are experiencing this in your apartment home.  Please give us a call in the office to schedule pest control in your home next Tuesday.

name: Dustin Hodgkinson
text: I recently took a job here in Montgomery and needed a place to live.. so the apartment search began. I know I didn't want to spend over 1k a month so I quickly found out that for that price you were limited to certain areas and amenities.. the first few I looked at looked good in the picture's online but when you arrived it was a completely different story.. then I came across elevate5050. I was pleasantly surprised with the units being updated with nice appliances, the grounds kept up well, a nice pool with an overall good setting. Also elevate had a short term lease that didn't raise the rent and a nice move in special. Now that I have lived here a little while I can comment on my experiences.. after reading other reviews on google I can honestly say that my experience has been the opposite of others.. the staff has been very helpful and has made me feel at home, Dana made moving in very easy and non complicated. I had an issue with the hot water heater and was fixed before I got home from work. Some people want to pay cheap rent and expect luxury resort style living and I get that.. but you get what you pay for. I think you get more then that here and after searching numerous apartments around Montgomery, this apartment complex is the best for the price hands down..great location, competitive pricing and overall I would definitely recommend anyone looking for a nice place to live, to look into elevate5050.

resp.text: Thank you for your lovely note Dustin. We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us!

name: Amy Maynard
text: The staff at Elevate 5050 have been so helpful setting up my new apartment. Everything was so easy. I am new to the area but my fiancé has lived here for over 2 years and has never had any complaints! The staff remember our names and make us feel welcome! They go above and beyond to create amenities that make their residents feel at home!

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review, Amy! We work hard to create a great experience for our residents and we’re happy to hear we hit the mark for you.

name: Fed up Individual
text: If I could give a zero I would. Very bad management . Very rude office manager

resp.text: We are so sorry you have had issues in the past. Please contact us to discuss further to ensure your issues have been resolved.

name: Kenya Adams
text: Spacious apartment and a great location!

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We're glad you like your apartment!

name: Samantha Cupp
text:
Horrible horrible horrible.

- first of all, it’s over priced
- AC is insufficient, we pay over $200 a month and it’s never less than 80 degrees inside and maintenance says the unit is fine
- gates don’t work
- fitness room is constantly disgusting and only has broken equipment
- tanning and sauna areas are completely unsanitary
- trash dumpster sits in the parking lot overflowing and stinking up the whole place
- courtesy officer never answers their phone and they don’t respond to noise complaints
- pool was inoperable during the hottest weeks of the year
- staff rarely ever answer the phones and good luck getting a reply to an email
- they’ll lose your rent check for TWO MONTHS and then not give you any warning when they find and cash it
- maintenance workers are nice, but you have to call multiple times to get something fixed, and then it may not even be done correctly
- office hours are very limited
- we signed our lease under a promotion and never got the benefit they promised
- area with the mailboxes is littered with garbage everywhere
- paint on the walls is chipping

There have been THREE different management companies since we’ve been here less than a year, and none have resolved any of these issues.

resp.text: Hello Samantha, thank you for reaching out. We absolutely hate to hear that you have had a bad experience at our community.  Recently, Elevate 5050 underwent a management change and we would love the opportunity to hear more information and details to your concerns.  We will be reaching out to you to discuss right away.  We sincerely appreciate the feedback and hope for the opportunity to provide you with a home you love coming home to.

name: Scarlett Jones
text: A great place to call home! Very convenient location! The office staff are exceptionally friendly and eager to make the moving process as easy and simple as possible!!

resp.text: Thank you Scarlett for the great review!! We love having you as a part of the 5050 family, please let us know if there is anything we can do for you!

name: Nino Brown
text:
This is a nice complex for the price, the new company came in and is making steps to elevate the quality of life so to speak...
- On your way in and out the gate you can always expect to see a mountain of trash to the right no matter the day of the week. The mountain of trash was a direct result of the compactor being broke, it was later fix but it is not emptied on the regular and to be honest some residence are just lazy and don’t want to take it all the way. Some people just leave it outside their doors for days at a time, I have taken pictures and reported it more than once sadly there is no option to upload pictures on here. There is an increase number of roach sighting in and around my building I guess that is a bi product to the trash.
The complex can’t be blamed for this, it’s just the neighbors you may get stuck with for the duration of your lease.
- The complex has a high turn over rate, the management and staff has been changed three times in the last five months, for a short while there were using temporary employees. I have had two packages that were delivered to the front desk within the last 30 days that came up missing, no one is mail handler certified but with such a high turn over you would expect instances like this to have quite often.
- The new company has been renovating some of the apartments with new carpets, new cupboards and appliances, however the heating and air is old and outdated, the back half of the apartments are always hot, perfect in the winter I am definitely not looking forward to the summer months 🙏.
- It is a gated community took them 5 months to get the gate fixed, then a week later it stop working, that can be credited to people tailgating and the gating system is just old and needs to be upgraded.
- There has been a number of thief and vehicle break-ins, I was a victim a couple months ago, one of the camera at the gate is broke, the next is angled away from the entrance/exit so it was no help with the police investigation and don’t expect any help from the apartment either.
- Like I said in the beginning, it’s a nice complex for the price, I would recommend if you trying to save. Get a P.O Box that would prevent your packages coming up missing. Request pest control at least twice a month in your apartment to keep the roaches on the outside, I can’t advice on the trash situation at the entrance or the measure in place to provide security ie the gate and a working camera system. I hope this was helpful.

resp.text: Thank you very much for taking the time to leave a thorough review, we welcome feedback as hearing from our residents is the best way we can improve our community.  We would love the opportunity to discuss with you further. Please give us a call at 334-288- 5655 or let us know a good time to contact you.

name: Gwendolyn Owens
text: I have lived in the community for a year. It's quiet and the staff is friendly and professional. I haven't had any problems getting anything done when I requested it. I would recommend 5050 Bell to my friends and relatives.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive feedback!  We are so delighted you have been happy at our community.  We appreciate you!  Please let us know if we can assist you in any way.

name: Sydney Smallwood
text:
This place has really gone down hill since management change.  I've lived here for a few years now and I will be moving when my new lease is up.
I renewed my lease under a promo. Haven't received any information in regards to what was promised.
The trash compactor has been broken for months with no real solution in sight. It's supposed to be fixed next month. The temp dumpster sits in a parking lot constantly over filled. Trash all on the ground. Not maintained. God forbid you leave trash outside your apt for a few hours before taking it out and boom! They charge you $50.
The gate is constantly broken. What's the point of be paying for a second gate key if it's no reason to use it!
They recently raised Rent. For what ?!
We can't get basic amenities like trash or a security gate.
At the end of the day, management gets to go home and not have to live in these conditions.

resp.text: Hello Sydney, We sincerely apologize that you have had to face such difficulties at our community.  Problems such as these are not something we are known for. We pride ourselves in providing great customer service and we'd like to do the same for you. Please allow us to resolve the issue and earn back your trust.

name: whitney montgomery
text: Horrible. Since the new management has taken over, they have mess up our bill. TWICE!! Very unprofessional! When you go up there to ask questions or anything they don’t even greet you at the door, they will have  you waiting at least 5 minutes before they say something. Take you 1 week to get packages that have been delivered! When you go to ask for packages they tell you that you need your slip to get them, but they have NOT been putting slips in the mailbox! Smh. They really need to do better. I loved the old management! They was professional, quick, and nice! No problem whatsoever, but these new people are not good! I recommended people to stay here & now they hate it!! Sucks!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to provide feedback, Ms. Montgomery. Our new billing system has had a few kinks in the initial setup process.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused for you.  We would appreciate the opportunity to discuss your concerns in person with regard to your package retrieval issues. Please contact our office at 334.288.5655 at your earliest convenience to schedule a meeting. Our goal is to make sure your are 100% satisfied with your experience at 5050 Bell.

name: Del Chick
text: Staff is friendly sometimes but they don’t live up to their promises and you are stuck with problems in your apartment that they never fix.  I am very unhappy and me and my family can’t wait to get out.  Plus, you can hear the people upstairs all the time, not very soundproof.

resp.text: Hi Del, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We sincerely apologize that you have had to face such difficulties at our community.  Elevate 5050 is now under new management and we pride ourselves in providing great customer service and we'd like to do the same for you. Please allow us to resolve the issue and earn back your trust.  We want you to be in a home you are proud of!

name: Adrienne Fowler
text: Okay so this morning as I and a lot of other residents were leaving the property, the gate out would NOT open. At first it was just me then other cars from all directions were lined up trying to get out. It was awful. I really don't see the purpose for the gate. People come and go as they please.  There is no security whatsoever with those gates. We are charged too much for rent to not have the gates work properly.  There were literally lines and lines of cars waiting to get out this morning.  I called emergency maintenance and had to leave a message...unacceptable.  Then I called the non-emergency police number to report we were being held hostage by our NON security gate. REDICULOUS!!!! July 31st is my move out date.....thank God!!!!

name: chloe brennan
text: Love love love! Staff is super accommodating and nice, and the property is clean and functional.

resp.text: Hi Chloe!! Thanks for the awesome review!  We love having you as a resident with us! Thanks for being pretty great yourself :)

name: The Bullfrog
text: Rude and ridiculously inattentive management - SADLY BAD!

resp.text: We are sorry to hear you feel this way. Please reach out to us tomorrow so that we can better understand what your concerns are.

name: Tenisha Moore
text: I highly recommend this apartment complex to anyone. The staff is wonderful and its a great place especially if you have kids.

name: Shandora Adams
text: The newly rennovated apartments are beyond beautiful and I highly recommend people come out and rent with them but Due to the unfortunate events thay happened last year in october with my apartment I decided to give this establisment 4 stars. The reason for 4 stars is because of management. Since I have been a teneant at Elevate 5050, management has been beyond supportive, nice and respectful in my decisions when it comes down to them and I thank them for that.

resp.text: You’re the best, Shandora. Thank you again for sharing such a positive experience.  Please let us know if there is anything we can help you with!

name: Courtnee Dow
text: New management sucks. The new office hours are short. I was transferring to a new building and they only gave me a day to move but wasn't available to give me the keys to the new apartment until after 11 am. And they expected me to be done moving and cleaning by 6 pm.  And they have horrible customer service. I'm not of fan of Pegasus residential. Bring back MAA

name: Julius Buskey
text: One of the best apartments I have lived in. Since the change of ownership I feel things has change for the good

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive feedback, Mr. Buskey!  We are overjoyed that you are happy with your home and our community.  We appreciate you.

name: Nurse Outlook
text: Toward the end my stay here, it changed management. Their communication sucks and they are very unprofessional. By far the worst apartment management I've ever seen. Don't recommend anyone to stay here. They are extremely overpriced and not worth the money. No security is provided.  the gates doesn't work properly and the gym and the pool sucks.

name: Jamie Zhang
text:
UPDATE: No more required bulk cable plan which is great. Unfortunately, maintenance is still slow. Excited for other renovations in the coming months.

ORIGINAL: Just moved in a week ago. I'm paying for a utility that I neither want nor use, which I was told I could opt out of before moving in (cable), increasing the effective rent to more than expected. A lot of the amenities are going under renovations soon, but currently there's a broken gate, lackluster fitness area, and broken trash compactor. Maintenance is nice, but can take from a few hours to a few weeks to fix to issues (both sinks still leaking since day 1). On the plus side these are all problems that should be relatively easy to fix.

resp.text: Hi there Jamie, thanks so much for taking the time to leave us a review.  We are so sorry to hear that you have encountered these frustrations and we would like the opportunity to discuss with you further to see if we can help get them resolved quickly. Our office team will be reaching out to you today.

name: Cupp Life
text: Just moved in and everything has been great so far!

resp.text: Hi Samantha! Thank you so much for your review of 5050 Bell! We are glad to have you here!

name: LaShiante Phillips
text: My 2nd time living here and they are even better than the first time. Very friendly staff and maintenance team!!

name: Shaniqua Little
text: Nice apartment size but the workers are extremely lazy and the leasing office managers/employees have not communicated new policies and procedures with the residents. Untrained and unprofessional. The previous Paddock Club's management had orders completed the same day if not the very next day. I am saddened that our old management is no longer with our community to ensure residents are satisfied. Ashley was the reason I chose the beautiful Paddock Club. She was so helpful and kept us informed on ALL changes to our community. Newly named, 5050 bell, have not tended to my work order in 9 days. I have 4 waiting. They are Slow and unprofessional. But make sure you pay your rent on time:)

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to provide feedback, Ms. Little.  We would appreciate the opportunity to discuss your concerns in person.  Please contact our office at 334.288.5655 at your earliest convenience to schedule a meeting.  Our goal is to make sure your are 100% satisfied with your experience at 5050 Bell.

name: Cathy grace
text:
Awful customer service

Since they have taken over this apartment complex customer service has gone downhill. They appear to be nice at first. They don't replace appliances that no longer work. My mom is disabled and I am temporarily disabled due to a work related injury and they just charged us a $50.00 fee for leaving trash bags at the bottom of the stairs to the trash can. I went into the rent office to explain that my mom and I can't climb the stairs to the only garbage can in the community ( which isn't handicap accessible) and the manager refused to remove the fee and told me that they have to treat everyone the same due to fair housing. Needless to say I will be contacting a lawyer. If you're disabled this isn't the community for you. The manager was so rude. Rent at your own risk.

resp.text: Hi Ms. Grace, Thank you so much for taking the time to provide feedback. We would appreciate the opportunity to discuss your concerns in person. Please contact our office at 334.288.5655 at your earliest convenience to schedule a meeting. If you have further issues with your appliances, please let us know so we can get it taken care of promptly. In addition, as stated this morning, if you need help taking your trash to the compactor, we will be glad to help you. Thank you, 5050 Bell Management Team.

name: Corey Schofield
text: I really wish I could give zero stars.

name: Billy Dee
text: Awesome very helpful people

name: Shandora Adams
text: Ridiculous.....over priced...the gates are ALWAYS broke....they went up on my rent in the middle of my lease agreement.....and theyTOLD me to cancel my whole insurance policy that I had with their partners (I paid up 6 months in advance) to go with someone else they wanted me to go with.

resp.text: Hi Shandora, thank you for taking the time to write us a review.  We are so very sorry for any miscommunication that has been given to you, but we would like the opportunity to discuss your concerns in more detail.  Once you are in a lease agreement, your rental amount should not change and you are welcome to use whatever insurance carrier you prefer.  Is there a good time where we can discuss? Our goal is to provide you with a home you love coming home to and it sounds like we've missed the mark for you.

name: Courtney A
text: Awful bunch at the front office. Not helpful at all, lied about me PAYING for an upstairs apartment after a follow up. Ended up giving me a downstairs apartment just to make the sale. Lived there for a year.

name: Robert Singleton
text: Awesome

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review!

Hi Nicole, thanks for taking the time to leave us a review.  It looks like we've missed the mark for you in some areas and we would love the opportunity to make it up to you.  Elevate 5050 is now under new management, please let us know a good time to contact you so that we can discuss any issues further and earn back your trust.

name: Anna Spidle
text: So far, I love it here. I found this place while the shut down was still in place, and I didn't see it until I moved in. It's in a convenient place for food, shopping, and close to my school. Traffic isn't super bad. The trash compactor has been replaced with valet trash which is super convenient having them grab your trash instead of you having to drive to the compactor. It's pretty quiet and not many issues.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us a review, Anna! I am glad to hear you love the community and its convenience. We love the valet trash service as well! Please let us know if you ever need anything! ~Angela

name: Harmony Records Inc
text: I have been meaning to write a review about how pleased I am with living in this community (I have been here for over a year),  but I must say, My heart is filled with joy and just overwhelmed at how much the staff (Leslie and Bree) go out of their way to help you...I have never lived at a place where the Manager of the community personally calls/text you to make sure that you are safe.  I don't have family here, so when things happen, it's hard to find help, but I honestly feel that the girls in the office genuinely care about the tenants...and I have such a peace of mind knowing that if anything happens, the Staff at Sturbridge has my back.  From the application process to maintenance issues, living here has been by far the best apartment community I have ever lived in.  If you are looking for the best luxury community experience in Montgomery, I highly suggest you checking Sturbridge out...I suggest Sturbridge to all my Clients, Friends who are looking to upgrade their living conditions...

name: Diane Fussell
text: I have been at Sturbridge Commons for almost 2.5 years and absolutely love it here. The maintenance guys take care of the community really well. I have never had a major problem in my apartment and any issues I have had have always been taken care of quickly. The office staff is always friendly and doing fun events for the residents. I am surprised by the other reviewers that said bad things, they must have left owing money. LOL! Trust me, its a good place to live.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving a great review! We are so happy to hear you are having a great experience with Sturbridge Commons! Please let us know if you ever need anything!

name: Jacob Lambert
text: I've been here almost three years, and in that time, any problems I've had--they've fixed. Quick. And it's very quiet here. The valet trash service only makes this place better. I've thoroughly enjoyed my time here, and I'm renewing my lease again one final time before we buy a house. Truly wonderful time here. (And the pool and gym ain't bad either).

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review, Jacob! We are so happy to hear you are enjoying living at Sturbridge. We are lucky to have residents like you and are looking forward to another year! - Angela

name: Noah Campbell
text: I have been a resident here for three years, the management and staff are equally impressive as well as encouraging and helpful. Carson, Morgan, and the property manager Sherri are excellent at making residents feel exceptionally comfortable. Pricing, great floor plans, appliances, and amenities all make the living experience delightful.

resp.text: Thank you so much for leaving us a great review! We are so glad you are loving Sturbridge! Our team aims to make our residents happy and I am glad to hear we hit the mark for you! ~Angela, Community Manager

name: ONE NO
text: This is the worst apartment in Montgomery, emails and phone calls are never answered promptly. Expensive rent and rude Manager. When you plan to move out they deduct your entire deposit. Please don't move here, it was the worst experience of my life. I would give 0 stars if possible .Even if this was Montgomery's last Apt, I'd rather sleep in my car. Instead of moving here.

resp.text: Hello, we see you left us a 1-star review. Hopefully, this is by mistake. Our team would love the opportunity to discuss any issues you are having so we can take care of them immediately. Please reach out to us at 334.270.0111.

name: het triathi
text: The service is very bad. Very disappointed from the service.

resp.text: Hi, we see you edited your review while our team was quarantined. Please know we are all back in the office providing the best service to our residents. Please reach out to us if you have a pending issue we need to address at 334.270.0111.

name: David Tenant
text: Trash disposal is broken half of the time. Then trash spills on the road and smell is everywhere.Pet trash bags at the bin are never found. People don't pick up after their pets. Can't even step in the grass sometimes. Avoid at all possible costs.

resp.text:
Hi David,
Thanks for your review. We have not had any issues with our compactor being down. We also offer valet trash so our community stays pretty clean. We recently replaced our pet stations so they are all stocked with bags. Is it possible this review is for another community? Please reach out with any concerns so we can help, 334-270-0111!

name: Ashley Thompson
text: I WOULD NOT advise anyone to move here! Maintenance suck and everyone that lives here continuously have problem with AC systems. They do not have routine pest control even though you are paying for it. If you don't call and tell them to have your unit sprayed, they will go an entire year without having anyone come out. All appliances are old and dated. These apartments need to be upgraded and yet rent keep going up. Unless this is the last place in Montgomery, do not move here. If you submit a work order it might take them a week to get to it. Our fridge went out twice within a month causing us to lose food and they didn't compensate us for it. Be aware!

resp.text: We’re sorry to hear that your experience was less than perfect. We have renovated many of our apartments and are always working on improvements. We also provide routine pest control and weekly call backs for any residents that are experiencing pest issues. I would be happy to discuss any other issues you experienced while you were living here if you would like to reach out to us at 334.270.0111.

name: Lisa Klekowski
text: This apartment complex and the management has been really great while I was here! It's an incredible location with restaurants and movie theater across the street. I have had zero issues with maintenance while I was here, and if anything came up, they promptly took care of whatever the issue was. Everyone was really professional and helpful too. Lesley and Bri are by far my favorite staff reps to work with because they are friendly, professional, knowledgeable, and if you tell them something is wrong, they are on top of it immediately.  I truly had a really great experience living here and really appreciated all the work they put in to ensure that I felt at home.

resp.text: Thanks for such an amazing review Lisa! We miss you!!!

name: Maggie Ramshur
text: The best apartment I’ve ever lived in. The staff were amazing and very quick to respond to any needs. The grounds are kept immaculate. It’s very quiet and near all the best shopping. I would recommend these apartments to anyone.

name: Syed Banna
text: Very bad management.Also the service.  Service depends on human color

resp.text: We are sorry you feel this way but we can assure you that this is not the case. We are only handling emergency work orders at this time due to COVID-19. Please reach out to the community manager to discuss this in further detail. Good news is that we are planning to open the maintenance department back up on or around June 1st!

name: xh li
text: Use various methods to make residents pay

resp.text: We offer ways to pay online and in the office by check, money order, debit card, credit card or ACH payments. Please give us a call if you have questions at 334.270.0111. We are happy to help!

name: Courtney W.
text: Worst apartment complex ever. They don't deserve not even the 1 star given. Spend your money elsewhere. They are under very poor management and have a high office and maintenance turnover ratio. Unfortunately, the girls in the front office who really knew anything left, probably to better themselves. They lack good leadership at all levels and that unfortunately trickles down to becoming the resident's issue. The trash and litter has gotten out of control and I was told it was not maintenance or the groundskeeper's job. I can confirm that maintenance does a poor job at repairs and even if you make the necessary repairs properly, you will NEVER see your security deposit again. The only possible upside to this complex is location, however, seeing as though crime has increased tremendously in that area near the AMC theatre and Walmart and Sturbridge isn't gated you would be better off somewhere that costs just as much but is gated. This complex has fallen off quite largely in the last couple years and continues to decline. So much money for very little satisfaction!!!

resp.text: Courtney, we are sorry to hear about your bad experience. We strive for exceptional customer service, and we regret that we missed the mark for you. I apologize if you were misinformed about our maintenance team, they do take care of the grounds each morning, 7 days a week. I would love the opportunity to discuss your other issues further if you would like to reach out to us at 334.270.0111.

name: Ashlen Rene
text: Best decision I've made thus far regarding my residency in Montgomery, AL. I moved in mid 2017 and have been a happy tenant since then. The staff is nice (especially Bri M.) and maintenance handles issues swiftly. They also have a lot of neighborhood interaction, which is a plus.

resp.text: We are so glad you're happy! Thanks for the awesome review!

name: Erika Poikey
text:
Walls are super thin, very rude neighbors with multiple screaming kids. I'm a doctor and have lost sleep multiple nights now over screaming children jumping around all hours of the night pounding on who knows what and screaming for hours. I've filed noise complaints and gotten nowhere.

Update: Still miserable, courtesy officers are rude, I dont feel safe or welcome here and am counting down the days until I can finally move out. Management apparently talked to my neighbors, who are just more rude towards me now probably for complaining.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We apologize for the issues you are having with your neighbors. Please call the office to discuss this in further detail. Also, please know that we have a courtesy representative that can be contacted after hours by calling the office at 334-270-0111 and following the prompts. We hope to hear from you soon so that we can get this resolved for you.

name: L G
text: The pool area and the 24-hour gym are great!  The staff is very friendly and helpful, especially Ashley!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your response! We are partial to the pool area and gym. Have you by chance tried out the virtual fitness training system set up in the yoga room? It is amazing! PS- make sure you stop by the office for FREE Starbucks as well!

name: Adnan Sabir
text:
Based on what we have experienced so far by living in Sturbridge apartments since July 2013 is that the place has no other advantage than location.  The following problems are tips of the iceberg what we suffered:
There is absolutely no control or procedures to keep the area clean.  The dumpsters are over flowing on weekend, the steps going to dumpsters and the door for the dumpster are so dirty you feel like throwing up. The Community Laundry area is very filthy.  The water flow in showers makes such a big noise that you can hear your neighbor taking shower and sometime it’s very disturbing when those showers are taken in the middle of the night and/or early morning.  Office has absolutely no concern over maitainance delays and poor workmanship for repairs.  There was a leak in my closet which took almost 2 weeks for fixing, the leak under kitchen and master bathroom is taking fever.  Even once repaired leaks go back to leaking within short time of repair.  Couple of maintenance people are very rude.  There are lots of empty promises made to the tenants.  We wish we should have never rented here.  I’m sure there may be more who will have similar complaints but either don’t know how to publicize or simply don’t have time to do so.

name: Chris Bang
text: Their NEW maintenance team is nice. They came here this morning because of the water leak, and they have diagnosed exactly what made the water leaks and concluded that the entire sink should be replaced. And it was replaced and everything is done in a few hours in the morning. This is evidence that maintenance is doing well.

name: Amanda Staggs
text: When I first moved in, everything seemed so nice with this place. The more I lived there, the more I wanted to leave. The HVAC was nonfunctional five times while I lived there. The carpet was stained and damaged when I moved in, but they still charged me to replace it when I moved out. Go somewhere downtown that is new, and avoid this place.

name: 호비스D
text: absolutely old facilities. mushrooms are growing in bathroom. Gas tank broke (fix next day). Toilet tank lid. the oldest laundry machine i have ever seen. It took 2 month to fix to stop mushroom growing ( I went the rental office 10 times).

name: Ninad Patel
text:
Bad Bad management. Problems are never solved. I mean never.... he rent is too high and pool is always dirty. There is algae everywhere in the pool. Gym hardly has 3/4 instruments.
Location is good but with respect to the rent taken, service is Third class.
I called up for help to fix my bathroom's flush tank and for the whole 2 weeks they did not show up. I had been visiting the office at least 20 times. Still its not fixed

name: Alex Hood
text: This apartment complex is in a convenient location for local food and shopping. It was great to live right across the street from Walmart neighborhood market and the movie theater. Easy to get to AUM and other places around town. The rent was affordable and the improvements to the main pool area were very nice. We had a couple of maintenance issues which spanned over our stay at Sturbridge , however management did a great job to resolve these issues. we suggest keeping lines of communication open with management if you have an issue they will do their best to make things right. overall I enjoyed the time we lived at Sturbridge Commons.

name: The Future Ex
text: Worst place to stay in.. No security.. Bad management plus they don’t care about people..

resp.text: We’re sorry to hear that your experience was less than perfect. It may be possible that you've left this review for the wrong community however, since we currently do have two courtesy officers.  Please let us know if we can help!

name: Anon Ymous
text:
Based on what has been experienced so far, the only benefit of living in Sturbridge Commons is the location.

The following problems are a glimpse at what residents can expect; potentially identifying details have been omitted for the sake of maintaining anonymity.  These complaints have been voiced by a number of other tenants.

*Trash.  There is usually trash surrounding the dumpster, floating in the pond, and strewn about the grounds.

*Mail rooms.  Both mail rooms are usually in poor condition, particularly the mail room in the second clubhouse.

*Car Wash.  The car washing station vacuum has been broken for some time, and management refuses to fix it; they will not even give an estimated time frame for when it will be fixed.  The water for the car washing station only works intermittently.

*Community Laundry.  The communal laundry facility is filthy.

*Interior.  The interior of the apartment is incredibly inferior for a "luxury" apartment.

*Maintenance.  Maintenance is on a very long "first come, first serve" basis.  When they finally do arrive, they do a substandard job.

*Noise.  Through the walls you can hear normal, indoor volume conversations of neighbors on all sides of your unit.  The windows block no sound, such that noises from outside the apartment are the same volume inside the apartment.

*Other Tenants.  There are very many other tenants with children, and there appear to no rules (or no enforced rules) about volume or leaving toys strewn about the grounds.

*Management.  When presented with any complaints, the management assures tenants that any and all issues will be addressed, though this is very rarely true.

name: Iftekhar Alam Tushar
text: I love to live here

resp.text: Thanks for your review! We are happy to hear you love it here!

name: Courtney A
text:
Been living here for almost 2 years now. Maintenance has always been attentive to the needs of the tenants. However, the office staff is different. Customer service lacking. I went to the office to see if someone could help me get a new battery for my FIRE & SAFETY concerns of my smoke detector beeping. I was handled disgruntledly by the office staff. Maintenance was asked if they were on the clock, they replied no and they willingly insisted to help but I told them not to worry about it.
I then emailes the manager who sent a maintenance team member out a few hours later. I denied service due to the unfriendly office personnel of replacing a simple battery

name: Gazi Yamlikha (Jammy)
text: It's a very bad management community in Montgomery. They don't care any of tenant living in this place. They don't take care propar way. Lots of tenant had complain about MANAGER of this location. If any work needed you can knock their door but they don't like to hear that. Rent it high and lots of tenant going out another places.

name: Zavier Owens
text: A Great Place To Stay 😌

resp.text: Thanks so much Zavier for the great review!

name: Mitesh Patel
text:
Wrost place the live with highest rent in surrounding, No security, no cleaning, not a friendly staff at all.
Everyweek rebbery happened and still they don't wanna put security. Shame to say that i live here.
Group of People smoke weed in open and no action aginst them. Definitely not safe if you wanna live with your family.

name: Marcie Ivey
text: The staff is amazing love them

resp.text: THANKS! We think your're pretty amazing yourself!

name: Shail Patel
text: The new management is doing a very good job.

name: August Guemmer
text: Overall a nice apartment complex. Staff is always friendly and maintence takes care of your needs quickly. The only draw back is the online bill pay, it never seems to work. They just need to update their website so people can actually pay rent online. I work all day and go to school, so catching the office during business hours can be challenging. But to end on a positive note: I live in a 1 bedroom with my girlfriend and our dog, there is plenty of room for personal space. We had a bug problem for exactly 1 day before it was taken care of. I've never heard any noise from neighbors. The complex itself is close to everything; Walmart market across the street, Win-dixie and Publix less than a mile away, and most popular shopping complex in Montgomery just a mile or so away. Yet, the complex is off the main road and feels private. I would say this complex is one of the safest in town as well.

name: Locas Kindell
text: Perfect location for AUM and shopping

resp.text: Thank you Locas for such a great review! We do love that Sturbridge is just minutes from Eastchase and tons of other shopping. Our location makes it extremely convenient for AUM students as well!

name: Carla Henry
text: Good school zone and close to stores

name: Montgomery HonestBoard
text: Previous comment was left by the assistant manager herself. Poorly managed.

name: AKHIL PAUL
text:
(Translated by Google) malaylaliesss ... pls come ....

(Original)
malaylaliesss... pls come....

resp.text: Thank you for your review! Please contact the office at 334-270-0111 to discuss your comments in more detail.

name: Sherry Cannon
text: I gave one star because of the horrible customer service! I've been living at the magnolia since august of 2020 and the employees at the time were great. The move in process was very easy and professional. Recently the office has hired a whole new team expect for maybe one employees (Dylan) who has been very helpful throughout this entire process. It has been very difficult to get in contact with the new property manager. It seems as if she's always unavailable, there are certain questions & concerns i have regarding my lease that only a property manager could answer. Don't get me wrong the new employees try their best to help! but i want need answers straight from the source.

resp.text: Sherry thank you for your review. After looking into this further we want to ensure that you have the correct contact information to reach our team directly. Please email info@magnoliaatauburn.com with your concerns so that we can address your situation. While we do have an entirely new team,  all of our team members are fully prepared and equipped to answer any questions. We look forward to hearing from you.  Thanks

name: A C
text: Leaving this for full transparency - many of the 5 star reviews without descriptions were essentially baited into existence. For example, residents were told there was a free Chick-fil-A breakfast, but upon arriving, were told to leave a 5 star review on Google and only then would they get it for "free". Not a good look!

resp.text: Hi A C, thank you for leaving us a review. While we like to incentivize our residents for taking the time out to leave us a review we always encourage honest feedback so that we know how we can improve. We'd love to hear from you regarding any concerns, please give us a call at 334.887.8740 and speak with our manager, Brittney. We hope to turn that 1 star into 5 stars soon!

name: sharon martin
text: The move in experience was terrible! We were told that my daughter and niece were moving into a vacant apartment and another roommate would be coming in August. We were also told the apartment would be cleaned and it was completely renovated.  Instead, someone was already in the apartment. The apartment was very dirty. And the cabinets were certainly not renovated. We were very unhappy and the office manager did nothing to correct the problem. She refused to give the deposit back or terminate the lease even though they did not provide what we were told they would. My daughter was in tears from the disappointment and I regret not reading the reviews before choosing this place. Please don't make the same mistake. While we were there I saw countless other students coming in with complaints as well.

resp.text: Hello, Sharon. Thank you for the detailed feedback regarding your recent move-in here at The Magnolia. We pride ourselves on ultimate cleanliness and apologize we have not lived up to these standards. We have taken note of your concerns and would like to further address this issue. We’d love to hear from you, please stop by the leasing office or give us a call at 334.887.8740.

name: Temple of Worship Fellowship church
text: This is an amazing place to live. There are some minor things that need to be updated but overall a great place to stay. We love to refer people to this place!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words. We appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience. We love hearing how we are doing!

name: Olivia Abrams
text: The location and price is perfect for the average college student! The staff is very helpful from receiving packages to managing maintenance issues. The amenities here are nice as well such as access to printers, personal mailboxes and good wifi. I’d definitely recommend The Magnolia Apartments to whoever is looking!

resp.text: Thank you, Olivia! We love hearing that you enjoy living with us, and we love that you are here at The Magnolia at Auburn!

name: Nathaniel Taylor
text: Miss Averyon is one of the newest managers at the Magnolia and she  was more than helpful with everything she did. She was the most helpful on the staff and genuinely has the best intentions for the residents here at the Magnolia.

resp.text: Thank you Nathaniel for your kind words. We are elated to hear your feedback regarding our new team members.

name: Travel With B
text: Moved in February, it’s been great so far. Maintenance is quick, the office staff is nice, and goes the extra mile to handle any issues that arise and the location is minutes from everything.

resp.text: Thank you, B! We love hearing that you enjoy living with us, and we love that you are here at The Magnolia at Auburn!!

name: Cheyenne Ashou
text: The place is a great location and has a nice staff; however, there are a few things that I wish were changed. First, the apartment complex advertises itself as a gated community, but I have not seen the gates being used once overall in the 3 months I’ve lived here. Secondly, it would be nice to have access to the gym. After all if Auburn University is allowing access to the Rec Center, it only makes sense that the Magnolia would do the same as well. I understand that there is a virus in the midst, but we are all adults here and can handle ourselves. Other than that, this is a great place to live.

resp.text: Hi Cheyenne, Thank you so much for the feedback! We are in the process of having our gates repaired and hope to have them back up and running before the end of the month. We also have started our phased reopening process for the amenities and should have the gym and study lounge reopened very soon. Our clubhouse amenities are opened again now as well! We apologize for any inconvenience and again appreciate your input. Thank you! -Christina Winslett (Community Manager)

text:
An overall good experience, but for the price, it's a great deal!

Pros: super spacious living room, generally quick responses for maintenance requests, property grounds are kept up nicely, walls are nowhere near as thin as other places I've lived

Cons: very slow internet -- I'm a student and when using Zoom, I can only get audio but it's not enough to stream the video content too--there was a pretty bad pest issue when I first moved in but they were quick to spray when I let them know, moldy air vents / cabinets

name: Khadijah Graves
text: There is mold throughout my entire room. When you come inside, you can smell the mold. I made a request to get it fixed and it took maintenance 3 weeks to get to my apartment after multiple reminders. Once maintenance came, they only focused on my bathroom. They tore the wall down and placed  a dehumidifier in my room for about a week. They place me in what looks like an  abandoned apartment for the time being. Literally, nothing worked in the temporary apartment. Once they fixed the wall, they never came back to repaint it. I have reminded them over and over and its been 3 month and no one has showed up to finish the job. Now there is mold growing again! This is disgusting and no one should have to live in these conditions. DO NOT MOVE HERE! It's not worth it.

resp.text:
Hello Khadijah,

We are sorry to hear about the issues in your apartment. Our management and maintenance teams work together to ensure our residents enjoy a comfortable community, so we regret that this matter has not been completely addressed to your satisfaction. Our team wants to resolve this for you and did go to your apartment to begin the repairs yesterday.  The Community Manager will follow up with you once the repairs are completed to ensure you are satisfied with the results.  In the meantime, please do not hesitate to reach out to the Community Manager at  SocialMgr@WaypointStudentLiving.com if you need to share additional information.
Thank you.

name: Sylvia Masango
text: I lived at The Magnolia at Auburn Apartments for almost four years and thoroughly enjoyed my experience. The latest renovations provide great updated amenities and the apartment complex also hosts engaging events (prior to COVID). The location is also prime for the average college student. The staff are friendly and professional and will go out of their way to ensure their residents are taken care of. I'd like to give a special shoutout to Ms. Averyon, who just recently started working there. She will go above and beyond to make sure all your residential needs are taken care of and is incredibly kind and thoughtful.

resp.text: Thank you, Sylvia! We love hearing that you enjoyed living with us.

name: Ashley Glaze
text: I am super excited to live here next year! The girl that showed me around was great and super helpful answering my questions. The apartments are nice and the gym is huge!

resp.text: We cannot wait to have you as a resident, Ashley! We know you will love the community as well as the amenities! Keep an eye out this summer when we start hosting invents for our new incoming residents! Thanks so much for the review.

name: PoppinWithJo
text: Would only consider living here if you absolutely have no where else to live! The location is great! But that’s the only positive about this place. Maintenance doesn’t fulfill your requests in a timely manner and if they do, it’s never fully completed just covered up to where you’ll have to call and ask to have the same task completed again. They never notify you when they’ve been in your house, and they steal! They’ve stolen money straight out of my drawer before. If you happen to have issues with your roommate they DO NOT care, nor do they try to resolve the issue. They ignore your calls and emails and never actually resolve anything. When they do respond they say they’ll do things they never do! All apartments are INFESTED with gnats to the point where they end up in your refrigerator. Pest control may come, but never resolves the issue. Sometimes pest control says they’ve came and they actually never come so you’re left waking up with gnats in your bed! Renovated apartments look nice until you move in and find a ton of things need to be done. Gym sucks, pools are about the only great amenity. So please think again and again and again before deciding to move into this  place, unless sleeping with gnats and bed bugs doesn’t bother you and you don’t mind issues not being resolved. I would never suggest anyone move here!

resp.text: Ms. Mitchell, we are sorry to hear you had this experience. To our knoweldge, the office was not made aware of these issues and would love to discuss them futher to come to a solution. Please feel free to contact us, we would be happy to help in anyway we can. Thank you, Christina Winslett (Community Manager)

name: Jemma Constant
text: Do not waste your money here. The wifi constantly cuts out throughout the entire complex, and I have spoken to the staff multiple times about fixing it, and each time they act like it is the first time hearing about the issue. After speaking with Comcast, they said that the entire wifi system is very old and outdated, and needs to be completely replaced or the shortages will continue to happen. I will not be renewing my lease here and would not recommend this place to anyone. There is a huge lack of communication among staff, and nothing ever gets fixed. Also, the only reason why they have some good reviews is because they offer prizes to anyone who writes a good review, to try and even out all the terrible, truthful reviews.

resp.text: Jemma, thank you for your detailed review! We sincerely appreciate your feedback. Please contact the leasing office at 334.887.8740 to discuss these concerns further!

name: Caroline MacCaughelty
text: I would give 0 stars if I could. I was asked to take down this review by the property manager here at The Magnolia because she didn't want anyone to know what I really thought of this place and its management. Well, I'm putting my review back up and this time it's staying. The Magnolia has some of the worst management I have ever come in contact with. The managers are rude and dismissive of issues that I've had. They have allowed their vendors to enter my room without my knowledge, violating my privacy and then treating the issue like a small minor problem. Maintenance is stoned whenever they come to fix things, never in a timely manner, and the manager denies this fact. In the end, it doesn't matter if you fixed it or not, the process was arduous and awful for me. They were rude almost the ENTIRE time and did not treat me like a customer who is paying their salary. They in NO WAY went above and beyond to assist me. They did the BARE MINIMUM. I have many more complaints that I've already sent to corporate that contain way too much for one google review. To summarize, save your money. Magnolia IS NOT worth it.

resp.text: Ms. MacCaughelty, I asked you to please consider removing your original review because you posted it before allowing us an opportunity to fix the items in your apartment, all of which have since been fixed. Your claims against our team members are unfounded and slanderous. Our team has gone above and beyond to address every concern and service request in your apartment. However, regardless of which team member responds or interacts with you, you feel the need to belittle them and accuse them of false actions. Our team is committed to providing excellent customer service and assisting our residents in any way possible and we know we will continue to show you that through the duration of your lease. Thank you, Christina Winslett (Community Manager)
